Yesu kawalongela wanahina wake, “Munhu yoyose yoyomtegelezani mweye, konitegeleza niye, na yoyose yoyomulemani mweye, konilema niye. Na munhu yoyose yoyonilema niye, komulema ija yanitumile!”
Mumkoma munhu ija yakalille mwanduso wa ugima, mbali Mulungu kamzilibula na cheye ni wakalangama wa mbuli iyo.
Hamwande Yesu kawalawilila kaidi wanahina wake mumgwazogwazo mwa dilamba da Tibeliya. Ilawilila vino,

Chihabwela na kuifika kaye yake ifyagiligwa na kuhambigwa,
Mbali zuwa vidilawile, diisoma minoga, na kwaviya haikalile na mizizi, inyala.
Mbali one chila munhu yahawa kolotela usenga yoyeng'higwe na Mulungu, yaheza munhu havimanyile hebu munhu hahuwila, yose yondayayahulike yezalagusa wihi wake mwenyewo, yose yondayayahulike kezamulamulila nhaguso,
Basi muna ikaye ng'hulu muna mahamha na via mbasakanyo, vimwenga vitendigwe kwa shaba na zahabu kwa sang'hano ya chiidumwe, vimwenga vitendigwe kwa mibiki na ulongo kwa sang'hano za chila zuwa.

Mbali Mulungu kamtenda Yesu yazilibuke kulawa kwa wanhu wadanganike, kamkombola kulawa muna usungu wa ifa kwaviya haidahike bule ifa kumfunga.
Ulonzi uno wa ukweli. Nokulonda uzigangamize mbuli zino, muladi waja womuhuwila Mulungu wailave kutenda yanogile, mbuli zino zinoga na zowafaya wanhu wose.
Mkulu wa nhambiko digogogo Ananiya kawalagiliza waja wakalile wema habehi na Paulo wamtowe muna umulomo wake.
Fana viya mwanamke viyalumbigwe kulawa kwa mulume, ivo ivo na mulume kelekigwa na muke, mbali chila chinhu cholawa kwa Mulungu.
“Yeng'higwe nhogolwa Mndewa, Mulungu wa Isilaeli! Kwaviya keza kuwataza wanhu wake na kuwakombola.
Munhu yoitowa kuing'hondo koleka kusang'hana sang'hano za ugima za chila zuwa mbali kosang'hana sang'hano za ng'hondo muladi yamnogeze mkulu wake.
Yano yose yalawilila uko Besaniya, umwambu wa ulwanda lwa Yolodani, Yohana hoyakalile kobatiza.

na Mulungu kamulonga kuwa Mkulu wa nhambiko digogogo fana viya ukulu wa nhambiko wa Melikizedeki.

Nowalongelani kweli! Munhu yoyose yondayamuhokele munhu yoyanitumile, konihokela niye. Na munhu yoyose yondayanihokele niye, komuhokela ija yoyanhumile.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Mweye muli na uhuwilo mdodo!” Habali mwodumba vino? Maabaho kenuka na kadibwakila dibeho ijo na mawimbi, na dilamba dikala zinziwa.
Na niye nahawalaga wahite ukaye kumwawo wahawa na nzala, wezasinduka mwiinzila, kwaviya wamwenga wawo walawa kutali.”
Yesu kawedika, “Nomuuzani mbuli imwe, one muhanidika, nizamulongelani kuwa notenda yano kwa udahi wa yelihi.

Saimoni Petili na mwanahina imwenga wamuwinza Yesu. Kwaviya ija mwanahina imwenga kamanyika na mkulu wa nhambiko digogogo, kahita hamwe na Yesu muna uluhelengo lwa ikaye ya mkulu wa nhambiko digogogo.
Ivo Malagilizo ya Mulungu yoyamwing'hile Musa yachilela mbaka viyezile Chilisito, muladi kwa nzila ya uhuwilo chipetigwe chinoga haulongozi ha Mulungu.
Lelo sambi nokwima hano nigezigwe kwa ichimu cha lolelo donilinajo muna ichilagano chiya Mulungu choyekile na wasaho zetu.
Ivo kumbukeni kuwa umwaka mweye wanhu muli siyo Wayahudi kwa kwelekigwa womutangigwa “Hawanagumigwa ulungwana” kwa waja wowoitanga “Wogumigwe ulungwana.” Wanhu wano wakala wagumigigwe ulungwana muna ulukuli wa chiunhu kwa makono fana chilaguso.

Ivo mbuli ya Mndewa yenela na kuwa na ludabwa lukulu.

Yesu kawedika, “Vino simsaguleni mweye longo na waidi? Mbali imwe wenu mwihi!”
Mbali fana kwa kukala chiisi, nizadaha kusang'hana usang'hano uli na faida ng'hani, ivo sivimanya nisagule choni.
one chihauzigwa diyelo chinhu chinogile chiyatendiligwe mbetembete na viya viyahonyigwe,

Saa viifikile, Yesu kawasola watumigwa wake na kukala nawo mwiimeza.
Maabaho Yesu kawalongela wanahina wake simwe kuwafundiza kuwa wolondeka kutosa siku zose na sekewafe moyo.
Fana viya Yamaandiko Yelile viyolonga, “Munhu yoyose yolonda kudeng'helela ugima na kuwona siku zinogile, yayepule kulonga mbuli zihile na yaleke kulonga uvwizi.
Kweli muna kaye za kudila na kung'wila na sekemudizehe bumbila da wanhu wa Mulungu na kuwaguma chinyala wawo welibule chinhu. Vino niwalongeleni choni? Nimwing'heni nhogolwa? Si ivo bule, sidaha kumwing'hani nhogolwa bule kwa mbuli iyo!

Chila munhu vumwili sekeyazahile malondo yake mwenyewo muhala, mbali malondo ya wayage.
Ivo niwona vinoga kuwalongela ndugu wawo wanilongolele kwiza kumwenu muladi wasasale vinhu viya vimwikile chilagano kulava kwa makono maidi. Ivo izakuwa tayali na izalagusa kuwa muvilava kwa makono maidi, wala si kwa ugila.
One munhu yoyose yahawa nyondenyonde, na niye iviya mnyondenyonde. One munhu yoyose yahatenda uhasanyi, na niye nimemigwa na usungu.
Ugima wenu sekeulangulizigwe na hela, mufaike na vinhu vomwili navo. Mulungu mwenyewo kalonga, “Sizakuleka ng'o, wala sizakwasa ng'o.”
Yesu kalonga, “Walekeni wana wadoododo weze kumwangu, sekemuwalemese. Kwaviya Ufalume wa kuulanga ni wa wanhu fana wawo.”
Mndewa kolonga, lagano dino nizatenda na wanhu wa Isilaeli Zahafosa siku ziya, nizakwika malagilizo yangu muna zinzewele zawo na kwandika mwiimizoyo yawo. Nizakuwa Mulungu wawo, nawo wezakuwa wanhu wangu.

Hata nyele za mmatwi yenu zipetigwa zose. Ivo sekemdumbe kwaviya mweye munoga ng'hani kufosa shole wengi!

Kwa kuwinzana na unovu wa Mulungu uning'higwe fana mkulu wa uzenzi mwene ubala, nika chandusilo na munhu imwenga kozenga. Mbali chila munhu nayalole viya vondayazenge uchanyha yake.
Mbali muvimanye munaimizoyo yenu, sekemugese-gese vondamwidike.
Ivo sekemudumbe, mweye munoga kufosa sholwe wengi!

Mbuli ino imanyika muna yamabululu ya Yopa, na wanhu wengi wamuhuwila Mndewa.

Bahobaho imwe wawo kakimbila, kasola dodoki, kadivabika muna idivai igwaduke, maabaho kadika muna ulumango na kamwing'ha Yesu yang'we.

Nawo viwahulike Yuda chayawalongele, wadeng'helela, wamulongela kuwa wezamwing'ha hela. Ivo Yuda kandusa kuzahila nzila ya kumuhinduka.
Mbali Chilisito mulopozi kailava mwenyewo kwa Mulungu yawe nhosa ifaya kwa ludabwa lwa Muhe wa Mulungu wa siku zose. Vino damu yake haidaha kusafya ng'hani umanyi wetu wa uhasanyi wetu na kuchilopola muna zisang'hano zetu hazifaya na kuchitenda chimsang'hanile Mulungu yeli mgima?
Beho kulu dikala dobuma na mazi yatibuka.
Uchilekelele ubananzi wetu uja uchitendile, fana cheye vichiwalekelele wamwenga wowachihasanye.
Na munhu yoyose yogendelela kong'hezigwa matombo yang'hali mwana ching'hele, havimanya mafundizo ya kutenda mbuli zinogile haulongozi wa Mulungu.
Mbali wanhu wamwenga wahuwile kulawa muna dibumbila da Mafalisayo wema na walonga, “Wanhu weli siyo Wayahudi wolondeka wamhe Malagilizo ya Mulungu yoyamwing'hile Musa.”
Kwaviya kusongela Chiilsito viyagazigwe chilukuli, na mweye iviya molondeka muigangamize kupata lungilo fana jake. Kwaviya munhu yofunyila umoyo manhesa ya lukuli lwake hatenda uhasanyi kaidi.
Mkulu wa nhambiko wetu digogogo kochiwonela ubazi ng'hani muna unyondenyonde wetu, kwaviya yeye mwenyewo kagezigwa fana cheye kwa chila nzila mbali hatendile uhasanyi bule.
Na lelo nomuhulika Muhe Yelile konilongela kuwa manhesa na vifungo vonigozela chila isi.
Ivo ndugu nolonga vino, chiya chochitendigwe kwa lukuli na damu, havidaha kuhazi ufalume wa Mulungu, na vinhu vene kuwola havidaha kuhazi vinhu va kuwola.
Maabaho wanahina wake wandusa kwiiuzagiza wenyewo, “Vino kuna munhu wowose yoyamgalile ndiya?”
Wayahudi wadondola mabwe kaidi muladi wamtowe Yesu.
Kwaviya wanhu wowadanganike vondawazilibuke, hawezasola wala kusoligwa, mbali wezakuwa fana msenga wa kuulanga.
Wakalizi waluka kombelo da miwa, wamvaza Yesu muna iditwi. Maabaho wamuyawaza walo da chifalume.
Nolonga, lungilo mbali siyo jako ila da ija imwenga. Sizasang'hanila ulegeho wangu one uhatenda lungilo da munhu imwenga dinitaguse.
Ivo kwaviya cheye chawana wa Mulungu, hachilondeka kulonga kuwa Mulungu kalinga fana zahabu hebu hela hebu dibwe, vinhu vitendigwa goya kwa ubala wa wanhu.
Yesu kawedika, “Nowalongela kweli, muna isi ya sambi, Mwana wa Munhu vondayakale hana ichigoda cha chifalume chake, mweye womunisondelele niye iviya mwizakala muna ivigoda longo na vidi, kuyatagusa makabila longo na maidi ya Isilaeli.

Nowalongela kweli, mwenevale kezamwika msang'hani iyo uchanyha ya vinhu vake vose.

Wanhu vondawalonge, “Kuna tindiwalo na ugoya” lusita ulo ubananzi wizawapata kwa kusinhukiza fana viya mawine ya kuibasula mwana viyompata muke yeli na wimo, wanhu hawezadaha kuhonyokwa.
Teng'hu zahileni Ufalume wa Mulungu na yaja yoyolonda muyatende, maabaho Mulungu kezamwing'hani yayo yose.
Yesu viyaonile kamwidika kwa ubala, kamulongela, “Huli kutali na Ufalume wa Mulungu.” Kulawa baho, habule munhu yoyamuuzile Yesu chinhu chochose kaidi.
“Vondanisegele, sizamulekani wachiwa, nizambwelelani.
Viwakalile wahabehi na lwivi lukulu lwa bululu, wanhu wowakalile wapapa mtufi wa mbwanga wakala wolawa. Mbwanga iyo yaoyadanganike kakala mwana yelekigwe yaidumwe wa mama mgane, na wanhu wengi wa bululu diya wakala hamwe na mama iyo.
“Na weye mwanangu, kwizatangigwa mulotezi wa Mulungu yeli Uchanyha Ng'hani. Kwizamulongolela Mndewa, kumsasalila nzila yake.
Mweye wadelenya! Mulotezi wa Mulungu Isaya kalotela kweli viyalongile,
Hanhu hohose haja Yesu hayahitile, muimigunda hebu muna yamabululu hebu mwiiziisi, wanhu waweka watamu muna yamagulilo. Wamulamba yawalekelele wadalise hata muna imhindo ya walo jake. Wose wowadidalise wahona.
Yesu viyahulike kuwa Lazalo mtamu, kongeza kukala siku mbili haja hayakalile.
Mbali mweye wose mumuhokela Muhe Yelile kulawa kwa Chilisito, ivo mweye moumanya ukweli.
Lelo munhu yahawa na vinhu va zisi zose vino na yahamuwona ndugu yake kana uzidilwa na hamuwonela ubazi, kodahaze kulonga kana ulondo wa Mulungu muumoyo wake?
Yosefu kailongoza na Nikodemo, munhu ija yoyahitile kwa Yesu ichilo baho umwaka. Nikodemo kakala yagalile mavuta vibaba malongo matatu, yatibwilizigwe na manemane na ubani.
Na one gutwi dihalonga, “Kwaviya niye sili ziso, niye si wa lukuli”, vino kwa ichimu icho sigambediwe chilungo cha lukuli? Siivo bule!
Kawedika, “Izoni mwizawona.” Ivo wahita na wawona hanhu hayakalile kokala Yesu. Ikala yofika saa longo ichigulogulo. Nawo wakala na Yesu chigulogulo yose.
Ivo sekeuwandike wagane wali wali kwaviya one madambwa yawo ya lukuli yahongezeka na kuwa na ludabwa ng'hani kufosa kusang'hana usang'hano wa Chilisito, wezalonda kusoligwa kaidi.
Mafalisayo wasegela na wahita kutenda mipango ya kumkoma Yesu.
Wanahina walamula kuwa chila munhu fana viyodaha yagale chinhu chochose muladi kuwataza wahuwila wayawe wowokala Yudeya.
Maabaho wose waidi wakwela mwiingalawa na beho dima hupi.
Toseni ng'hani yayo sekeyalawilile muna zisiku za chihuhwe!
Mtamu ija kamwidika, “Mwenevale, nabule munhu wa kunika muna dilamba lusita yahatibuligwa. Chila honilonda kwingila, munhu imwenga konilongolela.”
Cheye hachilingile fana wanhu weli wengi wachuuzi mbuli ya Mulungu kwa malondo yawo, mbali cheye ni wanhu wolonga kweli haulongozi ha Mulungu, fana wanhu watumigwe na Mulungu muna ukuilumba na Chilisito.
Yesu viyawabwelele lwakatatu, kawalongela, “Mng'hali mwogona na kuhumula? Basi! Lusita lufika, niye, Mwana wa Munhu sambi nogeligwa mmakono mwa wahasanyi.
Nowalongela kweli, munhu yoyose yondayanihuwile niye kezatenda viya vinitendile. Kezatenda vinhu vikulu kufosa vino, kwaviya Niye nohita kwa Tata.
“Mtumwa imwenga keza, kalonga, ‘Mwenevale, ino iyo hela yako, niifisa muna ichibindo.
Na chihanga chake chikala fana lumwemwe, na mawalo yake yakala mazelu chwee!
Wanhu wose wowakalile baho waja na weguta. Maabaho wanahina wadondola yaja yamasigavu na wamemeza vigelo longo na vidi.
Yakobo na ndugu yake Yohana, wana wa Zebedayo, wano kaweng'ha zina Boanelige, fambulo jake “Wanhu wa Ng'huwa,”
Mbali ino mwanago kadanganya vinhu vako na malaya, na viyabwelile ukaye kumchinjila dang'ang'a dinenehe!’
Paulo kakala yang'hali na waja wanhu wahuwile uko Kolimso kwa siku nyingi, kahita na Pilisika na Akila mbaka Siliya. Yang'hali hanasegela Kemkeliya, kawegula mvili zake kwa chimu cha chilagano chiyekile.
Kwaviya lusita lwa nhaguso lufika, na wanhu wa Mulungu ni wawo wa mwanduso kutagusigwa. One ihandusa na cheye, vino izakuwaze kwa wanhu hawategeleza Mbuli Inogile ya Mulungu?
Wezakwamha mazoka, na hata wahang'wa madaka hayezawatenda vihile bule. Wezawekila watamu makono yawo, nawo wezahona.”
Geseni vinhu vili kuulanga, si vinhu vili muna isi.
Nawo wawalongela fana Yesu vayawalongele, na wanhu waja wawaleka wahite.
Mulimi yatendile usang'hano kwa kuiyoha kolondeka yawe wa mwanduso kupata chiya chotile muna umgunda wake.
Munhu yoyose yolonda kuhuma kukimbila hadaha kwing'higwa gweko da kuhuma one hamhise malagilizo ya miyangalo.
Filipo kakwenhuka habehi ya ditololi ijo na kamuhulika munhu iyo kosoma chitabu cha Isaya, mulotezi wa Mulungu. Baho Filipo kamuuza, “Vino koyamanya yayo yousoma?”
Kuuhelelo ndugu zangu, geseni mbuli zino za kweli na zinogile na za kutogoligwa kunoga haulongozi wa Mulungu, zelile na zozilondeka kutunhizigwa na zozinogeza na za hishima.
Zakaliya tati yake Yohana kamemezigwa Muhe Yelile, nayo kalonga ulaguzi uno kulawa kwa Mulungu,
Ivo wambwiya zangu walondwa, siku zose vinikalile na mweye munhegeleza, fana vinili kutali na mweye, gendeleleni kutegeleza. Sang'haneni sang'hano kwa ludumbo na kugudemeka kwa ichimu cha ukombola wenu,
Yesu kalonga kaidi, “Vino Ufalume wa Mulungu chiulinganyize na choni? Simwe dilihi donda nisang'hanile kuufambula?
Kwaviya Malagilizo yose ya Musa yofikizigwa muna dilagilizo dino dimwe, “Mulonde mkaya miyago fana vuilonda mwenyewo.”
Kwaviya lukuli lwenyewo hautendigwe kwa chilungo chimwe muhala, ila vilungo vingi.
Mbali wamwenga walonga, “Munhu mwene chinyamkela kodahaze kulonga vino? Vino chinyamkela kodaha kumuhonya munhu chipofu?”
Mwanamke iyo kamsondelela Yesu hachisogo, maabaho kadalisa mhindo ya walo da Yesu. Bahobaho damu ileka kumulawa.
Kwa uhuwilo wano wose waitowa ng'hondo na wafalume, wahuma. Watenda voilondeka na wapata yaja yowalongeligwe na Mulungu. Wasita milomo ya simba,
Mbali cheye siyo wanhu wosinha sinha na kunangigwa. Ila china uhuwilo wa kuchikombola mihe yetu.
Maabaho Petili hamwe na ija mwanahina imwenga wahita kuna dituka.
Yesu kakala yavimanyile Tata kamwing'ha udahi wa chila chinhu, na iviya kakala yalawile kwa Mulungu na kezabwela kwa Mulungu.
Sifaya kutangigwa mwanago kaidi, nitende fana imwe wa watumigwa wako.’
Petili na waja watumigwa wamwenga wedika, “Cholondeka chimuhulike Mulungu, siyo wanhu.
Viwafikile kwa Yesu, wamuwona munhu ija yoyakalile na lung'husesa lwa vinyamkela kakala hasi, kayawala viwalo goya na hakili zake zimbwelela. Wanhu wose wadumba.
“Walume, nowona mwanza wetu wizakuwa muna ihatali. Chizakwagiza vinhu, siyo mbahasha muhala mbali na ugima wetu iviya.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nimulagusani mauzauza mengi kulawa kwa Tata. Vino uzauza dilihi dodimtendani munitowe na mabwe?”
Mbali teng'hu kezagaya ng'hani na kezalemigwa na wanhu wa ulelo uno.
Kwaviya kwa sadaka yake imwe kawatenda waja wose wowosafyigwa uhasanyi wawo kuwa wofaya siku zose.
Uko Chilisito kekigwa mchanya ng'hani ya tawala zose, udahi, nguvu na falume, kotawala chila zina diya dili na udahi doditangigwa muna ulusita luno na muna ulusita luja lukwiza.
Paulo kalonda yamsole Timoseyo yahite nayo, ivo kamwingiza ulungwana kwaviya Wayahudi wakalile isi ija wavimanya kuwa tati yake Timoseyo kakala Mgiliki.
Ivo chimulamba Tito, yoyanduse sang'hano ino, kugendelela kumtazani kukomeleza sang'hano ino ya unovu.
Lagano da mwanduso dikala na nzila zake za kutambikila na hanhu helile ha kutambikila hohazengigwe na wanhu.
Nayo kamulongela, ‘Kutenda goya, msang'hani unogile! Kwaviya kukala mwaminika muna ichinhu chidodo, nizakwika uwe mulangulizi muna yamabululu longo.’
Mulungu, Tata wa Mndewa Yesu, yeng'higwe nhogolwa siku zose, kovimanya kuwa niye si mvwizi.
Maabaho walonda wangwile kaidi, mbali Yesu kawabanga.
Imwe wawo yatangigwe Agabu kema, kalonga kwa udahi wa Muhe Yelile kuwa izalawilila nzala ng'hulu muna isi yose. Na nzala iyo ilawilila muna zisiku za mtawala Chilaudiyo.
Masayo na Tomasi, Yakobo mwana wa Alufayo na Saimoni yoyatangigwe mkaya mtowanila isi ya Isilaeli,
Siku isondelele Agilipa na Benike weza kwa ng'henze, wengila hanhu ha kutegelezela mbuli, hamwe na wakulu wa wakalizi na walangulizi wa dibululu. Fesito kalagiliza Paulo yagaligwe hanhu baho.
Chila siku nikala hamwe na mweye mwi Ikaye ya Mulungu, hamunigwilile bule. Mbali ino iyo saa yenu, ludabwa lwa ziza lotawala.”
Maabaho waja weli muna isi ya Yudeya, wakimbilila kuna ulugongo.
One mkono wako uhakutenda utende yehile, uukanhe. Muhavu wingile muna ugima wa siku zose na mkono umwe muhala, kufosa kwingila na makono maidi jehanamu. Uko moto wake hauzimika bule.
Ndugu zake viwahitile kudidugila, Yesu nayo kahita, mbali hahitile chiumwingi, kahita chinyelenyele.
Usang'hano wowousang'hana fana wakulu wa nhambiko ni simwe hebu sisila da mbuli za kuulanga, fana Musa viyalagilizigwe na Mulungu, viyakomeleze kuzenga dizewe da Mulungu kwaviya kalonga, “Lola ukavitende vinhu vose kwa simwe diya donikulaguse viukalile kulugongo.”
Walangulizi wa Wayahudi wazanywa, wauza, “Vino munhu ino kayamaze yano yose nayo hasomile bule kuishule?”
Munhu ija kalola kuchanyha, kalonga, “Ona! Nowona wanhu, mbali walinga mibiki yogenda.”
Yesu kawalongela, “Nowalongela kweli, munhu yoyose yalekile kaye yake hebu ndugu zake hebu lumbu zake hebu mami yake hebu tati yake hebu wanage hebu migunda kwa ichimu cha niye na mbuli inogile,
“Hambwe weye kwa Mmisili ija yanduse kuwatenda wanhu magana malongo mane wagombe siku zino na kuwalongoza kudibwilingu?”
Ngaye-ngaye iyo kakala kolonda kuja masigavu yalagale munaimeza ya tajili ija. Na zimbwa zikala zokwiza kumulambita vilonda vake.
Chilisito kowoneka kalinga kweli na Mulungu woyahoneka bule. Kakala uko ving'hali vinhu vose havinalumbigwa.
Wayahudi wamgwila munhu ino na walonda kumkoma. Nivimanya kuwa kakala mkaya wa Loma, ivo nihita na wakalizi wangu na nimkombola.
Kwaviya mung'hali mokala fana wanhu wa isi ino viwokala. Kwaviya muna migongo na ndwagi wenyewo kwa wenyewo, yolagusa kuwa molangulizigwa na isi, mukale kuinzana na ugima wa chiunhu.
Iviya sang'hano zinogile zowoneka funhufunhu, na hata ziya haziwoneka funhufunhu hazidaha kugendelela kufisika.
Mbwanga imwe yatangigwe Eutiko kakala yakalile muna dizonzo, Paulo viyakalile kolonga, Eutiko kakukila na kagona, mbaka kuuhelelo kazidilwa na nhongo na kagwa kulawa muna ichiheleto cha tatu cha uchanyha mbaka hasi. Viwahitile kumwinula wamfika kadanganika.
Mweye hamfikile kuna ulugongo lwa Sinai loludaha kudalisika fana viya viwatendile wanhu wa Isilaeli, wawo wafika kuna ulugongo luja lolukwaka moto, lugubikigwa na ziza na wingu titu na beho kulu,
Wakala womzahila Yesu, ivo viwaiting'hane muna Ikaye ya Mulungu, waiuzagiza, “Mwowonaze? Vino hezakwiza bule muna Didugila?”
Wanhu wose wonilinawo ni wako, na wose woulinawo ni wangu. Na ukulu wangu wowoneka muna iwawo.
Niye silonda ukalangama wa munhu, mbali nolonga vino muladi mweye mukomboligwe.
Viifikile ichigulogulo, wanahina wake wamuhitila na wamulongela, “Zuwa dihonga, na hanhu hano hachili ni chiwala muhala, walage wanhu wahite kuna yamabululu wakagule ndiya.”
Yahawile vinoga kumwawo one hawaimanyile nzila ya kutenda yanogile haulongozi ha Mulungu, kufosa kuimanya na maabaho kuleka lagilizo jelile dowadihokele.
“Wamweda waja ngayengaye wa muhe, kwaviya Ufalume wa kuulanga ni wawo!
Mulungu kamtuma msenga wake, munhu iyo zina jake Yohana.
Niye mwenyewo nikala simmanyile bule, mbali niza kubatiza kwa mazi muladi wanhu wa Isilaeli wammanye.”
Yesu kamulongela, “Niye ni uzilibuko na ugima. Munhu yoyose yoyonihuwila niye, hata yahadanganika kezakuwa ngima.
“Maabaho kezawalongela waja weli ubanzi wake wa kumoso, ‘Segeleni kumwangu, mweye womuduwiligwe na Mulungu, muhite kuna umoto wa siku zose uyekiligwe Mwihi na wasenga wa kuulanga wake!
Niwatuma muna iisi, fana weye viunhumile niye muna iisi.
“Hebu fana mwanamke imwe yoyakalile na sente longo na kagiza sente imwe, kezatendaze? Kezawasha chitasa na kufyagila kaye yake, na kuizahila chila hanhu mbaka yaiwone.
Chila Mkulu wa nhambiko digogogo yoyasaguligwe hagati ya wanhu wake kokwing'higwa sang'hano ya kusang'hanila Mulungu kwa ichimu chawo kwa kulava sadaka na nhosa kwa ichimu cha uhasanyi.
Kwa miyaka midi Paulo kakala kaye yoyapangile yeye mwenyewo na kakala kowahokela wanhu wose wowezile kumulola.
Daudi kalondigwa na Mulungu, nayo Daudi kampula Mulungu yamuleke yamzengele kaye iyo Mulungu wa Yakobo.
Kwaviya munhu yoyose yobena lagilizo dimwe muhala muna yamalagilizo ya Mulungu mbali kabananga mbuli imwe muhala, iyo kabananga yose.
Yesu kawedika, “Mweye wadelenya! Mulagula Isaya kalagula vinogile kumwenu vayalongile, ‘Wanhu wano wonhogoza kwa milomo yawo, mbali mizoyo yawo yakutali na niye.
Maabaho kawalongoza kunze ya bululu yawatemele mate kuhita Besaniya, nayo kenula makono yake uchanyha na kawatemela mate.
Petili kamsondelela kwa kutali mbaka kuluhelengo lwa ikaye ya mkulu wa nhambiko, kengila mgati, kakala hamwe na wakalizi muladi yadahe kulola yose yondayalawilile.
Yesu viyakalile Besaniya, mwiikaye ya munhu yotangigwa Saimoni yoyaugule utamu wa dikulu.
Kwaviya wezalawilila Machilisito wa uvwizi na walotezi wa uvwizi. Wezatenda unzonza na vilaguso muladi wawavwizile hata waja Mulungu oyawasagule, one ihadahika.
Kalonga, “Loleni! Nowona kuulanga kwa Mulungu kugubuka na Mwana wa Munhu kema ubanzi wa kulume wa Mulungu!”
Yesu viyakalile muna dibululu dimwe, munhu imwe yeli yolumwa dikulu lukuli lwose keza. Viyamuwone Yesu, kaibwanha hasi chingubingubi na kumulamba, “Mndewa, wahalonda, kodaha kunihonyo!”
Yesu kamulongela, “Ivo vino weye kwodaha kudanganika kwa ichimu changu? Nokulongela kweli, yang'hali nzogolo hanakwika, kwizanibela miyanza mitatu.”
Viyamuwone Yesu kofosa, kalonga, “Loleni! Mwanang'hondolo wa Mulungu!”
Mama imwe yakalile na utamu wa kulawa damu kwa miyaka longo na midi, kamsondelela Yesu hachisogo, kahita na kadalisa mhindo ya walo jake.
“Chochose chochifisigwe chizakuwa wazi, na chochose chochigubikigwe, chizagubuligwa na kugaligwa kuna dibung'hulo.
Maabaho wanahina waja watatu wawaona Musa na Eliya wolonga na Yesu.
Maabaho munhu ija kamulongela, “Mndewa, nohuwila.” Maabaho kumtumbalila mavindi Yesu.
Wakomigwa kwa kutowigwa na mabwe, na kukanhigwa na msumeno vihande vidi, wadanganika kwa upanga. Wazebwegela kuno wahawa wavala mbende za ng'hondolo na mbende za luti, wakala wanhu ngayengaye, wowagazigwe na kubabanyigwa.
Ivo wahuwila wa Chilisto wakala na tindiwalo muna isi yose ya Yudeya na Galilaya na Samaliya. Kwa nhazo ya Muhe Yelile wapata ludabwa lwa kongezeka peta yawo viwagendelele kumuhulika Mndewa.
Bahobaho mndele ija kenuka na kandusa kugenda. Mndele iyo kakala na miyaka longo na midi. Chinhu icho vichilawilile, wanhu wazanywa ng'hani.
Ichilo chikulu Paulo na Sila wakala wotosa na kwimba nyila za kumtogoza Mulungu kuno wafungigwe wamwenga wakala wotegeleza.
Yesu kawalongela, “Lusita lwangu lufaya lung'hali halunafika bule, mbali kumwenu mweye chila lusita lufaya.
Mbali Mkulu wa nhambiko digogogo muhala kokwingila muna dizewe na kutenda ivo mwanza umwe kwa mwaka. Kosola damu yoilavigwe nhosa kwa Mulungu kwa ichimu chake yeye mwenyewo na kwa ichimu cha uhasanyi uwatendile wanhu bila kuvimanya.
Kwaviya wana wawo wana lukuli na damu, Yesu mwenyewo kawa fana wawo na kailumba na unhu wawo. Kakala vino muladi kufosela ifa yake yamuhume Mwihi, yeli na ludabwa lwa ifa,
Kuna vinhu vili mbasakanyo vimtendeza mulume sekeyasole, wamwenga welekigwa ivo kulawa muna izinda za mami zawo, wamwenga watendigwa na wanhu kuwa ivo, na wamwenga hawasola kwa kuuzahila Ufalume wa kuulanga. Yoyodaha kwiihokela mbuli ino nayaihokele.”
Ivo ivo lulimi ni chiungo chidodo cha lukuli, nalo loigodela mbuli ng'hulu ng'hani. Lola moto mdodo wodaha kusoma mbago ng'hulu.
Wose wowahulike mbuli zake wazanywa kwa ubala wake na kwaviya viyawedike.
Ivo Mulungu kamsagula msang'hani wake na kamtuma iyo teng'hu kumwenu muladi yamtemeleni mate kwa kumtenda chila munhu yaleke sang'hano zake zihile.”
Maabaho Yuda na Sila kwaviya wawo wenyewo wakala walotezi wa Mulungu, walonga mengi kuwaguma moyo na kuweng'ha nguvu wahuwila.
Kwaviya hachiipetela wenyewo bule, mbali Yesu Chilisito ni Mndewa na cheye iviya ni wasang'hani wenu kwa ichimu cha Yesu.
Na kuna dibululu ijo kukala na mwanamke mgane yoyakalile komuhitila msemi iyo bila kufamoyo na kumulamba, ‘Nitaze nipate yonilondeka kupata kwa mwihi wangu.’
Wanhu wamwenga wakalile baho wehilwa na wayilongela, “Habali koyabananga vino mavuta yano ya bei ng'hulu ng'hani?
Mgangamale fana viya Tati yenu wa kuulanga viyeli mtimilifu.
Yano yose yalawila muladi yaja yose yalongigwe na mulotezi wa Mulungu yatimie,
Mbuli zino ziwa simwe, wamama wano waidi ni simwe da malagano maidi, da mwanduso diya doditendeke kuna ulugongo lwa Sinai, muwakilishi wake ni Hajili na wanage wokwelekigwa kuutumwa.
Na waja wosang'hanila vinhu va isi ino, wawe fana wabule sang'hano nayo, kwaviya isi ino, fana vichiimanya, yofosa.
Viwakalile wolawa, waiting'hana na munhu kulawa Chilene Saimoni, na wakalizi wamuwangiliza yausole msalaba wa Yesu.
Kwaviya munhu yahakuwona weye uli na umanyi kukala hasi haindiya mgati muna ikaye ya kutambikila nyang'hiti, munhu yeli na lungilo nyondenyonde muna umoyo kezagumigwa moyo wa kuja ndiya iyo itambikiligwe nyang'hiti.
Munhu yoyose yolonga kamuna dibung'hulo mbali komwihila ndugu yake, munhu iyo yang'hali muna diziza.
Lekamana nomtuma kumwenu muladi yamsangalazeni mizoyo yenu kwa kuwalongeleni mbuli zetu.
Viifikile siku ya kukumbuka kuvumbuka kwa Helode, Mndele wa Helodiya kavina hana iwanhu na Helode kanogelwa ng'hani,
Mkalangama wenu Sitefano viyakomigwe niye nikala uko, nitogola kukomigwa kwake, na nikala nokaliza viwalo va waja wamkomile.’
Hata walangulizi wengi wa Wayahudi wamuhuwila Yesu. Mbali Mafalisayo hawamtogole muumwingi, kwaviya wadumba kuwingigwa mwiikaye ya kutosela,
Wanhu wano hawakoligwe bule fana vimulonga. Sambi saa nhatu imitondo!
Molondeka kudisegeza lusu da umwaka muladi muwe bonge da sambi dili hadinagumigwa lusu fana vimulondeka kuwa, kwaviya Chilisito kalavigwa fana mwana ng'hondolo wa Pasaka.
Nolonda mweye muvimanye kuwa ndugu yetu Timoseyo kalekeleligwa kamala mwiichifungo. One yaheza sambi nizakwiza nayo kumwenu.
Lelo watume wanhu wahite Yopa kumtanga Saimoni zina dimwenga Petili, kokala muna ikaye ya Saimoni yosang'hana mbende, yoyokala habehi na bahali.’
Nowalongela chiya Tati yangu choyanilaguse, mbali mweye mwotenda chiya tati yenu chayawalongele.”
Tati zetu wacheleke wachizuma kwa lusita ludodo kwa kusondelela viya viwowona kuwa vinoga. Mulungu kochizuma kwa kuchitaza muladi chiwe fana yeye.
Habule munhu yotenda mbuli kwa kuifisa one kolonda yamanyike kwa wanhu. Ivo kwaviya na weye kotenda vinhu vino, ilaguse kwa wanhu weli muisi.”
“Ivo nowalongelani, puleni na mweye mwizakwing'higwa, zahileni na mweye mwizapata, hodizeni na mwizavuguliligwa.
Chuuzeni vinhu venu vose na zihela mukaweng'he ngaye-ngaye. Itendeleni mifuko yohaisakala na kuikila ngama yenu kuulanga, uko haizahunguka. Uko wabavi hawadaha kuubawa, wala sondo hawadaha kuubananga.

“Iviya muhulika wanhu viwalongeligwe, ‘Munhu wowose ija yondayamwase muke wake na yamwing'he chibuwa cha nyasa.’

Hanhu haja hoyawambigwe Yesu hakala na mgunda, na muna umgunda uwo kukala na tuka da sambi, habule munhu yawandigwe muna dituka ijo.
Yesu viyahumuluke muna ingalawa kalola na kawona lung'husesa lukulu lwa wanhu, kawawonela ubazi na kawahonya waja wakalile watamu.

Kwa uhuwilo Waisilaeli waloka Bahali ya Shamu fana muna isi inyalile, mbali Wamisili viwalondile kuloka yamazi wang'wa ng'habu wadanganika.

wamuuza Yohana, “One weye huli Chilisito wala Eliya wala mulotezi wa Mulungu, lelo habali kobatiza?”

Yesu kawedika, “Mweye mokwaga kwaviya hamuyamanyile Maandiko Yelile wala udahi wa Mulungu.

“Yodahika vilihi munhu kwingila mgati mwa kaye ya munhu imwenga yeli na ludabwa hamala baho kusola vinhu vake, na sekeyanduse kumfunga munhu iyo yeli na ludabwa?
Nowalongelani kweli, walotezi wa Mulungu wengi na wanhu wengi wa Mulungu walonda kuyawona yomuwona mweye, mbali hawayawonile na walonda kuyahulika yaja yomuhulika mweye, mbali hawayahulike.
Mweye Wasamaliya mwotosela chiya hamchimanyile, mbali cheye Wayahudi chomtosela Mulungu yochimmanyile, na kwa cheye Wayahudi, Mulungu kawakombola wanhu wose muna iisi.
Kwaviya wawo wenyewo wowagumigwe ulungwana hawayamha Malagilizo ya Mulungu yoyamwing'hile Musa, womulondani mweye mugumigwe ulungwana muladi wapate kuigodela chiya chiwatendile muna zing'huli zenu.
Mana vinhu vose vili muna zisi zose, tamaa za zihileza lukuli na tamaa za meso na magoda yoyogaligwa kwa kuwa na vinhu vingi, vinhu ivo vose havilawa kwa Tata bule mbali volawa muna isi.

Mbali niye sidaha kusagula yelihi yakale ubanzi wangu wa kulume hebu wa kumoso. Hanhu baho wezakala waja wasaguligwe na Mulungu.”
Kwaviya Mwana wa Munhu keza kukombola chiya chagile.
Kunilagusa nzila yoilongoza kuna ugima, na kwizanimemeza deng'ho kwaviya kwahamwe na niye.’

yoyowalonda wanhu wose walopoligwe na wadahe kuimanya kweli.

Tegelezeni! Niye Paulo nomulongelani kuwa one muhatogola kugumigwa ulungwana, Chilisito hezambwedelani chochose.

Wose wamemezigwa Muhe Yelile, wasonga kulonga kwa ulonzi umwenga fana Muhe Yelile viyawadahize kulonga.
Nompula Mndewa yamuwonele ubazi muna isiku ya uhelelo! Na weye kovimanya vinogile ng'hani mbuli ziya zose zoyanitendele Onesifolo uko Efeso.

Wanhu wengi wezazisondelela nzila zawo za ugoni, na kwa ichimu icho wanhu wezailiga nzila ya kweli.

Yesu viyaonile ivo, kehilwa, kawalongela wanahina wake, “Walekeni wana wadoododo weze kumwangu, sekemuwagome kwaviya Ufalume wa Mulungu ni wa wanhu fana wana wano.
Ngalawa ifika hanhu heli na nzila mbili za mazi ya bahali, ngalawa ikwama. Hanhu haulongozi ha imeli hakala hadidimile muna umsanga haidahile bule kusegela, na kuchisogo kwandusa kubeneka kwa ichimu cha ludabwa lwa mawingu.

Bumbila da wahuwila wakala na magesa yamwe na moyo umwe. Habule hata imwe yalongile chino cha miyangu hebu chino changu, mbali wose waigolela chila chinhu.

Si niye mwenyewo bule yonivitendile vinhu vino vose?’ ”

Walawilila walotezi wa uvwizi hagati ya wanhu, na ivo wafundiza wa uvwizi wezalawilila kumwenu. Wawo wezamfundizani mafundizo ya uvwizi yoyogala kunangigwa na kumulema Mndewa yoyawakombole, na kwa kutenda ivo wezaigalila kwa kusinhukiza madanganizi wawo wenyewo.

Mbali munhu mwene ludabwa kumfosa yeye yaheza kumtowa, kezamuhoka silaha zake zose zoyakalile kozihuwila, na kusola vinhu vake.
Mbali niye nowalongela, ‘Sekemwiilahe kwa ulanga, kwaviya icho ni chigoda cha chifalume cha Mulungu,’
Nihita uko kwaviya Mulungu kanigubulila ivo. Uko viniiting'hane na walangulizi, niwalongela usenga wa Mbuli Inogile yoniwapetele wanhu weli siyo Wayahudi. Nitenda ivo muladi sang'hano yangu yoniisang'hane na ija yonigendelela kuisang'hana, sekeiwe bule.
Mbali ndiya haidaha kuchigala habehi na Mulungu. Ivo chahaleka kuja hachihungukilwa na chinhu, na chahaja hachongezekeligwa na chinhu.

Mafalisayo wahulika lung'husesa wonyong'onya mbuli za Yesu. Ivo wawo na wakulu wa nhambiko wawatuma wakalizi wa kaye ya Kutosela wangwile Yesu.

Ivo Yohana kahita chila hanhu habehi na lwanda lwa Yolodani. Kawapetela wanhu, “Lekeni uhasanyi wenu, mubatizigwe, na Mulungu kezawasegezela uhasanyi wenu.”
Nhondo zizalagala kulawa kuulanga, na ludabwa wa kuulanga wizatingisigwa.
Toseni kwa Mulungu lusita lose.
Kwaviya bung'hulo dogala unovu na kunogeza haulongozi ha Mulungu na ukweli.
Kwaviya Mndewa mwenyewo kezehumuluka kulawa kuulanga hamwe na lukemo na dizi da Msenga wa Mulungu imkulu na mhalati ya Mulungu nawo wadanganike muna Ichilisito wezakuwa wa mwanduso kuzilibuka.
Kamulava muna uzidilwa wake wose. Yosefu viyalawilile yang'hali kulawilila mfalume wa Misili, Mulungu kamwing'ha nzewele na ubala haulongozi ha mfalume wa Misili, nayo kamtenda yawe mtawala wa Misili na kaye yake yose.
Muinyendenyende haulongozi ha Mulungu yeli na ludabwa, nayo kezamwinulani lusita lufaya.
Vichifikile isi ya Loma, Paulo kalekeleligwa kukala yaidumwe na mkalizi imwe wa kumkaliza.
Bahobaho Yesu kagolosa mkono wake, kamwamha, kamulongela, “Weye mwene uhuwilo ndodo, habali muna mashaka?”

Na sambi waja wehi wangu, waja hawanilonda niwe mfalume, wagaleni hano muwakome haulongozi wangu!’ ”
Wanhu wose waja na weguta. Maabaho wanahina wayadondoleza yamasigavu na wamemeza vigelo saba.

Kwa ubanzi umwe hanhu ha longo hohokiligwa na wanhu hawakala siku zose, na ubanzi umwenga hohokiligwa na ija yochimulonga yang'hali mgima.

Yesu viyamuwonile, kamtanga, kamulongela, “Mama, kuhonyigwa utamu wako!”

Wakala woilongela mbuli za vinhu vose vovilawilile.

Mgati mwa bumbila da wahuwila wa Chilisito da Antiyokiya kukala na walotezi wa Mulungu na wafundiza, nawo wakala Balinaba, na Saimoni yoyatangigwe Mtitu, na Lukiyo yolawila Chilene, na Sauli, na Manaeni yoyaleligwe na Helode.

Muna Isiku ya Mhumulo dimwenga, Yesu kahita kufundiza wanhu mwiikaye ya kutosela. Muja mgati mwiikaye ya kutosela mukala na munhu yakalile kaholola mkono wa kulume.
Walondwa wangu, sekemumuhuwile chila munhu yoyolonga kolongozigwa na Muhe wa Mulungu, mbali mgezeni muladi muwone fana munhu iyo kolongozigwa na Muhe wa Mulungu, kwaviya walotezi wa uvwizi wengi wabaho mvunyo muna izisi zose.

Echitabho cho luganda lwa Yesu Kristo omwana wa Daudi omwana wa
Ibrahimu; Ibrahimu aliga esemwene Isaka na Isaka esemwene Yakobo na Yakobo alisemwene Yuda na bhamula bhabho.
Yuda aliga ali esemwene Peresi na Sera ku Tamari Peresi ali esemwene waHezroni na Hezroni ali esemwene wa Ramu,
Ramu aliga ali semwene Aminadabu. Aminadabu alisemwene Nashoni. Nashoni alisemwene Salimoni.
Salimoni alisemwene wa Boazi ku Rahabu, Bohazi alisemwene wa Obedi ku Ruth, Obedi alisemwene Yese.
Yese alisemwene omkama Daudi. Daudi aliga alisemwene Selemani ku mugasi wa Huria.
. Sulemani aliga alisemwene Rehoboamu, Rehobohamu alisemwene wa Abiya, Abiya alisemwene wa Asa.
Asa aliga alisemwene wa Yehoshafati, Yehoshafati alisemwene wa Yoramu, na Yoramu alisemwene wa Uzia.
Uzia aliga alisemwene wa Yothamu, Yothamu alisemwene wa Ahazi, Ahazi alisemwene wa Hezekia.
Hezekia aliga alisemwene wa Manase, Manase alisemwene wa Amoni na Amoni alisemwene Yosia
Yosia aligaesemwene Yekonia na bhamula bhabho omwanya gunu bhagegelwe okusilwa Babeli.
Omwanya gunu bhaliga bhamalile ogegwa okuja Babeli, Yekonia aliga alisemwene Shatieri, Shatieri aliga ali jaji wabhona Zelubabeli.
Zerubabeli aliga alisemwene Abiudi, Abiudi alisemwene wa Eliakimu, na Eliakimu ali semwene wa Azori.
Azori aliga alisemwene Zadoki, Zadoki alisemwene Akimu, na Akimu alisemwene Eliudi.
Eliudi aliga alisemwene Elieza, Elieza ali esemwene Matani na Matani alisemwene Yakobo.
Yakobo aliga alisemwene Yusufu omulume wa Mariamu unu kusoka kumwene Yesu ebhuhye unu katogwa Kristo.
Jinyibhulo jona okusoka ku Ibrahimu okukinga ku Daudi jaliga nyibhulo ekumi nena, okusoka ku Daudi okukinga okugegwa okuja Babeli ni nyibhulo ekumi nena, no kusoka anu bhagegibhwe okuja Babeli okukinga ku Kristo ni nyibhulo ekumi nena.
Okwibhulwa kwa Yesu Kristo kwaliga kulikutya, nyila wae, Mariamu aliga nasandwa na Yusufu, akatungu bhachali kubhonana chi mubhili nabhonekana ati alinainda kubhutulo bhwo mwoyo mwelu.
Omulume wae Yusufu aliga munu mulengelesi atendele kumuswasha abhwelu. Alamuye okubhusiga obhuko obhwo kwo bhwitebhe.
Anu aliga acheganilisha ingulu ya magambo ago, Maraika wa Nyamuanga namubhonekela mu chiloto naika, Yusufu mwende Daudi utajakubhaya okumugega Mariamu kuti mugasi wao kulwokubha inda inu alinayo ni kulwo bhuturo bhwo Mwoyo mweru.
Kaja okwibhula omwana we chilume umubhilikile lisina lyae Yesu, kulwokubha niwe kaja okubhachungula abhanu bhae ne bhibhibhi byebwe
Gona ganu gasokana okukumisha jinu jaikilwe na Nyamuanga ku njila yo mulagi naika,
Lola omuyala aligega inda no kwibhula omwana mulume na bhalimubhilikila lisina lyae Imanuel insonga yendemo Nyamuanga amwi neswe.
Yusufu emukile okusoka muntilo nakola kutyo Malaika wa Nyamuanga kutyo amulagilie na amugegele kuti mugasi wae.
Kulwejo nolo jabhee kutyo atamamile nage katungu kone okukinga ao ebhulie omwana we chilume namubhilikila lisina lyae Yesu.
Ejile Yesu amala okwibhulwa mu chalo cha Bethelehemu yo Bhuyahudi mukatungu ko bhukama bwa Herode, abhanu bhengeso okusoka ebhutuluka ya kula bhakingile Yerusalemi nibhaika,
Alyaki omwene unu ebhulwa omkama wa Bhayahudi? Chamailola injota yae ebhutuluka eswe ona chaja okumlamya.
Akatungu kanu omkama Herode onguhye amagambo ago nasulumbala na Yerusalemu yona amwi nage.
Herode nabhakumanya abhakulu bha bhagabhisi bhona na bhandiki bha bhanu, omwene nabhabhusha Kristo kebhulwa aki?
Nibhamubhwila mu Bethelemu yo bhuyahudi, kulwokubha kutyo nikwo jandikilwe no mulagi,
Awe betelehemu mu chalo cha Yuda utali mutyali amwi mu bhatangasha bha Yuda kwokubha okusoka kwawe kaja okuja omutangasha unu kaja okubhatangasha abhanu bhani Israel.”
Kulwejo Herode nabhabhilikila bhalia abhengeso kulwobhwitebhe no kubhabhusha ni mwanyaki injota yaliga nibhonekana

Bhejile bhamtegelesha omkama, bhagendelee no lugendo lwebhwe, na injota eyo inu bhaliga bhalolele ebhutuluka yabhatangatie nikinga niimelegulu ingulu yo lubhala lunu omwana aligaebhuhye.
Omwanya gunu bhailole injota bhakondelewe ekondelelwa enene muno.
Bhengie munyumba nibhamulola omwana unu ebhuyhwe na Mariamu nanyila mwene. Bhamwifukamie no kumulamhya. Bhasulumue emigemu jebhwe no kumusosisha ebhiyanwa bya jijaabhu, obhuvumba, na manemane.
Nyamuanga abhaganyishe mu chiloto bhasige osubha ku Herode, Kulwejo bhemukile okusubha mu chalo chebhwe bhalabhile injila indi.
Akatungu kanu bhemukile, Malaika wa Nyamuanga namusokela Yusufu mu chiloto naikati, Imuka umugege omwana nanyilamwene mubhilimile Misri. Musigaleyo okukinganu nakabhabwilile kulwokubha Herode kaja okumuyenja omwana koleleki amusingalishe.
Ingetaheyo Yusufu emukile no kumugega omwana na nyilamwene nokubhilimilaMisri.

Yesu agendele kumala Galilaya yona neigisha mumasomelo gebhwe, neigisha emisango jo bhukama na naosha bhuli bhulwae agati ya bhanu.
Emisango jae jaswilile Siliya yona na bhanu nibhabhaleta kumwene bhanu bhaliga na malwae ga bhulimbaga no bhusasi, bhanu bhaliga na masambwa na bhalilalu na bhanu bhaliga bhalemae. Yesu abhaosishe.
Bhanu bhamfu bhamulubhilie okusoka Galilaya, na Dekapoli, na Yelusalemu na Uyaudi no kusoka kungego ya Yolodani
Yesu ejile alola chise cha bhanu bhafu, nalibhata okugenda mwibhanga. Anu aliga enyanjile ansi, abheigisibhwa bhae nibhamujako.
Nafumbula omunwa gwae nabheigisha naikati,
“Bhana libhando bhanu bhali bhataka bho mwoyo kulwokubha obhukama bhwa mulwile ni bhwebhwe.
Bhana libhando bhanu bhali no bhusulumbaye, kulwokubha abhaja okusilisibhwa.
Bhana libhando bhanu bhali bhafula, kulwokubha abhaja okulya omwandu gwe chalo.
Bhana libhando bhanu bhali no mweko no bhwila bhwe chimali, kulwokubha abhaja okwigusibhwa.
Bhana libhando bhanu bhali ne chigongo kulwokubha abho abhaja okubhona echigongo.
Bhana libhando bhanu bhali ne mioyo ja kisi kulwokubha abhaja okumulola Nyamuanga.
Bhana libhando bhanu bhalibhagwatanisha kulwokubha abho abhaja okubhilikilwa bhana bha Nyamuanga.
Bhana libhando bhanu abhanyasibhwa ku chimali, kulwokubha obhukama bha mulwile ni bhwebhwe.
Muna libhando emwe bhanu omufumwa no kunyasibhwa, no kubhaika bhulibhubhibhi ingulu yemwe kwo lubheyi ingulu yani.
Mukondelelwe no kusandabha kulwokubha omuyelo gwemwe ni munene ingulu mukwile. Kulwokubha nikwo kutyo abhanu bhabhanyasishe abhalagi bhanu bhekae inyuma yemwe.
Emwe ni munyu gwe chalo. Tali omunyu gukabhusha obhunule bhago, eikolekanaatiki okukola omunyu gundi gwa kisi? Payi itakubha lindi ya kisi kulwe chinu chonachona chindi, talini kweshwa anja nokulibhatwa na magulu ga bhanu.
Emwe ni bhwelu bhwe chalo. Omusi gunu gumbakilwe ku chima gutakwiseleka.
Kulwokubha abhanu bhatakukongesha olumuli nokuluta emwalo ye chikapo, tali ku nengo, neibhamulikila bhona bhanu bhali munyumba.
Musige obhwelu bhwemwe bhumulike imbele ya bhanu koleleki abhanu bhabhilole ebhikolwa bhyemwe ebhyakisi no kumulamhya Lata Bhugenyi unu ali mulwile.
Mutaja kwitogelati nijile okuinyamula ishelia na bhalagi. Nitejile kunyamula tali okukumisha.
Kulwechimali enibhabhwilati okukinga insi ne chalo okulabhao italio egambo amwi etone limwi lya ishelia eisosibhwao amwi ya jishelia okukingao bhuli chinu chilabha chikumisibhwe.
Kulwejo onaona unu katasha chilagilo chitilu kubhilagilo bhinu no kubheigisha abhandi okukola kutyo kabhilikilwa mulela mu bhukama bhwa mulwile. Tali unu onaona unu kajigwata no kwiigisha kabhilikilwa mukulu mubhukama bhwa mulwile.
Kulwokubha enibhabhwila obhulengelesi bhwemwe bhukalema okila obhulengelesi bhwa bhandiki na mafalisayo kulwejo mutakwingila mu bhukama bha mulwile.
Mwonguhye na jandikilwe kala ati,”utaja kwita na onaona unu keta ali muntambala ya indamu.'
Tali enibhabhwila oneone unu kamwiganilisha kubhibhi owabho ali muntambala ya indamu. Na unu kamubhwila owabho ati,'awe uli munu unu uteile,'kabha ali mundamu ye chinyanjo. Na onaona unu kaika ati,'Mumumu awe'kabha ali muntambala yo mulilo gwa kajanende.
Kulwejo labha ousosha echitambo chao kuchitambilo na wichuke ati labha mumula wanyu ali na ligambo nawe,
Nusige echiyanwa chao kuchigabhilo na umulubhe, mungwane kwamba nowanyu oyo, na ukamala uje niwo usoshe echiyanwa chao.
Yungwana no musoko wao bhwangu, uli amwi nage munjila nimugenda mwibhalaja, labha jitalikutyo omusoko wao katula okukusiga mumabhoko go mulamusi, no mulamusi akusige mumabhoko go musilikale, no weswa mulunyolo.
Mwikilishe enibhabhwila ati, uli utakutesulilwa okukinga anu ulaliila jimpilya jona jinu outongwa.
Mwonguywe jaikilwe ati, utabhamulomesi.
'Tali enibhabhwilati oneone unu kamulola omugasi no kumuligila amalile kumulomela mumwoyo gwae.
Nalabha eliso lyao elyobhulyo elikola nuwikujula, lisoshemo na ulyese kula nawe. Kulwokubha jikwiile akili echiungo chimwi kumubhili gwao chinyamke kuliko mubhili gwona okweswa mu jehanamu.
Nalabha okubhoko kwao okwebhulyo okukola wikujule, kuteme naukwese kula nawe. Kulwokubha akili echiungo chimwi chinyamke kuliko mubhili gwona okweswa mu jehanamu.
Jilomelwe ona, onaona unu kamubhilimya omugasi wae, na amuyane na inyalubha yo bhutagani.
Tali anye enibhabhila onaona unu kamusiga omugasi wae, jitabhee ku nsonga yo bhulomesi, kamukola mulomesi. Na unu ona kamtwala ayanibhwe inyalubha yo bhutagani ona kakola obhulomesi.
Nalindi munguhye yaikilwe ku bhakala,'Mtaja kulaila kwo lubheyi, tali musile okulaila kwemwe ku Lata Bhugenyi.
Tali enibhabhwila ati, musige okulaila nakatyali, kulwo lwile, kulwokubha ni kusho lya Nyamuanga.
Uli hata kulwe chalo, kulwokubha niwo owokuta echitebhe cho kutajila ebhigele bhyae, Uli hata ku jelusalemi, kulwokubha ni musi gwo mukama mukulu
Uli utalaila ku lwo mutwe gwao, kulwokubha utakutula kukola lufwili lumwi kubha lwelu na kubha lwilafulu.
Tali amagambo gemwe gabhe,'Chimali, chimali, Payi, payi.'kulwokubha ganu agakilao agasoka ku mujabhi.
Mwonguhywe jaikilwe kutya,'eliso kwe liso, ne lino kwe lino.'
Tali anye enibhabhwila mutajakubhambashanya no munu mujabhi, tali omunu akakubhuma litama lyo bhulyo muindulile nelindi ona.
Na onaona unu kenda okugenda nawe mwibhalaja nanakutesha inkanju yao, musigile ne chifwalo chindi.
Na unu kakusinyilisha okulibhata nage maili imwi, genda nage maili ebhili.
Na kuonaona unu kakusabhwa muyane, na utajakumwitebha oneone unu kaja okuyenja libhanja.
Mwonguhwe jaikilwe,'Numwende omutulanwa wao, na umujilile lisungu omusoko.'
Tali enibhabhwila ati, Mubhende abhasoko bhemwe, mubhasabhilwe bhanu abhabhajimya,
Koleleki mubhe bhana bhe somwana wa mulwile. Kulwo kubha kakola lisubha libhakile abhabhibhi na abhekisi, na kabhagwisisha ingubha abhabhibhi na abhekisi.
Kulwokubha mukabhenda bhanu abhabhenda emwe omubhona muyeloki? Angu abhalipisha bho bhushulu bhatakukolejo?
Na mukabhakesha abhaili bhemwe ela omubhonaki ku bhandi? Angu abhanyamahanga bhatakukola kutyo?
Kulwejo jibheile mubhe bhalengelesi leave kutyo lata bhugenyi wa mulwile ali mulengelesi
Ulechukaga okulema okukola amagambo go bhulengelesi mumeso ga bhanu koleleki wiyoleshe, kulwokubha utakuja kubhona omuyelo okusoka ku lata bhugenyi unu ali mulwile.
Kulwejo ulasoshaga utaja kubhuma ingombi no kwikuya awe omwene lwakutyo bhali bhanu bhatali bhalengelesi kutyo abhakola mu masomelo na mubhijiji, koleleki abhanu bhabhakuye. Echimali enibhabhwila, bhamalile kubhona omuyelo gwebhwe.
Tali awe ukasosha, okubhoko kwao okwebhumosi kutajakumenya jinu jakolwa no kubhoko kwe bhulyo,
Koleleki echiyanwa chao chisosibhwe kwo bhitebhe. Ao niho lata Bhugenyi wao unu kalola mubhwitebhe kakuyana omuyelo gwao.
Na anu ulabhaga nusabhwa utajakubha lwa bhanu bhanu bhatalibhalengelesi, kulwokubha abhenda okwimelegulu no kusabhwa mumasomelo na mumbala je bhijiji, koleleki abhanu bhabhalole. Echimali enibhabhila, bhamalile kubhona omuyelo gwebhwe.
Tali awe, anu ousabhwa, ingila esiko. Igala omulyango, na usabhwe kulatabhugenyi wao unu kalola mubhitebhe kakuyana omuyelo gwao.
Nanu ulabhaga nusabhwa, utajakusubhilila subhilila amagamboganu gatali na nsonga lwa kutyo abhanyamahanga abhakola, kulwokubha abheganilishati abhategelesibhwa kulwa magambo mafu ganu abhaika.
Kulwejo, utaja kubha lwabho, kulwokubha lata Bhugenyi wao kamenya obhukene bhwao anu oubhauchali kusabhwa kumwenene.
Kulwejo sabha kutya: Lata Bhugenyi unu uli mulwile, likusibhwe lisina lyao.
Obhukama bhao bhuje, obhiganilisha bhwao bhukolekane anu muchalo lwa kutyo obhukolekana mulwile
Uchiyane lelo libhona lyeswe elya bhuli lunaku.
Uchisasile ebhikolwa bheswe lwa kutyo osona echibhafwilwa chigongo bhanu bhachikayiye.
Utaja kuchita mumalegejo tali uchichungule okusoka ku musoko.
Mkabha mubhasasila abhanu ebhibhibhi byebhwe, Lata bhugenyi wao unu ali mulwile ona kakufwila chigongo emwona.
Tali mukalema okubhafwila chigongo ebhibhibhi bhyebhwe, Lata Bhugenyi wemwe ona atabhafwila chigongo ebhibhibhi bhyemwe.
Ingulu yago gona, ukabha usibhile, utaja kwolesha obhusu bhwo bhujubhe lwa kutyo bhanu bhatali bhalengelesi, kulwokubha abhasisinyala obhusu bhwebhwe koleleki abhanu bhabhamenye kutyo bhasibhile. Echimali enikubhwila bhamalile kubhona omuyelo gwebhwe.
Tali awe, ukabha usibhile, ibhambaga amafuta mumutwe gwao na woshe obhusu bhwao.
Kulwejo itakwolesha mubhanu ati usibhile, tali eibha ili Kulata Bhugenyi wao unu ali mubhwimbise. Na Lata Bhugenyi wao unu kalola mubhitebhe, kakuyana omuyelo gwao.
Utaja kwibhikila ebhiyanwa bhyao awe omwenekuchalo anu jili jimfufuji no bhutaletale ebhinyamula, anu abhefi abhabhutula no kwibha.
Kulwejo awe, wibhikile ebhiyanwa bhyao mulwile, anu jitakutula kubhao mfufuji no bhutaletale bhinu ebhinyamula, nanu bhefi bhatakutula kubhutulano kwibha.
Kulwokubha anu bhili ebhiyanwa bhyao, nio no mwoyo gwao ogubha ona.
Eliso ni lumuli lwo mubhili. Kulwejo eliso lyao likabha lilianga, omubhili gwona ogwijushwa no bhwelu.
Tali eliso lyao likabha linyamkile, omubhili gwao gwona gwijue chisute chinene. Kulwejo, ikabha obhwelu bhunu bhuli munda yao ni chisute muno, ni chisute chinene ndengoki.
Atalio no oumwi na katyali unu katula okubhakolela bhesebhugenyi bhabhili, Kulwokubha kaja okumlema oumwi no kumwenda oumwi, na labha jitali kutyo kaja okwisosha ku umwi no kumugaya oundi. Mutakutula okumukolela Nyamuanga ne bhinu
Kulwejo enikubhila, utaja kubha no kwitimata ingulu yo bhulame bhao, ati ouja okulyaki amwi ouja okunywaki, au ingulu yo mubhili gwao, oufwalaki. Mbe obhulame bhutakile ebhilyo no mubhili bhutakilile emyenda?
Nulole jinyonyi jinu jili mulutumba. Bhatakuyamba na bhatakugesana bhatakukumanya no kubhika mubhitala, tali LataBhugenyi wemwe unu ali mulwile kabhalisha abho. Mbe emwe mutali bhechibhalo okukila abho?
Niga umwi mwimwe kulwokwinyashanyasha katula okwiyongesha chita chimwi ingulu yobhulame bhae?
Ni kulwaki muli nokwitimata ingulu ye bhifwalo? Iganilisha ingulu yo bhwaso mu mashamba, kutyo agakula. Gatakukola milimu nagatakutula kwifyafya.
Nalindi enibhabhwila, nolo Selemani mwikushyo lyae lyona atafwafwibhwe lwe limwi lyendeko.
Ikabha Nyamuanga nagafwafya amabhabhi mu mashamba, ganu agalama lusiku lumwin na mwejo nigesibhwa mumulilo, Mbe nikwabhutuloki kabhafwafya emwe, emwe abhobhikilisha bhutoto?
Kulwejo musige kubha no bhiganilisha nokwaika, Mbe echilyaki? mbe echinywaki? mbe nalindi echifwalaki?”
Kulwokubha abhanyamaanga abhaiga amagambo ago, Lata Bhugenyi wemwe owamulwile kamenya kutyo omwenda ebyo byona.
Tali okwamba muyenje obhukama bhwae no bhulengelesi bhwae na gonagona ouyanibhwa.
Kulwejo, utaja kwitimata ingulu ya mutondo, kulwokubha mutondo einyakilila eyene. Bhuli lunaku lwiile okubha nebhibhibhi bhyalo olwene.
Utajakulamula, koleleki awona utajakulamulwa.
Kwa indamu inu oulamula, aona ouja okulamulwa. Na kwaindengo inu oulengelamo awona ouja okulengelwa omwo.
Nikulwaki oulola akakongokela kaliti kanu kalimuliso lyowanyu, Tali utakumenya liti linu lilimuliso lyao?
Outulatiki okwaika kuwanyu, siga nikusoshyemo akakongokela kanu kali muliso lyao, omwanya ogwo uli na liti muliso lyao?
Mubheyi awe, yamba usoshyemo liti linu lilimuliso lyao, na nio ouja okulola kisi nokumusoshyamo owanyu akakongokela kanu kalimuliso lyowanyu.
Utajiana jimbwa chinu chili cha kisi, na utaja kujisanusisha jingulubhe jilulu imbele yajo. Kulwokubha abhaja okubhinyamula no kubhitaja mubhigele bhyajo, na lindi abhaja okukuindukila awe nokukutabhula tabhula masinja masinja.
Sabhwa, ona ouyanibhwa. Iga, ona oubhona. Konona, ona oujaokwigulilwa.
Kuonawona unu kasabhwa, kayanwa. Kuwonawona unu kaiga, kabhona. Nakumunu unu kakonona, kulwigi kegulilwa.
Angu aliwo oumwi mwimwe unu omwana wae akamusabhwa echibhutu cho mukate kamuyana libhuyi?
Angu akamusabhwa inswi, kamuyana injoka?
Kulwejo, ikabha emwe abhajabhi omumenya okubhayana abhana bhemwe ebhiyanwa bhyakisi, Angu nibhutuloki bhunu Lata Bhugenyi wa mulwile kabhayana bhinu bhya kisi bhanu abhamusabhwa omwene?
Kwainsonga eyo, anu owenda okolelwa chinu chonachona na bhanu bhandi aona jikwiile okubhakolela kutyo abhandi bhona, kulwokubhaeyo ni sheliya na bhalagi.
Mwingile okulabhila omulyango omufunde. Kulwokubha omulyango omunene na injila ni nene inu eitangasha mubhunyamuke, bhanu bhafu abhalabha kunjileyo.
Omulyango ni mufunde, Omulyango omufunde ni njila inu eitangasha mubhuanga na nibhanu bhatyali bhanu abhatula oilola.
Mwikenge na bhalagi bho lubheyi, abhaja bhafwae olwayi lwa inyabhalega, tali ni ntyanyi ndulu.
Kulwamatwasho gebhwe omuja okubhamenya. Angu abhanu abhatula okugesa amatwasho kumawa, na lindi kubhiyabwa bhya mbaluti?
Kwo lususo olwo, kileti lye kisi elibhula matwasho gakisi, tali liti libhibhi elibhula matwasho mabhibhi.
Liti lyekisi litakutula kutwasha matwasho mabhibhi, na kutyo liti libhibhi litakutula kwibhula matwasho gakisi.
Bhuliti linu litakwibhula matwasho gakisi elitemwa nokweswa mumulilo.
Kulwejo oli, oujaokubhamenya okusokana na matwasho gabho.
Atali bhuli munu unu kabwila anye, Ratabhugenyi, Ratabhugenyi, kengila mubhukama bhwa mulwile, tali ni uliya kakola obhulengelesi bhwa Ratabhugenyi wani unu alimulwile.
Bhanu bhamfu bhalibwila olusiku olwo, Ratabhugenyi, Ratabhugenyi, chitasosishe obhulagi kwi sina lyao, chitasosisheko amasabwa kwisina lyao, na kwalisina lyao chakolele bhikolwa byamfu bya kulugusha?
Niwo enibhabhwila echimali, 'nitabhamenya emwe. Musoke kwanye, bhanu omukola obhunyamuke'.
Kulwejo, bhuli umwi unu kongwa emisango jani nokwikilisha kasusana nomunu omwengeso unu ombakile inyumba yae ingulu ya litale.
Ingubha nigwa, amanji nigejula, nomuyaga niguja niguibhuma inyumba eyo, tali itatulile kugwa ansi, kulwokubha aliga yumbakilwe ingulu ya litale.
Tali bhuli munu unu kongwa omusango gwani nalema okugwikilisha, kasusanisibhwa no munu omumumu unu ombakile inyumba yae ingulu yo musenyi
Ingubha niija, amanji nigaja, nomuyaga niguja niguibhuma inyumba eyo. Nigwa, nobhunyamke bhwayo nibhubhonekana.”
Gwamalile okulabhao omwanya gunu Yesu amalile okuloma emisango ejo, amekofyanya nigalugula ameigishyo gae,
Kulwokubha eigisishe kuti munu wobhutulo, na atabhee lwa bhandiki bhebhwe.
Mukatungu kanu Yesu ansi okusoka muchima, liijo enene lyamulubhile.
Lola, omugenge ejile no kulamya imbele yae, naikati, “Rata Bhugenyi”, labha umaliliye outula okunkola nibhe mwelu”
. Yesu nagolola okubhoko kwae namukunyako, naikati, “Nimaliliye. Nubhe mwelu.”Ao so aosibhwe obhugenge bhwae.
Yesu namubhwila ati, “Lola utabhwila munu wonawona. Gwata injila yao, wiyoleshe awe omwene ku mugabhisi nausoshe echiyanwa chinu Musa alagilie, kwo bhubhambasi bhwao.”
Mumwanya gunu Yesu akingile Kapelanaumu, Omukulu wa bhasilikale naja kwae,
namubhusha ati,”Rata Bhugenyi, omukosi wani amamile ewani afuye omubhili na ali no bhusasi bhwokulugusha.”
Yesu namubhwila ati, “Enija okumuosha.”
Omukulu wa bhasilikale namusubhya naikati,”Rata Bhugenyi, anye ntana chibhalo okukinga awe wingile munyumba yani, yaikale omusango omukosi wani keulila.
Kulwokubha anyone ni munu unu nilinamanaga, Nikaika kuunu “Genda kagenda, na kuundi 'Ija'omwene kaja, na kumukosi wani,'Kola kutyo,' no omwene kakola kutyo”
Omwanya gunu Yesu ejile ongwa ago, alugusibhwe nabhabhwila bhanu bhaliga nibhamulubha,”Echimali enibhabhwila ati, Nchali kulola omunu welikisha lwaunu mu Israeli.
Enibhabhwila ati, abhamfu bhalija okusoka mubhutuluka na mubhugwa, bhalinyanja amwi na Ibulaimu, Isaka, na Yakobo, mubhukama bhwa mulwile.
Tali abhana bho bhukama bhalyeshwa muchisute cha anja, any chilibha echililo no kuguguna ameno.
“Yesu namubhwila Omukulu wa bhasilikale,”Genda! lwakutyo wamalile okwikilisha, na jikolekane kutyo kwawe.”Nomukosi wao eulisibhwa omwanya ogwo ogwo.
Mukatungu Yesu nakinga munyumba ya Petero, namulola nyabhuko wa Petero amamile Ali mulwae wo muswija.
Yesu namukunyako okubhoko kwae, no muswija nigumuwako. nemuka namba okumufulubhendela.
Yejile yakinga kegolo, bhanu bhamfu nibhamulasa Yesu bhanu bhaliga nibhanyansibhwa na masabwa. Nagabhilimya amasabwa na bhanu bhaliga bhalwae nabheulisha.
Kulwejo kutiyo jakumiye jinu jaikilwe na Isaya omulagi,”Omwene ejile okugega amalwae geswe no bhulenga bhweswe obhechinyamwoyo.
Ejile Yesu alola elikofyanya limwiindileko, nasosha obhwisombolo bhwa kuja olubhala olundi olwainyanja ya Galilaya.
Neya omwandiki namujako namubhwila ati,”Mwiigisha, enikulubha wonawona anu ulaja.”
Yesu namubhwila ati,”Bhinyabhugana bhina amobho, na jinyonyi ja mulutumba jina masuli, nawe Omwana wa Adamu atana wakumamya mutwe gwae.”
Omwiigisibhwa oundi namubhwila ati, “Rata Bhugenyi, nyikilisisha okwamba nije okumusika lata wani.
“Nawe Yesu namubhwila ati,”Ndubha, ubhasige abhafu bhasike abhafu bhebhwe.”
Yesu ejile engila mubhwato, abheigisibhwa bhae nibhamulubha mubhwato.
Lola, nigwiula omuyaga ingulu ya inyanja, nobhwato nibhufundikilwa na makonjo. Nawe Yesu aliga amamile.
Abheigisibhwa nibhaja kumwene nibhamwimusha nibhaikati, “Ratabhugenyi, chikishe eswe, echilebhelela okufwa!”
Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “kulwaki omubhaya, emwe abhelikisha etilu?” Nio nemuka nagugonya omuyaga na inyanja. Ndiya ndibha etole enene,
Abhalume nibhagwatwa ne chiobho nibhaikati, “Omunu unu alikutiki, nolo omuyaga na inyanja ebhimungwa omwene?”
Omwanya gunu Yesu aliga ejile olubhala olundi lwe chalo cha Magadala, bhalume bhabhili bhanu bhaliga nibhatangasibhwa na masabwa nibhabhugangana nage. Bhaliga nibhasoka mumakabhuli na bhaliga nibhakola inyogele muno, indengo ati aliga achachalio unu atula kunjila eyo.
Lola, nibhasekana nibhaikati, “Chinaki echokukola kwawe, Mwana wa Nyamuanga? Wijilanu okuchinyashya omwanya gwese guchali kukinga?”
Awo lyaliga lilio liijo enene elyajingulubhe nililebhwa, Ali Atali kula nanu bhaliga bhali, amasabwa
nigagendelela okumusabhwa Yesu nigaikati. “Ukachilamula okusokako, chisile mwiijo lya jingulubhe.”
Yesu nabhabhwila ati,“Mugende!”Amasabwa nigasokako nigaja kungulubhwe. Lola, liijo lyona ndyolomoka okusoka muchima okutebhela munyanja na lyona ndifwila mumanji omwo.
Abhalume bhanu bhaliga nibhalebha jingulubhe nibhabhilima. Bhejile bhaja mumusi nibholesha bhuli chinu chinu chabhonekana, ingulu ya jinu jabhona Abhalume bhanu bhaliga bhali na masabwa.
Lola, omusi gwona niguja okubhonana na Yesu. Bhejile bhamulola, nibhamusabhwa asoke mumukowa gwebhwe.
Yesu nengila mubhwato, nambuka nakinga mumusi gunu ekalamoga.
Lola, nibhamuletela omunu unu aliga afuye omubhili amamibhwe kwigodolo. ejile alola elikisha lyebhwe, Yesu namubhwila omunu unu aliga afuye omubhili, “Mwana wani, ubhe na likondelelwa, Ebhibhibhi bhyao bhyeswalililwa”
Lola, Amwi ya bheigisha bhe bhilagilo nibhaikati abhene kwa bhene, “Omunu unu kafuma”
Yesu namenya obhiganilisha bhwebhwe naikati,”Kulwaki omwiganilisha amabhibhi mumyoyo jemwe?
Nichinuki chinu chili changu okwaikati, “Ebhibhibhi bhyao bhyeswalililwa' angu okwaikati,' Imelegulu ulibhate?
Nawe mumenye ati, Omwana wa Adamu ali no bhutulo obhokusasila ebhibhibhi...”aikile ago kuunu aliga afuye omubhili, imelegulu, gega ligodolo lyao, ugende ika ewao”
Niwo omunu uliya nemelegulu nagenda mumusi gwae.
Elikofyanya lyejile lyalola ago, nibhalugulu nibhamulasa Nyamuanga, unu ambhayanile obhutulo obhwo abhanu.
Mbe Yesu ejile akalabhao okusoka ao, namulola omunu unu atogwaga Matayo, unu aliga enyanjile olubhaju lunu abhalipisha bho bhushulu. Namubhwila ati, “Ndubha anye” Nemelegulu namulubha.
Yesu ejile enyanja koleleki alye ebhilyo munyumba, nibhaja abhalipisha bho bhushulu bhamfu na bhajabhi nibhakobhela okulya amwi na Yesu na bheigisibhwa bhae.
Niwo Amafalisayo gejile olola kutyo, nibhabhakolela abheigisibhwa bhae ati, “Kulwaki omwiigisha wemwe kalya ebhilyo amwi na bhatobhesha bho bhushulu na bhanu bhajabhi?”
Yesu ejile ongwa ago, omwene naikati,”Abhanu bhanu bhali bhaanga bhatakwenda mulagusi, tali bhanu bhali bhalwae.
Jibheile Mugende mujokwiigila insonga yendemo, “Enenda echigongo na siyo chiyanwa” Kulwokubha nejile, ti kubhalengelesi okuta, tali kubhebhibhibhi.
Niwo abheigisibhwa bha Yowana nibhamujako nibhaikati, “Kulwaki eswe na mafalisayo echisibha, nawe abheigisibhwa bhao bhatakusibha?”
Yesu nabhabhwila ati, Enibhusha abhaelegesha bha mutwasi abhatula okujubha anu omutwasi kabha alinabho? Nawe jinsiku jilikinga anu Rata omutwasi aligegwa okusoka kwebhwe, niwo bhalisibha.
Atalio omunu unu kata echilepa cho mwenda omuyaya ku mwenda gwa kala, echilepa echitemuka okusoka ku mwenda na ngutemuka muno.
Bhatalio bhanu bhanu abhatula omuvinyo omuyaya muchinu echo muvinyo gwa kala, bhakechula nibhakola, olwai olutemuka, omuvinyo ogusokamo nolwai olunyamuka. Kulwejo, ogutulwa omuvinyo omuyaya mu lwai oluyaya na bhyona ebhibha bhianga.
Omwanya gunu Yesu abhabhwilaga emisango ejo, lola, omukulu umwi owemilimu naja nalamya imbele yae, Naikati, “Omuhansha wani kama okufwa woli anu, nawe ija uteko okubhoko kwao na kasubha okulola lindi,
Niwo Yesu Nemelegulu na mulubha na bheigisibhwa bhae ona.
Lola, omugasi unu aliga naulula amanyinga kwo mwanya gwa miyaka kumi ne bhili, naja yeyi na Yesu nakunyako olubhala lwo mwenda gwa Yesu.
Kulwokubha aikilati,”Labha ndakunyako omwenda gwae, any eniulila.”
Yesu nainduka namulola namubhwila ati, “Muyala, siga kufwa mwoyo, elikilisha lyao lyakukola wiulile,”No mwanya ogwo ogwo omugasi oyo neulisibhwa omwanya ogwo.
Yesu ejile akinga munyumba yo mukulu we milimu, abalolele abhabhumi bhwa jinkuli ne bhise bhya bhanu bhaliga nibhasekana.
Omwene naikati, “Musoke anu, kulwokubha omuyala unu achali kufwa, tali amamile. Nawe abhene nibhamuseka nokumugaya.
Na bhanu bhaulusibhwa anja, omwene nengila munda namugwata okubhoko omuyalakaji nemuka.
Emisango jinu nijikumuka mumusi gwona.
Niwo Yesu aliga nalabhao okusoka awo, bhalume bhabhili bhaofu nibhamulubha. Nibhasekana kwo bhulaka nibhaikati,”Echisabhwa uchifwile chigongo, Omwana wa Daudi.”
Akatungu kanu Yesu akingile mumusi, abhaofu bhaliya nibhamujako. Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Okwikilisha ati enitula okola?” Nibhamusubhyati “Nichimali, Ratabhugenyi”
Niwo Yesu nakunyako ameso gebhwe naikati,”Najikolekane kutyo kwimwe lwakutyo elikilisha lyemwe lili”
Ameso gebhwe ngegulwa. Niwo Yesu nabhakomelesha nabhalagilila naikati,”Mwiyangalile munu wona wona ataja kumenya omusango gunu.”
Tali abhanu bhanu bhabhili nibhagenda nibhalasha emisango jinu mbala jona ejomusi.
Niwo abhalume bhaliya bhabhili bhejile okugenda jebhwe, Lola, omunu umwi mutita unu aliga alinyilwe na masabwa nasilwa ku Yesu.
Amasabwa gejile omusokako, omunu oyo omutita namba okuloma. Liijo nililugula nilyaikati,”Jinu jichaliga kubhonekana mu Israeli.
Nawe Amafalisayo bhaliga nibhaikati,”Kubhakulu bha masabwa, kabhilimya amasabhwa”
Yesu nagenda mumisi na mubhijiji. Nagendelela okwiigisha mumekofyanyisho, nalasha echigambo cho bhukama, no kwiulisha amalwae ga bhuli mbaga nobhulenga bhwa bhuli mbaga.
Ejile alola ebhise bhya bhanu, nabhasasila, kulwokubha bhanyakile no kufwa mumyoyo. Bhaliga bhali kuti nyabhalega jinu jitana mulefi.
Nabhabhwila abheigisibhwa bhae.”Ebhigeswa ni bhyamfu, Tali abhakosi nibho abhatilu.
Kulwejo bhangu mumusabhwe Ratabhugenyi we bhigeswa, koleleki atume abhakosi mubhigeswa bhyae.”
Yesu nabhabhilikila abheigisibhwa bhae ekumi na bhabhili nabhayana obhutulo ingulu ya masabwa amachafu, okugagonya no kugabhilimya no kwiulisha bhuli mbaga jo bhunyoke na malwae ga bhuli mbaga.
Amasina ga jintumwa ekumi nebhili niganu. Elyokwamba Simeoni (unu katogwa lindi Petero), na Andelea mumula wabho, Yakobo omwana wa Jebhedayo, na Yowana omumula wabbho:
Philipo, na Balitolomayo, Thomaso, na Matayo omulipisha wo bhushulu, Yakobho omwana wa Alfayo, na Tadeo,
Simoni mkananayo, na Yuda iskariote, unu amuliliye iniku.
Bhanu ekumi na bhabhili Yesu abhatumile. Omwene abhalagiliye naikati, “Mtaja kugenda any bhekae abhanyamaanga na mutaja kwingila mumisi ja bhasamalia.
Tali Mugende ku nyabhalega jinu jibhulile ejamunyumba ya Isilaeli.
Nanu mulagendaga, mulashega mwaikati, obhukama bhwa mulwile bhwafogee.'
Mwiulishega abhalwae, musulule abhafuye, muhoshe abhebhigenge na mubhilimyega amasambwa. Mulamiye bhusa, musoshe bhusa.
Mutaja kugega jijahabhu, jialumasi nolo shaba mumifuko jemwe.
Mutaja kugega mufuko mulugendo lwemwe, nolo myenda jindi, ebhilato nolo nsimbo, kulwokubha omukosi jimwiile ebhilyo bhyae.
Mumusi gwona gwona nolo chijiji chinu mulajamo, muyenje unu engene mwiyanje ewae kukinga anu mulenda osubhayo.
Anu mulengila munyumba mukeshega, Ikabha inyumba iile, Omulembe gwemwe gusigale awo,
tali inyumba ikabha iteile, omulembe gwemwe musokewo nagwo.
Na bhanu bhalisiga okubhalamila emwe nokulema okutegelesha emisango jemwe, omwanya gunu omwimuka munyumba nolo mumusi ogwo, mwikukumule oluteli kubhigele bhyemwe ao.
Echimali enibhabhwila ati, ejibha jili ja nsonga okukila emisi ja Sodoma na Gomola olusiku lwa indamu kukila omusi ogwo
Mwangalile, enibhatuma kuti nyabhalega agati ye misege je mwila, kulwejo mubhe bhengeso lwa injoka na bhafula lwa inguti.
Mubhe bhengeso na bhanu, bhalibhasila mumabhalaja, na bhali bhabhuma mumasomelo.
Na muliletwa imbele ya bhakulu na bhakama kulwa lisina lyani, kuti bhubhambasi kubhene na kubhanu bha bhanyamahanga.
Omwanya gunu bhalabhabheelesha, mutaja kwitimata nikutiki amwi nichinuki chinu mulaloma, kulwokubha echinu chokuloma omuyanwa kumwanya ogwo.
Kulwokubha atali emwe bhanu mulaloma, tali Omwoyo gwa Rata wemwe kaloma munda yemwe.
Omuili alimukila omuili wae okumwita, na lata kumwana wae. Abhana bhalimukila abhebhusi bhebhwe, nibhabhakolela olufu.
Nemwe mulibhiililwa na bhuli munu ingulu ya lisina lyani. Nawe unu alikomesha okukingila obhutelo omunu oyo alichunguka.
Omwanya gunu bhalibha Anna mumusi gunu, mubhilimile mumusi gunu ogulubha, echimali enibhabhwila ati, mtakubha mugendele mumisi jona eja Isilaeli achali kusubha Omwana wa Adamu.
Omwiigisibhwa atali mukulu okukila omwiigisha wae, nolo omugaya unu ali ingulu yesebhugenyi wae.
Jiile omwiigisibhwa abhe kutyo ali omwiigisha wae, no mukosi lwe Sebhugenyi wae. Ikabha bhamubhilikiye Ratabhugenyi wa inyumba Belzabuli, ni kwandengoki abhamugaya omwene na inyumba yae!
Kulwejo mutaja kubhobhaya abho, kulwokubha litalio misango gunu gutalisululwa, nalitali linu liselekele linu litalibhulika.
Chinu echibhabhwila muchisute, muchaike mubhwelu, na chinu mulongwa na matwi gemwe, muchilashe ingulu ya inyumba.
Mutobhaya bhanu abheta omubhili nawe bhatana bhutulo bhwa kwita mwoyo. Mubhae unu katulao okusingalisha omubhili no mwoyo eliya nyombe.
Enibhusha, kasuku ebhili bhatakugusibhwa kwa chapa ntilu? Nolo kutyo atalio unu katula okugwa ansi tali Ratabhugenyi wemwe kumenya.
Nawe nolo obhukumi bhwa jimfwili jemwe jibhalilwe.
Mutaja kubha na bhubha, kulwokubha muna echibhalo okukila jikasuku nyamfu.
Kulwejo bhuli munu unu akanyikilisha imbele ya bhanu, anyona nilimwikilisha imbele ya Rata wani unu ali mulwile.
Nawe unu alinyigana imbele ya bhanu, anyona nilimwigana imbele ya Rata wani unu ali mulwile.
Mutetogelati nijile kuleta omulembe muchalo. Nitejile kuleta mulembe, tali obhulemo.
Kulwokubha nijile okuta omunu alwane ne semwene, no muyala na nyilamwene, no mukwelima na nyabhuko wae,
Omusoko wo munu bhalibha abhanu bhaikewae.
Omwene unu kenda esemwene amwi nyila mwene okukila anye oyo atanyingene. Na unu kenda omusigaji au omuyala wae okukila anye oyo atanyingene.
Omwene unu ataligega omusalabha no kundubha any atanyingene.
Omwene unu alyenda okuyenja obhulame alibhubhusha. Nawe unu alibhusha obhulame ingulu yani alibhubhona.
Omwene unu alibhakuma kabha akumile anye, na unu alabhaankumile any kabha amukumile unu antumile anye.
Na unu alamukuma omulagi kulwokubha ni mulagi alibhona omuyelo gwo mulagi. Na unu alimukuma omunu omulengelesi kulwokubha ni mulengelesi alibhona omuyelo gwo munu omulengelesi.
Wona wona unu alamuyana oumwi wa bhalela bhanu, nolo chikombe chimwi cha manji go kunywa amanyiliye, kulwokubha omwene Ni mwiigisibhwa, echimali enibhabhwila ati, omwene atakubhulwa kwa njila yona yona omuyelo gwae.”
Ejile Yesu okubhabwila abheigisibhwa bhae akumi na bhabhili emukile nagenda omwiigisha no kulasha mumisi jebhwe,
na Yowana ali mwibhoelo ejile ongwa ebhikolwa bhya Kristo, natuma omusango okulabhila abheigisibhwa bhae,
na nibhamubhusha ati,”Awe nawe unu kaja, angu aliyo oundi chimulinde?”
Yesu nasubhya naikati, kubhene “Mugende mujomubhwila Yowana ganu omulola na ganu omungwa.
Abhanu bhanu bhatakulola abhabhona okulola, abhalema abhalibhata, abhagenge abhaosibhwa, abhasibhe bha matwi abhongwa lindi, abhafuye abhasululwa bhali bhaanga, na bhanu abhakene abhalasibhwa emisango Jo bhwana.
Ana libhando unu takwitimata ingulu yani.
Akatungu kanu abhanu bhanu nibhemuka, Yesu namba okwaika na liijo ingulu ya Yowana,”Niki chinu mwajiye okulola mwibhala lisaunga ndisingisibhwa no muyaga?
Nawe niki chinu mwajiye okulola omunu afwae ebhifwalo bhyololo? Nichimali, bhanu abhafwala ebhifwalo bhyololo bhekae munyumba ja bhakama.
Tali mwajiye okulola ki-Omulagi? Nichimali, enibhabhwila ati, nokukila Omulagi.
Unu niwe andikiwe,'Lola, namulagilila omukosi wani imbele yo bhusu bhwao, unu kachuma injila yao imbele yao.
Anye enibhabhwila echimali, mubhamwi bhanu bhebhuywe abhagasi atalio unu Ali mukulu okukila Yawana Omubhatija. Nawe unu alimutilu mubhukama bhwa mulwile n mukulu okukila omwene.
Okusoka munsiku ja Yowana Omubhatija okukinga woli, obhukama bhwa Mulwile ni bhwamanaga, na bhanu bha managa, abhabhugega kwa managa.
Kulwokubha abhalagi ne bhilagilo, bhaliga nibhalaga okukinga ku Yowana.
Na labha mwimaliliye okwikilisha, unu niwe Eliya, unu alija.
Unu ali nokutwi kwokugwa nongwe.
Nilususanyishe naki olwibhulo lunu? Nichijejekanyo cha bhana bhanu abhashana kulubhala lwa lisoko, bhanu bhenyanjile nokubhilikilana,
nibhaikati,'Chabhabhumiye olukuli mutabhinile. Chalile, emwe mutalilile'
Kulwokubha Yowana ejile atalyaga mukate nolo kunywa omuvinyo, nibhaikati, 'Ana lisabwa.'
Omwana wa Adamu ejile nalya nokunywa nibhaikati, 'Lola' nimunu muli na munywi, omusani wa bhatobhesha bho bhushulu na abhebhibhi!' Nawe obhwengeso obhusululwa kwe bhikolwa bhyae.”
Yesu namba okugonya emisi munu ebhikolwa bhyo kulugusha bhyakolwaga, kulwokubha bhaliga bhachali kuta,
Jilikubhona awe, Kolazini, Jilikubhona awe Betisaida! Lwakutyo ebhikolwa bhikulu gakakolekene Tilo na Sidoni ganu gakolekana anu, bhakabhee bhatee kala kwo kufwala amagunila no kwisinga lifu.
Nawe ilibha okwikomesha kwa Tilo na Sidoni olusiku lwa indamu yao.
Awe, Kapelanaumu, owitogela ati bhalikutula ingulu okukinga mulwile? Payi ulitelemushwa okukinga nyombe. Lwakutyo ku Sodoma bhyakakolekene ebhikolwa bhikulu, kutyo gakolekana kwawe, yakabheeo okukinga lelo.
Oli enaika nawe ati jakabhee nyangu ku chalo cha Sodoma okwimelegulu olusiku lwa indamu okukila awe.
Mumwanya ogwo Yesu naikati, “Enikukuya awe, Rata, Ratabhugenyi wo Olwile ne Chalo, kulwokubha wabhaselekele Emisango jinu abhobhwenge na bhengeso, nugasulula kubhanu bhatabhaga na bhwenge, lwa bhana abhalela.
Rata lwakutyo jakukondee mumeso gao.
Emisango jona nayanibhwe okusoka ku Rata. Atalio unu kamumenya Omwana tali Rata, na atalio unu kamumenya Rata tali Omwana, na wona wona unu Omwana ana elyenda lyo kumusululila.
Muje kwanye, bhanu bhona omunyansibhwa no kusitoelwa ne migugu misito, anye enibhafung'amya.
Mugege ingulwema yani na mwiigile okusoka kwanye, kulwokubha anye nilimwololo na mufula wo mwoyo no mubhona okufung'ama mumyoyo jemwe.
Kulwokubha ingulwema yani ni nyololo no mugugu gwani ni mwangu.
Omwanya ogwo Yesu agendele kulusiku lwa isabhato alabhile mumabwi. Abheigisibhwa bhae bhaliga bhalumilwe omweko nibhamba okufuna ebhyangala nokulya.
Nawe Amafalisayo bhejile okulola kutyo, nibhamubhwila ati Yesu “Lola abheigisibhwa bhao kutyo abhatambuka ebhilagilo abhakola jinu jiteile olusiku lwa Isabhato”
Nawe Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Mchali kusoma kutyo Daudi akolele, omwanya gunu alumilwe omweko, amwi na bhanu bhanu aligaalinabho?
Lwakutyo engiye munyumba ya Nyamuanga nalya emikate ja bhagabhisi, jinu jaliga jitamwiile omwene okujilya na bhanu aliga anabho, na kutyo jaliga jiile ku Bhagabhisi?
Muchali kusoma mubhilagilo ati, kulusiku lwa Isabhato abhagabhisi munda ya iyekalu abhaikaya Isabhato, nawe bhatana chikayo?
Nawe enaika kwemwe ati, unu alimukulu okukila liyekalu alyanu.
Mwakabhee nimumenya inu obhugajulo bhwayo niki, enenda echigongo ntakwenda echitambo; mutakabhalamuye bhanu bhatana ntambala,
Kulwokubha Omwana wa Adamu nuwe Omukama wa Isabhato.”
Neya Yesu nasokao nagenda mulikofyanyisho lyebhwe.
Lola aliga alio omunu aliga afuye okubhoko. Amafalisayo nigamubhusha Yesu, nibhamubhusha ati, “Enibhusha jiile okwiulisha olusiku lwa Isabhato?” koleleki bhabhone okumusitaka kwo kukola ebhibhibhi.
Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Niga umwi mwimwe, unu kabha ali na inyabhalega imwi, na inyabhalega eyo nigwa mulyobho olusiku lwa Isabhato, mutamugwata kwa managa mumusosha mulyobho?
Enibhusha niki chinu echainsonga, okukila, itali okukila inyabhalega! Kulwejo jiile okukola ejakisi kulusiku lwa Isabhato.”
Neya Yesu namubhwila omunu oyo ati, “Golola okubhoko kwao” Nakugolola, nikubhona nikwiulila, lwo kundi.
Nawe Amafalisayo nibhauluka anja nibhakola echenge echokwenda okumusimagisha nibhagenda anja okuloma bhatasikene nage. Bhaliga nibhayenja okumwita.
Yesu ejile amenya elyo nasokao awo. Bhanu bhamfu nibhamulubha, nabhaosha bhona.
Nabhalagilila bhataja kumukola akamenyekana kubhandi,
koleleki chikumile echimali, chinu chaliga chaikilwe no mulagi Isaya, naikati,
Lola, omukosi wani unu nauye, omwedwa wani, kumwene omwoyo gwani ogukondelelwa. Nilita Omwoyo gwani ingulu yae, na kalasha indamu Kubhanyamaanga.
Atakunyanka nolo kulila kwa managa; atalio munu alyugwa obhulaka bhwae munjila.
Atalilifuna lisaunga linu lyatikile; atalisimya lutambi lwona lwona lunu olwituta ingesi, okukinga anu aliletela indamu yo bhusingi.
Amaanga galibha nobhuigi kwisina lyae.
Omunu umwi aliga alimuofu na ali mutita, unu aliga agwatwilwe na masabhwa naletwa imbele ya Yesu. Namuosha, amwi lwakutyo aliga ali mutita alomele no kulola.
Liijo lyona nililugula nilyaikati, “Lugendo omunu unu niwe omwana wa Daudi?”
Nawe omwanya gunu Abhafalisayo bhejile bhongwa echilugusho echo, nibhaikati, “Omunu unu atakusoshako amasabhwa kwa managa gae tali kumanaga ga Belzebuli, omukulu wa masabhwa.
“Nawe Yesu namenya obhiganilisha bhwebhwe nabhabhwila ati,”Bhuli bhukama bhunu bhugabhanyikile obhwene obhunyamuka, na bhuli musi amwi bhuli nyumba inu eigabhanyika eyene itakusimbagilila.
Ikabha Shetani, namusoshako Shetani, menya kebhuma omwene,
Nikutiki obhukama bhwae obhwimelegulu? Akasoshako amasabwa kwa managa ga Belizabuli, abhaemba bhemwe abhagasoshako kwa njila yaga? Kwo kulubha linu bhalibha bhalamusi bhemwe.
Na labha enisoshako amasabwa kwa managa go Mwoyo gwa Nyamuanga, mumenye ati obhukama bhwa Nyamuanga bhwaja kwimwe.
No munu katula atiki okwingila munyumba yo munu wa managa nokwibha, bila kumubhoya owamanaga okwamba? Niwo kebha ebhinu bhyae okusoka munyumba ya.
Wona wona unu atali amwi nanye chitasikene, na unu atakukumanya amwi nanye oyo kanyalambula.
Kulwejo enaika kwimwe, bhuli chibhibhi no kugaya abhanu bhalisasilwa, tali okumugaya Omwoyo Mwelu bhatalisasilwa.
Na wona wona alyaika omusango kutasikene no Mwana wa Adamu, elyo alisasilwa. Nawe unu alyaika atasikene no Mwoyo Mwelu, oyo atalisasilwa, muchalo munu, nolo bhunu bhulija.
Amo ukole liti okubha lyekisi na matwasho galyo gakisi, amo unyamule liti na matwasho galyo, kulwokubha liti elimenyekana kwa matwasho galyo.
Emwe olwibhulo lwa injoka, emwe muli bhabhibhi, omutula atiki okwaika emisango jakisi? Kulwokubha omunwa oguloma ganu agasoka mumwoyo.
Omunu wo bhwana mwibhikilo lyo mwoyo gwae agasokamo agobhwana, no munu omubhibhi mwibhikilo lyae elyobhunyamuke, echisokamo echibhibhi.
Enibhabhwila ati kulusiku lwa indamu abhanu bhalisosha olubhala lwa bhuli musango gwo bhwana gunu bhaikile.
Kulwokubha kwe misango jao oubhalilwa obhulengelesi na kwemisango jao oulamulwa.”
Nibheya agati ya bhandiki na Mafalisayo nibhamusubhya Yesu nibhaikati, “Mwiigisha, echenda okulola echilugusho okusoka kwawe.”
Nawe Yesu nasubhya naikati,” Olwibhulo olujabhi olwobhusiani, echenda echilugusho. Nawe chitalio chilugusho chinu chilisosibhwa tali echilugusho cha Yona omulagi.
Na lwakutyo omulagi Yona ekae munda ya inswi nene kwo mwanya gwa nsiku esatu mumwisi na mungeta, kutyo nikwo Omwana wa Adamu alibha munda yo mwoyo gwa inside nsiku esatu mumwisi na mungeta.
Abhanu bha Ninawi bhalimelegulu imbele ya indamu amwi nolwibhulo lwa bhanu bhanu na bhalichilamula. Kulwokubha bhatee kwo kulasha kwa Yona, lola, omunu umwi mukulu okukila Yona alyanu.
Omukama omugasi owamumalimbe alimuka mundamu amwi na bhanu bho lwibhulo lunu nalulamula. Ejile okusoka kubhutelo bhwe chalo naja okungwa obhwengeso bwa Selemani, Lola, omunu umwi okukila Selemani alyanu.
Omwanya gunu lisabhwa libhibhi elimusokako omunu, elilabha anu gatali manji ndiyenja owokuumula, nawe litakubhona
Eliiya nilyaikati, 'enisubha munyumba yani inu nisokekelemo. 'Likasubha ndisanga inyumba ikukumbile imaliliye.
Eligenda ndileta agandi amasabhwa Saba ganu galimabhibhi okukila elyo, nigekalao gona. No bhutulo obhubha bhubhibhi okukila obhwokwamba. Kutyo nikwo jilibha kulwibhulo lunu olunyamuke.
Omwanya gunu Yesu aliga naloma na liijo lola, nyilamwene na bhamula bhabhwo bhemeleguyu anja, nibhendaga okuloma nage.
Omunu umwi namubhwila ati,”Lola nyokomwana na bhamula bhanyu bhalianja, abhenda okuloma nawe.”
Nawe Yesu namusubhya unu ejile okumubhwila,”Mayi wani niga? na bhamula bhasu nibhaga?”
Nasomelesha ku bheigisibhwa bhae naikati,”Lola, bhanu nibho bhamayi na bhamula bhasu!
Kulwokubha wona wona unu kakola ebhyo Rata wani wa mulwile kenda, omunu oyo niwe omula wasu, omuyala wasu na mayi wani.”
Kulunaku olwo Yesu asokele ika najokwinyanja kunchechekela yo mwalo.
Ebhise bhyamfu bhya bhanu nibhimwiinda, nengila mubhwato nenyanja omwo. echise cha bhanu bhona nibhemelegulu kunchechekela yo mwalo.
Yesu naika nabho magambo mamfu kwe bhijejekanyo, Naikati,”Lola omuyambi agendele okuyamba.
Anu aliga nayamba ebhiyambwa ebhindi nibhigwa eyeyi nakunjila jinyonyi nijija nijijilya.
Ebhiyambwa ebhindi nibhigwa ingulu ya litale, ao jitabhwene mayalu go kujiya. Ao na o nijisebhuka kulwokubha amayalu galiga galimatilu.
Nawe lisubha lyejile okusokayo nilijocha kulwokubha jitabhaga na misi, nijuma.
Ebhiyambwa ebhindi nibhigwa agati ya amati gamawa. Amati gamawa nigaleya ingulu nigajifundilisha.
Ebhiyambwa ebhindi nibhigwa mumayalu gakisi nijibhula ebhiyambwa, ejindi okusaga egana, ejindi makumi mukaga nejindi makumi gasatu.
Unu ali nokutwi kwo kungwa nongwe.
Abheigisibhwa bhae nibhamujako nibhamubhwila Yesu ati, “Kulwaki ouloma nebhise kwe bhijejekanyo?”
Yesu nabhasubhya naikati, Muyanibhwe echibhalo chokumenya imbisike yo bhukama bhwa mulwile, nawe abhene bhatayanilwe.
Nawe wona wona unu anacho, omwene kongesibhwa kukila echo, na kabhona amatundo manene. Nawe unu atanacho nolo chinu anacho katesibhwa.
Kulwejo eniloma nabho kwebhijejekanyo kulwokubha nolo abhalola, bhatalola echimali. Nolo kutyo abhongwa bhataja kungwa na kumenya.
Obhulagi bhwa Isaya bhukumiye kubhene, bhunu obhwaikati, “Mulongwaga mungwe, nawe kwansonga yona yona mtakusombokelwa; omwanya gunu omulola mubhone okulola, nawe kwa nsonga yona yona musige kumenya.
Ne emioyo ja bhanu bhanu jabhee chisute, jikomee okungwa, nabhaongelesishe ameso gebhwe, koleleki bhasige okulola kwa meso gebhwe, au okungwa kwa matwi gebhwe, nolo kumenya kwe mioyo jebhwe, kulwejo bhakanyindukiye anye lindi, nakabhaosishe.'
Kulwejo ameso gemwe gabhonekewe, kulwokubha agalola, na matwi gemwe kubha agongwa.
Echimali enibhabhwila abhalagi bhamfu na bhanu bhalengelesi bhaliga nibhesigombela okugalola amagambo ganu omulola emwe, na bhatatulile kugalola. Bhesigombelaga okungwa amagambo ganu omungwa, bhatagonguhye.
Oli mutegeleshe echijejekanyo cho muyambi.
Omwanya gunu wona wona unu kongwa omusango gwo bhukama nalema okulimenya, niwo omusoko kaja nokumusakula chinu chiyambilwe munda yo mwoyo gwae. Chinu nichiyambwa chinu chayambilwe ayeyi na injila.
Unu ayambilwe kulutale ni unu onguhye omusango nagulamila kwo kukondelelwa.
Achali kubha namisi munda yae, tali kekomesha kwo mwanya mufui. Omwanya gunu okunyansibhwa kukaja kulwomusango kekujula ao nao.
Unu ayambilwe agati ya mati gamawa, unu niunu kongwa omusango nawe jinyako ja kuchalo nokujigwa no bhunibhi obhulinyasha ligambo elyo litaja kwibhula matwasho.
Unu ayambilwe mumayalu ga kisi, unu ni unu kongwa emisango nokujisombokelwa. Unu niwe kebhula amatwasho no kugendelela okwibhula okukila egana ejindi makumi mukaga, ejindi makumi gasatu”
Mbe, Yesu nabhayana echijejekanyo echindi. Naikati, “Obhukama bhwa mulwile obhususanisibhwa no munu unu ayambile imbibho ya kiss mwisambu lyae.
Nawe abhanu bhejile okuongela, omusoko wae naja ona nayamba amagologolo agati ya jingano neya nagenda jae.
Omwanya gwejile gwalabhao jingano jejile omele nijamba okusosha amatwasho gajo, niwo na magologolo ona nigabhonekana ona.
Abhakosi bha kanya esamba nibhaja nibhamubhwila ati,'Ratabhugenyi, utayambile jimbibho jakisi mwibhwi lyao? Jabhakutiki woli lina amagologolo?
Nabhabhwila ati, Omusoko niwe akola kutyo.'Abhakosi nibhamubhwila ati, “Kulwejo owenda chigende chijogakula?”
Owalibhwi naikati, 'Payi, omwanya gunu omugakula amagologolo omutula okukula na ingano.
Mugasige gakulile amwi okukinga mwigesa. Omwanya gwa ligesa enaika kubhagesi ati, 'Mwambe okukula amagologolo mugabhoye mafuta mafuta mugoche, nawe mukumanye ingano muchitala chani.””
Neya Yesu nabhasosisha echijejekanyo echindi. Naikati, “Obhukama bhwa mulwile obhususana imbibho ya iyaladali inu omunu agegele nayiyamba mwibhwi lyae.
Imbibho inu kuchimali ninoto okukila jimbibho ejindi jona. Nawe ikamela eibha nene okukila jona mumugunda, elibha eti, na jinyonyi ja mulutumba njijogwako nijumbakako amasuli ku matabhi galyo.”
Nabhabhwila echijejekanyo echindi lindi. “Obhukama bhwa mulwile bhuli kuti chifwibhya inu yagegibhwe no mugasi naisasha kundengo esatu munshano okukinga jifwimbe.
Ago gona Yesu agaiikile muchise cha bhanu kwe bhijejekanyo. Bila bhijejekanyo ataikile nabho chonachona.
Inu aliga ilikutya chinu chaliga chamalilwe okwaikwa okulabhila kumulagi chibhone okukumila, anu aikile,”Enifumbula omunwa gwani kwe bhijejekanyo. Nilyaika amagambo ganu galiga gaselekelwe kubhwambilo bhwo bhumogi bhwe Chalo.”
Neya Yesu nasiga ebhise bya bhanu nagenda ika. Abheigisibhwa bhae nibhamujako nibhaikati,”Chisombolele echijejekanyo cho mwata mwibhwi.”
Yesu nabhasubhya naikati,”Unu kayamba jimbibho Jo bhwana Ni Mwana wa Adamu.
