Libhwi ni chalo; na jimbibho je kisi, bhanu ni bhana bho bhukama. Omwata ni bhana bho omusoko, no musoko unu ajiyambile ni nyakusheta
. Okugesa ni bhutelo bhwe chalo, na abhagesi ni bhamalaika.
Lwakutyo omwata ogukumanywa nokwochibhwa no mulilo, kutyo nikwo kulibha kubhutelo bhwe chalo.
Omwana wa Adamu alibhalagilila bhamalaika bhae, okukumanya okusoka mubhukama bhwa amagambo gona ganu galetelee Ebhibhibhi na bhanu abhakola obhugayuke.
Bhalibhesa bhona muchoto cho mulilo, omwo chili echililo no kuguguna ameno.
Niwo abhanu abhalengelesi bhalilabhyangila lwa lisubha mubhukama bhwa Esemwene webhwe. Unu ali no kutwi kwo kungwa nongwe.
Obhukama bhwa mulwile obhususana no bhunibhi bhunu bhuselekelwe mwisambu. Omunu umwi ailolele naiseleka. Mubhukondelewe bhwae nagenda nagusha bhyona bhinu aliga alinabhyo, nagula lisambu.
Lindi, obhukama bhwa mulwile nikama omunu unu kakana ebhyashala unu kayenja ilulu ya mpilya nyamfu.
Omwanya gunu aibhwene eyo eyampilya nyafu, ajiye okugusha bhuli chinu chinu aliga anacho najoigula.
Obhukama bhwa mulwile ni kuti mutego gunu guli mumanji, no ogukoma bhuli bhiyangwa bya bhuli mbaga.
Lyejile lyejula abhategi nibhagukulula kuchalo. Nibheya nibheyanja ansi nibhakumanya ebhinu bhye kisi mubhinu, nabhinu bhitabhaga bhya bhwana nibhyeswa kula.
Jilibha kutyo kubhutelo bhwe chalo. Bhamalaika bhalija nibhabhaula abhanu abhajabhi okusoka agati ya bhanu abhalengelesi.
No kubhesa muchoto chomulilo, munu kuli okulila no okuguguna ameno.
Mwasombokelwa amagambo goa ganu? Abheigisibhwa nibhamusubhya ati, “Yee.”
Neya Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Bhuli mwandiki unu aliga ali mwiigisibhwa wo Mukama kasusana na kanya nyumba unu kasosha mwibhikilo lyae ebhinu ebhiyaya nebhyakala.”.
Yesu ejile akamala ebhijejekanyo ebhyo bhyona, nasokao kulubhala olwo.
Neya Yesu nakinga mumukowa gwae neigisha abhanu mumekofyanyisho. Jibhonekana abhanu nibhalugula nibhaikati, “Naki anu omunu unu abhwene obhwengeso bhunu ne ebhilugusho bhinu?
Omunu unu atali omwana wo mufundi? Maliyamu atali nyilamwene? Na abhamula bhabho atali, Yakobho, Yusufu, Simoni, na Yuda?
Na abhayala bhabho chitekaye nabho anu? Basi omunu unu agabhwene aki ganu gona?”
Nabhabhiilisha. Nawe Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Omulagi atakubhulwa chibhalo tali ewabho na muchalo chabho.
Atakolele bhijejekanyo bhyamfu kulwokubha bhatabhee na likilisha nage.
Mbe, mumwanya ogwo, Herode onguhye emisago ingulu ya Yesu. Nabhabhwila abhakosi bhae,
“Unu ni Yowana Omubhatija amasuluka okusoka mubhafuye. Kulwejo amanaga ganu galiingulu yae.”
Kulwokubha Herode aliga amugwatile Yowana amubhoele amwesele mulunyolo kwa injuno ya Herodia, omugasi wa Filipo omula wabho.
Kulwokubha Yowana amubhwiliye ati, “Jiteile okumugega omwene kubha mugasi wae.”
Herode akamwitile nawe obhayaga abhanu kulwokubha bhamulolaga Yowana kuti mulagi.
Nawe akatungu ko lusiku lwo kwibhulwa kwa Herode lwejile lwakinga omuyala wa Herodia abhinile agati ya bhanu namukondelesha Herode.
Mukusubhya alagile kwo kulaila ati kamuyana chona chona chinu alasabha.
Ejile amala okubhilwa na nyilamwene, naikati,”Nana anu mwikombe omutwe gwa Yohana Omubhatija.”
Omukama abhee no bhusulumbae kwi sabhwa lyo muyala, nawe kulwokulaila kwae, kulwokubha abhanu bhona bhanu bhaliga bhalimwilya amwi nage alagilie ati jingene jikolekane.
Atumile Yowana aletwe okusoka mulunyolo.
koleleki atemwe omutwe gwae guletwe ingulu ya lisinia ayanibhwe omuyala nasila kunyila mwene.
Mbeya abheigisibhwa bhae nibhaja okugugega omubhili nibhaja okugusika, bhejile bhamala elyo nibhaja okubhwila Yesu.
Omwene Yesu ejile ongwa ago, nesumba okusoka anu bhaliga bhali nengila mubhwato nagenda olubhala lunu lwaliga luli kasugumbaju. Omwanya ogwo ebhise bhya bhanu bhejile bhamenya anu aligaalinabho, nibhamulubha nibhalibhataga kwa magulu okusoka mumusi.
Neya Yesu naja imbele yebhwe nalola echise cha bhanu. Nabhafwila chigongo nabhaosha amalwae gebhwe.
Kegolo yejile yakinga, abheigisibhwa bhae nibhamujako nibhamubhwila ati,”Linu nibhala, nolusiku lwawa. “Linyalambule elikofyanya bhagende mubhijiji bhajogula ebhilyo bhyebhwe.
Nawe Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Bhatana bhukene bho kugenda jebhwe. Mubhayane emwe ebhilyo”
Nibhamubhwila ati, “Anu chili ne mikate etanu na jinswi ebhili ela.””
Yesu naikati,”Muilete kwanye.”
Neya Yesu nalagilila echise cha bhanu bhenyanje ansi kumanyasi. Nagega emikate etanu na jinswi ebhili. Nalola ingulu mulwile, naguyana amabhando nabhega omukate nabhayana abheigisibhwa. Abheigisibhwa nibhabhayana ebhise bhya bhanu.
Nibhalya bhona nibheguta. Nibheya nibhakumanya ebhibhutu bhye bhilyo nibhejusha matukulu ekumi na gabhili.
Bhanu bhaliye bhalengelelwaga bhalume bhiumbi bhitanu abhana na bhagasi bhatabhalilwe.
Ao nao nabhalagilila abheigisibhwa bhae bhengile mubhwato, omwanya ogwo omwene nalaga ebhise bhya bhanu bhagende jebhwe.
Ejile amala okulaga ebhise bya bhanu okugenda jebhwe, nalinya ingulu ye chima okusabhwa wenyele. Omwanya gwejile gwakinga kegolo aliga achaliyo wenyele.
Nawe obhwato anu bhaliga bhwakingile agati yo bhusibha nibhuingila ingila kulwamakonjo, kulwokubha omuyaga gwaliga gulibhutwe.
Mumwanya gwa mungeta mubhwile bhukulu, Yesu nabhafogelela, nalibhataga ingulu ya manji.
Omwanya gunu abheigisibhwa bhae bhejile bhamulola nalibhataga kumanji, nibhobhaya nibhaikati, “Nibhyalo,” nibhasekana kwo bhulaka bhwo bhubha.
Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Musige kufwa mwoyo! nanye! musige kubhaya.”
Petelo namusubhya naikati, “Ratabhugenyi labha nawe, mbhwila nije kwawe ingulu ya manji.”
Yesu naikati, “I ja.” Kulwejo Petelo natuka mubhwato nalibhataga ingulu ya manji okuja ku Yesu.
Nawe Petelo ejile alola amakonjo, nobhaya, namba okutubhila, ansi, nabhilikila kwo bhulaka naikati, Ratabhugenyi, nchungula!”
Bhwangu Yesu nagolola okubhoko kwae namugwata Petelo, namubhwila ati, “Awe owelikisha etilu, kulwaki wabhanokwitimata?”
Niwo Yesu na Petelo nibhengila mubhwato, omuyaga niguwayo okuyemba.
Abheigisibhwa mubhwato nibhamulamya Yesu nibhaikati,”Chimali awe uli Mwana wa Nyamuanga.”
Bhejile bhamala okwambuka, nibhakinga muchalo cha Genesareti.
Abhanu mulubhala olwo bhejile bhamumenya Yesu, nibhatuma emisango bhuli lubhala lunu luli kumbali, nibhaleta bhuli unu aliga ali mwasibhwa.
Nibhamulembeleja koleleki bhakunyeko lipindo lyo mwenda gwae, nabhamfu bhanu bhalikutula bheuliye.
Achalyao Abhafarisayo na abandiki bhejile ku Yesu okusoka Yerusalemu. Na nibhaika ati,
“Kubhaki abheigisibwa abhanyamula ebhilagilo bhya abhakaruka? Kulwokubha bhatakwisabha amabhoko gebhwe bhakabha nibhalya ebhilyo.”
Yesu nabhasubhya nabhabhwila ati, “Emwe ona-kubhaki omunyamula echilagilo cho Omukama kulwa injuno ye emisilo jemwe?
Kulwokubha Nyamuanga aikile, 'Yana echibhalo esomwana na nyokomwana; na 'Unu kaika obhubhibhi kwe esemwene na nyilamwene, nichimali kafwa.'
Nawe emwe omwaika ati, 'Bhuli munu unu kabhwila esemwene na nyilamwene, '“Obhusakisi bwonebhwone bhunu akabhwene okusoka kwanye olyanu ni chiyanwa okusoka ku Nyamuanga.'”
“Omunu nkoyo atali na ing'umbu yo okuyana echibhalo esemwene. Kuntungwa inu mwaguchulikile omusango gwa Nyamuanga kulwa injuno ye emisilo jemwe.
Emwe bhanu omwikola okumenya, ni jekisi lwa kutyo Isaya alagile ingulu yemwe aikile,
'Abhanu bhanu abhanana echibhalo kulwe eminwa jebhwe, Nawe emyoyo jebhwe jilikula nanye.
Abhandamya kutiyo ela, kulwokubha abheigisha ameigisho ga ebhilagilo bhya abhana bhanu.'”
Achalyao nabhilikila echise nabhabhwila, “Mtegeleshe na mumenye_
Chitalio echinu chinu echingila mkanwa cho omunu nichimukola mujabhi. Tali, chinu echisoka mkanwa, chinu nicho echikola omunu nabha mujabhi.”
Mbe nio ebheigisibhwa nibhamujako no okwaika na Yesu, “awe, Oumenya abhafarisayo bhejile bhongwa omusango guliya bhekujuye?”
Yesu nabhasubhya naika ati, “Bhuli liti linu Lata wani owamulwile atayambhile lilikulwa.
Mubhasige bhenyele, abhene ni bhatangasha bhanu bhaumile. Omunu omuume akatangasha omuume wejabho, abhagwa mulyobho bhona bhabili.”
Petro nasubhya namubhwila Yesu ati, “Nuchisombolele echijejekanyo chinu,
Yesu nasubhya ati, “Emwona muchali okusombokelwa?
Emwe mutakulola ati bhuli chinu echija mukanwa echilabha mulubhunda nokuja mucholoni?
Nawe ebhinu bhyone bhinu ebhisoka mukanwa ebhisoka mumwoyo. Nibhyo ebhinu bhinu ebhimuyana omunu obhujabhi.
Kulwokubha mumwoyo agasokamo ameganilisho mabhibhi, obhwiti, obhulomesi, obhusharati, obhwiti, obhubhambasi bhwo olulimi, ne ebhifumi.
Ganu nigo agayana omunu obhujabhi. Nawe okulya utesabhile amabhoko kutakukola omunu abhe mujabhi.
Mbe nio Yesu nasoka mumbalama ejo nebheleleka okuja mmusi gwa Tiro na Sidoni.
Lola naja omugasi we Echikanani okusoka olupande olwo. Nalagilisha kwo obhulaka naika ati, “Nuumfwile chigongo, Lata bugenyi, Omwana wa Daudi; omuwasha wani kanyasibhwa muno na lisambwa”
Nawe Yesu atamusubhishe musango. Abheigisibwa bhaye nibhaja no okumulembeleja, nibhaika ati, “Musoshe Anu ajeyo kaja, kunsonga kachiyoganila.”
Yesu nabhasubhya no okwaika ati, nitatumilwe ku omunu wonewone atali kunyabharega jinu jibhulile eja munyumba ya Israeli.”
Mbe nawe ejile nenama imbele yaye, naika ati, “Lata bugenyi nsakila.”
Namusubhya ati, “Jitali jakisi okugega ebhilyo bhya abhana no okulasila jimbwa.”
Naika ati, “Nichimali, Lata bugenyi, nolwo kutyo jimbwa jindela ejilyaga ebhilyo bhinu ebhilagala okusoka kumeja yo Omugabhisi wajo.”
Nio Yesu namusubhya namubhwila ati “Mugasi awe, elikilisha lyao ni enene. Mbe jibhe kutyo kwawe lwakutyo owenda.” Mbe omuwasha waye aliga euliye mukatungu ako.
Yesu nasoka ao aliga Ali nagenda yeyi na inyanja ya Galilaya. Namala nagenda ingulu ye echima neyanja eyo.
Eyijo enene lya abhanu nilimwijako. Mbe nibhamusilila bhanu bhalemaye amagulu gone, abhaume, abhatita, abhalema nabha amalwaye abhandi bhafu. Nibhabhatula mumagulu ga Yesu mbe nabhaosha.
Mbe liijo lya abhanu abho nibhalugula bhejile bhalola abhatita nibhaika, na abhalema nibhaosibhwa, abhalema bha amagulu gona nibhalibhata, na abhaume nibhalola. Nibhamukuya Nyamuanga wa Israeli.
Yesu nabhabhilikila abheigisibhwa bhaye nabhabhwila ati, “Nabhafwila chigongo abhanu bhanu, kulwokubha bhabheye amwi nanye kwa nsiku esatu obhutalya chinu chonachona. Nitabhasiga bhagende ewebhwe bhataliye, bhasiga kukabhila munjila.
“Abheigisibhwa bhaye nibhamubhwila ati, Echibhona aki emikate ejokwigusya abhanu bhanu bhona?”
Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Mna mikate elinga?” Nibhaika ati, “Musanju, ne ebhiswi bhitoto.”
Yesu nalagilila abhanu bheyanje ansi.
Nagega emikate ejokwiya Musanju na jinswi, na ejile akamala okusima, najibhega nabhayana abheigisibwa bhaye. Abheigisibwa nibhagabhila abhanu.
Abhanu bhone nibhalya no okwiwa. Nibhasolosha bhinu bhyasigaye bhibhala bhibhala, nibhijula ebhibho musanju.
Bhona bhanu bhaliye bhaliga bhali abhalume bhiumbi bhina bhatabhalilwe abhagasi na abhana.
Nio Yesu nalaga! iijo bhagende ewebhwe na omwene nengila mubhwato nagenda mumbalama ja Magadani.
Abhafarisayo na Abhasadukayo bhamulibhile Yesu no okumusaka koleleki abholeshe echibharikisho chinu echisoka mulwire.
Nawe Yesu nabhasubhya nabhabhwila kutya “Ikakinga kegolo nimwaika kutya omuyaga ni gwakisi, kulwokubha olwire ni lumutuku.
Ikabha katondo ni mwaika ati 'Omuyaga gwa lelo gutali gwakisi kulwokubha olwire nilumutuku na amele gafundikiye olwire lwona.' Omumenya okugajula kutyo olutumba luli, nawe mutakutula okugajula ebhibharikisho ebhya akatungu.
Olwibhulo olunyamuke nolwo obhusiani olulonda echibhalikisho, nawe chitalio echibhalikisho chona chona chinu luliyabhwa, Tali chilia echa Yona. Nio Yesu nabhasiga nagenda jae.
Abheigisibhwa bhaye nibhagobha ingego indi, nawe bhaliga bhalabhiwe okugega emikate.
Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “mwiyangalile na mubhe nobhwenge ingulu ye echifwimbya cha Abhafarisayo na Abhasadukayo.”
Abheigisibhwa nibhebhusya abhene kwa abhene nibhaika ati, Injuno nati chitagega emikate”
Yesu nagumenya ogwo naika ati, 'Emwe abhalikilisha litoto, Kubhaki omwiganilisha nokwaikana Emwe abhene nimwaika ati insonga mutagega emikate?
Muchali kumenya nolwo kwijuka emikate jiliya etanu ku bhanu bhiumbi bhitanu, na mwakumenye ebhibho bhilinga ebhyobhusigala?
Amo emikate musanju kubhanu bhiumbi bhina, na mwagegele ebhibho bhilinga?
Jabha kutiki okukingila mubhule okumenya lwakutyo naliga nitakuloma nemwe ingulu ye mikate? Mugwatane ni mwikenga need echifwimbya cha Abhafarisayo na Abhasadukayo.”
Ni bheya nibhamenya nkanikwo aliga atabhabwila ingulu yo okwikinga ne mikate jinu jitanachifwibhya, tali okwikenga na ameigisho ga Abhafarisayo na Abhasadukayo.
Yesu ejile akakinga mumbalama ja Kaisaria ya Filipi, nabhabhusha abheigisibhwa bhae, naika ati, “Angu abhanu abhaika ati Omwana wo Omunu niga?”
Nibhaika ati, “Abhandi abhaika ati ni Yoana Omubhatija; Abhandi Eliya; ka abhandi, Yeremia, amo umwi wabhalagi.
Nabhabhwila ati, “Kemwe omwaika ati anye nanyega?”
Mbe lisubhyo nilisoka ku Simoni Petro naika ati, “Awe nawe Kristo Omwana wa Mungu unu alamile.”
Yesu namusubhya namubhwila ati, “awe ulinalibhando, Simoni Bari Yona, kulwokubha amanyinga no omubhili bhitakwelesha omusango ogwo, Tali ni Lata wani unu ali mulwire.
Mbe anye ona enikubhwila ati awe nawe Petro, na ingulu ya litare linu enija okumbakako likanisa lyani. Ne emilyango ja nyombe jitalitula kuliiga.
Ndikuyana jinfungurujo Jo obhukama bhwa mulwire. Chonachona chinu ulibhoya muchalo (munsi) chilibha chibhoyelwe mulwire, na chonachona chinu uligula munsi chiligulwa nolwo mulwire.
“Neya Yesu nabhalagilila abheigisibhwa bhasiga kubhwila omunu wonawona ati omwene niwe Kristo.
Kwambila akatungu ako Yesu namba obhwabhila abheigisibhwa bhaye ati ni bhusibhusi agende Yerusalemu, anyasibhwe kumagambo mafu mumabhoko ga abhakaruka na abhakulu bha bha abhagabhisi na abhandiki, okunyita no okusuruka olunaku lwa kasatu.
Neya Petro nasubhya Yesu kumbali namugonya, kwo kumubhwila ati “Omusango gunu gubhe kula nawe, Lata bhugenyi elyo lyasiga okukubhona.
Nawe Yesu nainduka namubhwila Petro ati, “Shetani subha inyuma Yani, kulwokubha oweselanya amagambo ga Nyamuanga, nawe ugwatilie amagambo ga abhana bhanu.”
Neya Yesu nabhwila abheigisibhwa bhaye ati, “Omunu wonawona akabha nenda okundubha, nibhusibhusi egane omwene, etwike omusalabha gwaye, nio asoke inyuma.
Kulwokubha unukenda okukisha obhulame bhwaye kabhusha, na kuwona wona unu kabhusha ubhulame bhwaye kulwa injuno yani kabhukisha.
Ni matundoki ganu kabhona omunu akabhona echalo chona nawe akabhusha obhulame bhwaye? Mbee, omunu katula okusosha chinuki koleleki aingye no obhulame bhwaye?
Kulwokubha Omwana Womunu alijila mwikusho lye Esemwene na bhamalaika bhaye. Alija okusosha omuyelo kubhuli munu okwingana ne ebhikolwa ebhikolwa bhaye.
Nichimali enibhabhwila ati bhalio abhandi mwimwe bhanu mwimeleguyu anu bhanu mutaliloja olufu okukingila okulola Omwana Womunu naja mubhukama bhwaye.
Jejile jalabhao nsiku mukaga, Yesu agegele Petro, na Yakobo na Yohana omumula wabho, nalinya nabho ingulu muchima.
Nainduka olususo imbele yebhwe. Obhusu bhawye nibhubhalangilya lwa lisubha, na emyenda jaye nijilabya lwo obhwelu.
Mbe Lola, achalao Musa na Elia nibhabhonekana bhalyao nibhaloma nage.
Petro naika namubhwila ati, “Lata Bugenyi, jakabhee jakisi chikale anu. Labha ukenda enumbaka anu ebhiuna bhisatu, echimwi chibhe chao, echindi cha Musa na echimwi chibhe cha Eliya.”
Aliga achaloma ago, elile limwela nilibhaswikilila, obhulaka okusoka mulile niyaikati ati, “Unu niwe omwana wani omwendwa Unu kankondelesha. Mbe mumutegeleshe.”
Abheigisibhwa bhaye bhejile bhongwa kutyo, nibhobhaya muno nibhagwa bhwifumbike.
Namala Yesu naja nabhagwatako naika ati, “Mwimelegulu musige okubhaya.”
Nibhalalamila ingulu nawe bhatabhwene omunu tali Yesu ila enyele.
Mbe bhaliga bhacholomoka okusoka muchima, Yesu nabhalagilila naika ati, “Mwasiga kwaika ebhilolo bhinu mwabhonekelwa ukingila Omwana wa Adamu ao alisuluka okusoka mubhafuye.”
Abheigisibwa bhaye nibhamubhusha ati, “Kubhaki abhandiki abhaika ati Eliya alija okwamba?”
Yesu nabhasubhya nabhabhwila ati, “Nichimali Eliya alisubha nokusubhyao amagambo gona.
Nawe enibhabhwila emwe ati, Eliya amalile okuja, nawe mutamumenyele. Nibhalalamila nibhamukolela amagambo ago bhendaga abhene. Na nikwo kutyo Omwana wa Adamu alinyasibhwa ali mumabhoko gebhwe.”
Niwo abheigisibhwa nibhamenya ati aliga nalomelela ingulu ya Yoana Omubhatija.
Bhejile bhakinga mubhanu bhafu, omunu umwi ejile nateja ebhiju imbele yaye, namubhwila ati,
“Lata Bhugenyi, nufwile chigongo omwa wani, kulwokubha alabhee na lilalu na kanyaka muno. Kulwokubha ngendo nyafu kagwaga mumulilo amo mumanji.
Namuletele kubheigisibhwa bhao nawe” bhatatulile okumuosha
Yesu asubhya naika ati, Emwe Olwibhulo lunu lutakwikilisha na lunu lunyamukile, enikala nemwe kukinga lunakuki? Numulete kwanye anu.”
Yesu namugonya, na lisambwa ndimusokako. Omwana oyo namwiulisha okwambila akatungu ako.
Nibheya abheigisibhwa nibhamulubha Yesu bhwiseleke nibhamubhusha ati, “Kubhaki eswe chitatula okulisoshako?”
Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “kulwokubha elikilisha lyemwe nitoto. Nichimali enibhabhwila, labha mukabha ne elikilisha etoto lwa injuma yo omuaradali, omutula okubhwila echima chinu, ona nichifuruka na chitakubhao chinu chonachona chinu echibhasinga.
(Gwata ganu kutya: Emisango jo olugobho lwa 21, “Nawe, lisambwa elyejabho linu litakutula okusokako ukabhula okusabhwa no ukusibha obhutalya” gatandikilwe mu Mandiko gakala).
Mbe ao bhaliga bhachali Galilaya, Yesu nabhabhwila abheigisibwa bhaye ati, “Omwana wa Adamu kaja okulwa mumabhoko ga abhana bhanu.
Na abhamwita, na kulunaku lwa kasatu alisuluka”. Mbe abheigisibhwa nibhasulumbala.
Mbe bhejile bhakinga Kapenaumu, abhanu bhanu bhaliga nibhatobhesha ligoti lya liinju lya Ishekeli nibhagenda ku Petro nibhaika ati, Omwiigisha wemwe kaliyaga likodi lye echiinju cha Ishekeli?”
Naika ati, “Yee” Nawe Petro ejile engila munyumba, Okwamba Yesu naloma na Petro naika ati, Owiganilishaki Simoni? Abhakama bha muchalo abhalamila ligoti amo omuolo okusoka kuga? okusoka ku bhana bhebhwe nangu kubhandi buyaga?
Mbe nio Petro nasubhya ati, “Okusoka kubhandi bhuyaga.” Yesu nasubhya ati, “mbe jilikutyo abhana bhabhasosishemo mwigoti.”
Mbe nawe chasiga okubhagwisha mu bhibhibhi bhanu abhatobhesha ligoti, nugende kumwalo, ulase indobhano, ugege inswi inu ulakoma kubhwambilo. Ukafundukula omunwa gwayo, ousangamo Ishekeli imwi. Uigege na ubhayane bhanu abhatobhesha ligoti undiile na wiliile awe omwene.
Omwanya ogwo abheigisibhwa nibhaja ku Yesu nibhamuhwila ati, “Niga omukulu mubhukama bhwa mulwile?”
Mbe Yesu nabhilikila omwana omulela, namutula agati yebhwe,
Naika ati, “Ni chimali enibhabhwila, mukabhula okuta na mkabha lwa abhana abhalela mtakutula okwingila mubhukama bhwa Nyamuanga.
Kulwejo unu kekeya lwo mwana omulela, omunu lwoyo nimukulu mubhukama bhwa mulwile.
Na wona wona unu kalamila omwana omulela kwisina lyani kandamilaanye.
Nawe unu kendelela umwi mu bhatoto bhanu abhanyikilisha bhaleme okungwa, jakabhee jakisi omunu oyo bhamubhoye olubhui (olumengo) mubhicha bhyaye, na bhamutubhishe muda ya inyanja.
Echalo jakubhona, kwa insonga ya akatungu ka amasakwa! Kulwokubha ni bhusi bhusi ago gona agaja mukatungu ako, nawe jilimubhona omunuyo alisangilisibhwa na amasakwa ago!
Labha okubhoko kwao amo okugulu kwao okuletelesha amasakwa, mbe nukuteme ukurase Kula nawe. Nijakisi muno kwawe okwingila mubhuanga utali na kubhoko amo uli mulema, nawe utalaswa mumulilo gwa akajanende uli na amabhoko na amagulu gona.
Mbe labha eliso lyao nilikwendelesha obhunyamuke, nulisoshemo ulilase kula nawe. Nijakisi muno kwawe okwingila mubhuanga uli na liso limwi, nawe utalaswa mumulilo gwa akajanende uli na meso gona.
Mbe mwitegeleshe, Mwasiga kugaya oumwi wa abhatoto bhanu. Kulwokubha enibhabhwila kutya mulwire bhalimo bhamalaika abhenene nsiku jona bhasamaliye obhusu bhwa lata Unu Ali mwigulu.
(Gwata kutya: Emisango jinu ejibhonekana okubha Jo olugobho lwa 11, “Kulwokubha Omwana wa Adamu ejile okuchungula chinu chaliga chibhulile,” Emisango ejo jitabhonekene mu Mandiko agakala).
Omwiganilisha kutiki? Akasanga omunu ali na jinyabhalega egana limwi, na inyabhalega imwi nibhulako, atakusiga ejindi makumi mwenda na mwenda mwibanga nagenda okulonda eimwi eyo yabhulile?
Mbe akefula naibhona, enibhabhwila echimali, kakondelelwa okuibhona kusiga ejindi jinu jitabhulile.
Kulwejo kutali kwenda kwe Esomwana owa mulwire okulola oumwi wa abhatoto nasingalika.
Mbe labha omumula wanyu akakuyabhila, genda, ujomwelesha obhunyamuke bhunu bhulio agati yao no omwene ali enyele. Akakungwa numenya ati wamulondola.
Nawe akabhula okungwa ejao, nugege omuili umwi amo yongesha bhabhili, kulwokubha kuminwa jabhamasaidi bhabhili amo bhasatu bhuli egambo elitula okwimelegulu.
Na labha akagaya okubhategelesha, nubhwile likanisa ingulu yo omusango gwo, labha akagaya nalema okutegelesha likanisa, mbe kulwejo abhe lwo umunyamaanga naunu kasolosha ligoti.
Nichimali enibhabhwila, chona chona echo mulibhoya munsi nolwo mulwire echibhowa. Na chona chona echo mulisulumula munsi nolwo mulwire ona echisulumulwa.
Enongesha okubhabhwila kutya abhanu bhabhili agati yemwe bhakekilishanya ingulu yo omusango gwona gwona muchalo munu, linu abhasabhwa, Lata wani owa mulwire kalikonja.
Kulwokubha bhanu bhabhili amo bhasatu bhakekofyanya amwi mwisina lyani, Anye ndi agati gati yebhwe.
Nasubha Petro naja namubhwila Yesu ati, “Lata Bugenyi, ejiya ngendo elinga omuili wani akanyabhila koleleki nimusasile? Kukingila ngendo musanju?”
Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Nitakubhwila ngendo musanju, nawe kwiya makumi musanju wi indilemo ngendo musanju.
Kulwa injuno eyo obhukama bhwa mulwire obhususana no Omukama umwi oyo aliga nenda okumenya obhukumi bhwa imali yaye okusoka ku bhagaya bhaye.
Ejile amba okubhala obhukumi bhwa imali, nibhamuletela omugaya Unu aliga natongwa jitalanta bhiumbi ekumi.
Kulwokubha aliga atali na njila ya kuliya, lata bhugenyi waye nalamula bhamugushe omwene no omugasi waye na abhana na bhulichinu chinu aliga alinacho, koleleki aliye libhanja.
Kulwejo omugaya oyo nagwa, nateja ebhiju imbele yae, naika ati, “Nuwikomeshe amwi nanye, enija okukuliya bhuli chinu chinu outonga.”
Kulwejo lata bhugenyi wo omugaya oyo, okwo aliga nasilwa ne echigongo, amusigile namusasila libhanja elyo.
Nawe omugaya oyo agendele nabhugangana no umwi wa abhagaya bhejabho, oyo aliga natongwa egana limwi elya jidinari. Namukulula, namunyiga muchimilo, namubhwila ati, 'Nuundiye chinu enikutonga.'
Nawe omugaya oyo aguye namwililila muno, namusabhwa ati, 'Nuunfwile echigongo, enija okukuliya.'
Nawe umugaya uliya owokwamba alemele. Atamusasiye, nagenda namulasa mulunyolo, kukingila ao amulipile chinu aliga namutonga.
Mbe abhagaya bhejabho bhejile bhalola omusango ogwo, nabhabhilikila muno. Nibhamala nibhaja (nibhagenda) okubhwila lata bhugenyi webhwe bhuli chinu chinu bhalolele.
Mbe okwiya lata bhugenyi nabhilikila omugayagasi oyo, namubhwila ati, 'Omugaya omubhibhi awe, nakusasiye libhanja lyona linu nakutongaga kulwokubha weliliye muno.
Mbe jitakakwiyile okumufwila chigongo omugaya wejanyu lwakutyo anye nakufwiliye chigongo?
Mbe lata bugenyi waye abhiiliywe namutula mumabhoko gabhanu abhanyasa abhanu kukingila ao akaliile libhanja lyona linu katongwa.
Mbe nikwo kutyo Lata wani owa mulwire alibhakolela, labha umwi wemwe atasasiye omuili waye okusokelela mumyoyo jemwe.
Yesu ejilemamala okwaika Emisango ejo, nasokayo Galilaya, nagenda mumbalama ja Yudea yeyi no omugela gwa Yorodani.
Echise cha abhanu nichimulubha nabheulisha bhaliyo.
Amafarisayo nigamulubha okumusaka, “Angu jiile omunu okutagana no omugasi waye kwa injuno yona yona?”
Yesu nabhasubhya naika ati, “Mutasomele, ati oyo abhayangile kubhwambilo ayangile omulume no omugasi?
Nongesha okwaika ati, 'Kulwa injuno eyo omulume alisigana ne esemwene na nyilamwene nagwatana no mugasi waye, abhabhili abho bhalibha mubhili gumwi?'
Mbe bhatali bhabhili tali ni mubhili gumwi. Mbe, chinu Nyamuanga agwatanyishe, omunu wona wona asiga kuchitaganya,”
Mbe nibhamubhusha ati, “Kaoli Kubhaki Musa achilagiliye okusosha inyalubha yobhutagani nokutagana?”
Nabhabhwila ati, “Kulwo bhukomee bhwe emyoyo jemwe Musa abhayanile omwanya gwo kutagana na abhagasi bhemwe, nawe okusokelela kubhwambilo jaliga jitalikutyo.
Mbe anye enibhabhwila kutya wona wona unu alitagana no mugasi waye, tali itabhee kwa insonga yo obhulomesi, na natwala oundi, kalomela, No omulume unu alitwala omugasi unu atagene no mulume, kalomela.”
Abheigisibhwa nibhamubhwila Yesu ati, “Labha nikwo kutyo jili kumulume no mugasi waye, italikisi okutwala.”
Nawe Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Itali ati bhuli munu katula okulamila ameigisho ganu, Tali ni kwabhanu bhayabhilwe omwanya gwo okulamila.
Kulwokubha bhalio bhanu bhebhuwe okusoka munda ja bhanyilamwene bhali bhajigaru. Bhalio abhandi bhakonjelwe kutyo na bhanu bhandi. Na bhalio abhandi bhanu bhekolele okubha bhajigaru kulwa injuno yo bhukama bhwa mulwire. Unu katula okulamila ameigisho ganu mbe nagalamile.”
Okwiya nibhamuletela abhana abhalela koleleki abhatulileko amabhoko ingulu yebhwe no kusabhwa, nawe abheigisibhwa bhaye nibhabhaganya.
Nawe Yesu naika ati, “Mubhayane omwanya abhana abhalela, musige no bhajibhila okuja kwanye, kulwokubha obhukama bhwa mulwire ni bhwa bhanu lwa bhene.
Mbe omwene natula amabhoko ingulu yebhwe, namala nasokao ao.
Mbe Lola, omunu umwi ejile ku Yesu naika ati, “Mwiigisha (Mwalimu), jinyiile nikole chinuki chinu chikondele koleleki nibhone obhuanga bhwa kajanende?”
Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Kubhaki oumbusha echinu chinu chikondele? Aliyo munu umwi wenyele unu akondele, nawe labha owenda okubhona obhuanga, nugwate ebhilagilo bhya Nyamuanga.”
Omunuyo namubhusha ati, “Ebhilagilo ebhyo bhilikutiki? Yesu naika ati, “Wasiga kwita, Wasiga kulomela, Wasiga kwibha, Wasiga okwaika olubhei.
Nuyane echibhalo esomwana na nyokomwana, na yenda omwikasanya wao lwa kutyo owiyenda awe omwene.”
Omunu oyo namubhwila ati, “Amagambo ago gona nigagwatile. Chiliyoki echindi chinu enikena okubhona?
Yesu namubhwila ati, “Ukenda ubhe mulengelesi, genda ugushe bhinu ulinabhyo, ugabhile abhataka, ubhe ne bhiyanwa mulwire. Ukamala uje undubhe.”
Nawe omumula oyo ejile ongwa ganu Yesu amubhwiliye, nasokao asulumbaye, kulwokubha aliga agwatiliye imali nyafu.
Mbe Yesu nabhwila abheigisibhwa bhaye, “Ni chimali enibhabhwila, nichikomee kumunu unu ana imali okwingila mubhukama bhwa mulwire.
Enibhabhwila lindi kutya, ingamila yolobhewe okulabha muliso elya insinga, okusiga omunu wa imali okwingila mubhukama bhwa Nyamuanga.”
Abheigisibhwa bhejile bhongwa kutyo, nibhalugula muno nibhaika ati, “Mbe ni uya unu alichunguka?”
Yesu nabhalolela naika, “Kubhana bhanu elyo litakukolekana, nawe ku Nyamuanga agatulikana gona.”
Nio Petro namusubhya namubhwila ati, “Nulole, chisigile bhyona nichikulubha awe. Mbe chilija kulamila chinuki?”
Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Nichimali enibhabhwila, oyo andubhile anye, mulwibhulo oluyaya akatungu Omwana we Adamu ao aliyanja kuchitebhe chaye cha ingoma echa likusho lyae, emwe ona muliyanja kubhitebhe ekumi na bhibhili ebhya ingoma, nimusosha indamu ku nganda ekumi ne bhili eja Israeli.
Bhuli munu unu asigile inyumba, omumulawabho, muyalawabho, esemwene, nyilamwene, abhana, amo lisambu kulwa injuno ya lisina lyani, alilamila kwiya ngendo egana nokulya omwandu gwo obhuwanga bhwa kajanende.
Nawe bhanu bhali bho kwamba olyanu, bhalibha bhokumalisha, na bhanu bhali kubhumalisho Bhai libhanja bhokwamba.”
Kulwokubha obhukama bhwa mulwire obhususana na unu ali na lisambu, unu emukile mulugulu koleleki atulemo abhakosi bhemilimu mwisambu lyaye elye mijabhibhu.
Ejile ekilishanya nabho omuyelo gwa idinari imwi kulunaku, nabhatuma okugenda mwisambu lyaye elye mijabhibhu.
Gejile gatulao kuti masaa gasatu nasubhayo nalola abhakosi bhandi bhemeleguyu bhatamilimu mwiyeneo lya lisoko.
Nabhabhwila ati, 'Emwe ona, mugende mwisambu elye mijabhibhu, chona chona chinu chili mugabho gweme enibhayana.' Kulwejo nibhagenda okukola emilimu.
Gejile gatulao masaa mukaga nagenda lindi, musaa ya mwenda ona nakola kutyo.
Akatungu akandi nagenda musaa ekumi na imwi, nasanga abhanu bhandi bhemeleguyu bhatali na mulimu. Kubhaki mwimeleguyu anu lunaku lwona mutali na mulimu gwona gwona?
Nibhamusubhya ati, Kulwokubha atalio munu unu achianile emilimu. Nabhabhwila ati, 'Emwe ona mugende mwisambu lye mijabhibhu.'
Kegolo yejile yakinga, Kanye sambu lye mijabhibhu abhwiliye omunyampala waye, 'Bhabhilikile ubhayane omuyelo gwebhe, wambe nabhanu bhasingiliye umalishe na bhanu bhelabhile.'
Bhejile bhaja bhanu bhayabhilwe emilimu saa ekumi na imwi, bhuli munu alamiye idinari.
Bhejile bhaja abhakosi abhokwamba, nibhetogela ati abhalamila okukila abhandi, nawe ona bhalamiye dinari imwi imwii kubhuli munu.
Bhejile bhalamila emiyelo jebhwe, nibhalundumila kanya esambu.
Nibhaika ati, 'Abhakosi abhakegolo bhanu bhagega lisaa limwi lyenyele kumilimu, nawe wabhenganya neswe, eswe chetwika omujigo lunaku lwona no kwochibhwa na lisana.'
Nawe kanya esambu asubhishe nabhwila umwi umwi ati, 'Musani wani, nitakola musango mubhibhi. Chitekilishanya kwa idinari imwi?
Nulamile omuyelo gwao gunu gukwingene ugende jao. Ni bhukondelwa bhwani okuliya abhakosi bhanu bhasingilila bhenganiliye nawe.
Enibhusha! Nitali na bhulamusi okukola kutyo enenda kumali jani? Amo eliso lyao lino lwango kulwokubha anye ndi wekisi?
Kulwejo oyo kasingilila alibha wokwamba no wo kwamba alibha wo kusingilila.”
Mbe Yesu aliga nalinya okuja Yeruslemu. Achali munjila, nagega abheigisibhwa bhaye ekumi na bhabhili nabhasubhya kumbali nabhabhwila ati,
“Mbe mulole echigenda Yerusalemu, no Omwana wa Adamu kagwatibhwa na bhakulu bha bhagabisi na abhandiki. Abhamulamula okufwa
na abhamuta mubhanyamaanga koleleki bhamusegule, bhamuchape no kumubhamba. Nawe kulunaku olwakasatu kasuluka.”
Okumala nyilamwene abhana bha Zebhedayo ejile ku Yesu ali na bhana bhaye. Abhumile ebhiju imbele yaye no kumusabha echinu okusoka kumwene.
Yesu namubhwila ati, “Owenda chinuki?” Namubhwila ati, “Nulagilile kutya, abhana bhani bhanu kubhubhili bhwebhwe oumwi eyanje mukubhoko kwao okwobhulyo oundi mukubhoko kwao okwobhumosi mu bhukama bhwa.”
Nawe Yesu namusubhya naika ati, “Utakumenya chinu ousabhwa. Enikubhusha! Outula okunywela echikombe echo ndinywela?” Nibhamubhwila ati, “Echitula.”
Nabhabhwila ati, “Echikombe chani chimali omuchinywela, nawe okwiyanja mukubhoko kwani okwobhulwo na mukubhoko kwani okwo bhumosi gutali mulimo gwani okubhayana, nawe nikwabho bhanu bhamalile okwilabhilwa na Lata wani.”
Abheigisibhwa abhandi ekumi bhejile bhongwa kutyo, nibhasulumbasibhwa muno na bhejabho bhaliya abhabhili.
Nawe Yesu nabhabhilikila omwenikili nabhabhwila ati, “Mumenyele ati abhakama bha bhanya maanga abhabhobhaisha, na abhakulu bhebhwe abhakola amanaga ingulu yebhwe.
Nawe emwe mwasiga okukola kutyo.
Nawe, wona wona unu alyenda obhukulu agati yemwe ni bhusi bhusi bhe mugaya wemwe.
Lwakutyo Omwana wa Adamu atejile okukolelwa, tali okufulubhenda, nokusosha obhulame bhwaye abhe mwelusi wa bhafu.”
Bhejile bhasoka Yeriko, abhanu bhafu nibhamulubha.
Na nibhalola abhaume bhabhili bheyanjile kungego ya injila. Bhejile bhongwa ati Yesu katulao, Ni bhasosha obhulaka bhulela nibhaika ati, “Lata Bugenyi, Omwana wa Daudi, nuchifwile chigongo.”
Nawe liijo lya bhanu nilibhagonya, nilibhabhwila bhajibhile, Nawe ona, abhenene nibhasubha lindi okuyogana nibhaika ati, “Lata Bugenyi, Omwana wa Daudi, nuchifwile chigongo.”
Nio Yesu nemelegulu nabhabhilikila nokubhabhusha ati, “Omwenda nibhakoleleki?”
Nibhamubhwila ati, “Lata Bugenyi, ameso geswe gegulwe.”
Mbe Yesu nabha agegelwe nechigongo nakushako ameso gebhwe, akachwina ako, nibhalamila obhutulo bhwokulola nanibhamulubha.
Yesu na abheigisibhwa bhaye nibhakinga yei na Yerusalemu nibhagenda okukinga Bhetifage, kuchima cha Mijeituni, nio Yesu namala nabhatuma abheigisibhwa bhabhili, nabhabhwila ati,
“Mugende muchijiji echo echilubhila, mchali kubhusha mwanya omusanga insikiri isibhikilwe ao na akana kayo. Mujisulumule na mujilete kwanye.
Labha omunu wona wona akabhabhusha chona chona ingulu yo musango ogwo, mwaike ati, 'Omukama kajenda,' na omunuyo obhutabhusha mwanya kabhayana omwanya muje najo.”
Ligambo linu lyejile lwa kutyo lyaikilwe okulabha ku mulagi, Ni bhusibhusi likumile. Lwakutyo aikile ati,
Bhabhwile abhaasha bha Sayuni, Lola, Omukama wao kaja kwimwe, Ekeyishe na alinyile insikiri, eye chinyara chilume, echinyara ch ilela.
Nibheya abheigisibhwa nibhagenda nibhakola kutyo Yesu abhalagiliye.
Nibhaleta insikiri na omwana gwayo, nibhanja emyenda jebhwe kumigongo ja jinsikiri, Yesu neyanjako.
Abhanu bafu nibhanja emyenda jebhwe munjila, abhandi nibhatema amatabhi ga mati no kuganja munjila.
Abhanu bhanu bhaliga bhatandikile na bhanu bhaliga nibhasoka inyuma nibhasekana nibhaika ati Hosana ku mwana wa Daudi! Ayanilwe amabhando ejile kwisina lyo Omukama. Hosana abhe ingulu muno!
Yesu ejile akinga Yerusalemu, echikale chona nichitinyuka nichaika ati Unu niga?
“Liijo lya abhanu nilisubhya ati, “Unu ni Yesu Omulagi, okusoka Nazareti ya Galilaya.”
Yesu namala nengila muyekalu lya Nyamuanga. Nabhabhilimya bhasokemo bhona bhanu bhaliga nibhagusha nokugula ebhinu muyekalu. Nagalamula jimeja ja bhanu bhaingyaga jimpilya ne bhitebhe bhya abhagusha bha jinjibha.
Nabhabhwila ati, “Jandikilwe”, 'Inyumba yani ilitogwa Inyumba ya lisabhwa,' nawe emwe mwaikolele kubha 'eyata lya bhefi'”
Nio abhalema na abhaofu nibhamulubha mwiyekalu, omwene nabhaosha.
Nawe abhakulu bha abhagabhisi na abhandiki bhejile bhalola ebhilugusho ebhyo akolele, na bhejile bhongwa abhana nibhayoganila mwiyekalu nibhaikaga ati, “Hosana ku Mwana wa Daudi,” nibhagwatwa nebhinyiga.
Nibhamubhwila ati, “Oungwa chinu echaikwa na abhanu bhanu?” Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Yee! Mbe nawe muchaliga kusoma, okusoka muminwa ja abhana na abhana abhalela wanu abhanena galimo amakumusho ganu gengene.”
Neya Yesu nabhasiga nagenda Betaniya anja yo omusi namama eyo.
Ao aliganasubha muchikale katondo, aliga alinomweko.
Mbe nalola liti elyo mtini kungego ya injila. Nalijako, nawe atabhweneko chinu chonachona tali amabhabhi genyele. Nalibhwila ati, “Utasubha kutwasha amatwasho lindi.” Akatungu akwako litini elyo nilyuma.
Abheigibhwa bhejile bhalola kutyo nibhalugula nokwaika ati, “Jabha kutiki okukingila omutini gume lugendo lumwi?”
Yesu nabhasubhya kwokubhabhwila ati, “Ni chimali enibhabhwila ati, labha mkabha muli nelikilisha mtali na wasiwasi, mutalikola linu lyakolekana ku mutini ogwo ela, nawe mulibhwila nolwo echima echo, 'nugegwe na ulaswe munyanja,' na elikolekana.
Lyonalyona elyo mulisabhwa, enu mwikilisishe, omulamila.”
Yesu ejile akakinga mwiyekalu, abhakulu bha abhagabhisi na abhakaruka bha imbaga nibhamujako ao aliga neigisha nibhamubhusha ati, “Oukola amagambo ganu kwa bhutolo bhwa namunaki?”
Yesu nabhasubhya nokubhabhusha ati, “Anyona enibhabhusha libhusho limwi, labha mkambwila, anyona omwomwo enibhabhwila enikola amagambo ganu kwa bhutuloki.
“Ubhubhatijo bhwa Yoana bhwasokele aki, mulwire amo kubhana bhanu?” Nibhabhushanya abhene kwa bhene, nibhaika, “chikaika ati bhwasokele mulwire, kaja okuchibhwila ati kubhaki mutamwikilisishe?
Nawe chikaika ati bhwasokele kubhana bhanu, mbe chubhaye abhanu kulwokubha bhona bhanu abhalola nkanikwo Yoana ni mulagi.”
Ni bhamala nibhamusubhya Yesu nibhaika ati, “Chitakumenya.” Omwene on nabhasubhya ati, “Nolwo anye ona nitabhabhwila amanaga ganu enikolela amagambo ganu.”
“Nawe omwiganilisha kutiki? Aliga alio omunu umwi ali nabhana bhabhili. Mbe nagenda kuwokwamba namubhwila ati, 'Mwana wani, lelo genda ukole emilimu mwisambu lye emijabhibhu.'”'Omwana waye namusubhya ati,
'Nitakujayo.' Nawe namala naindula omwoyo gwaye nagenda.
Omunu oyo nagenda ku mwana wakabhili namubhwila lwakutyo abhwiliye owo kwamba. Unu namubhwila ati, 'Enigenda, lata,' nawe atagendele.
“Mbe niga Unu akolele ejo esemwene aliga nenda.” Nibhasubya ati, “Omwana wo kwamba.” Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Enibhabhwila echimali abhatobhesha bha ligoti na abhasimbe bha mubhilabho bhalibhelabhila okwingila mubhukama bhwa Nyamuanga.
Kulwokubha Yoana ejile kunjila igololokele, nawe mutamwikilisishe, ka abhatobhesha bha ligoti na abhasimbe bha mubhilabho nibhamwikilisha. Emwe mwejile mwalola echo kutyo, nimusingwa okuta ebhibhi koleleki mumwikilishe.
Mbe mutegeleshe echijejekanyo echindi. Aliga aliwo omunu ali na lisambu enene. Aliga ayambile emijabhibhu, asingilisishe olugo, ateyemo na litwangilo lyokukamulila idivai, ombakilemo no olugujo lwa abhalindi na alikodesishe lisambu kubhanu bhanu abhalyangalila. Namala nasokao nagenda muchalo chindi.
Akatungu akokunogola amatwasho get emijabhibhu kejile kakinga, nabhatuma abhakosi bhandi kubhalimi bhe emijabhibhu koleleki bhamugegele amatwasho gaye.
Nawe abhalimi bhe emijabhibhu nibhabhagega abhakosi bhaye, nibhamubhuma oumwi webhwe, oumwi nibhamwita no oundi nibhamulasa na amabhui.
Olugendo lundi, nasubha okutuma abhakosi bhandi bhafu okukila abhokwamba, nawe abhalimi bhe emijabhibhu nibhabhakolela amabhibhi lwa bhaliya.
Nio neya nalamula natuma omwana waye, naika ati, 'Abhamuyana echibhalo omwana wani.'
Nawe bhejile bhamulola omusigaji oyo, nibhaikana ati, 'Unu niwe kalya omwandu, Muje chimwite chigege omwandu.'
Kulwejo nibhamugega, nibhamulasa anja ya lisambu lye emijabhibhu nibhamwita.
Mbe enibhusha, Kanye esambu elye mijabhibhu alibha aja, alibhakolela abhalimi abho?”
Nibhamubhwila ati, “alibhasingalisha abhanyamuke abho kwa lisungu enene, akamala natisha lisambu kubhalimi abhandi abhe emijabhibhu, bhanu bhalibha a nibhaliila emijabhibhu akatungu kokuisha.”
Mbe Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Mutasomele Amandiko amelu, 'libhui linu bhalemele abhombaki nilibha ebhui enene elyo omusingi. Linu lyasokele ku Mukama, na elilugusha ameso geswe?”
Kulwejo enibhabhwila kutiya, Obhukama bhwa Mungu bhuligegwa okusoka kwemwe nibhayabhwa liyanga linu elimenya amatwasho go obhukama obhwo.
Wona wona unu kagwa kwibhui elyo kabhutuka mabhala bhala.”
Mbe abhakulu bha abhagabhisi na abhafarisayo bhejile bhongwa ebhijejekanyo bhaye, ni bheyungwa ati kalomelela abhene.
Nawe ao bhendelaga okumugwata, bhobhayaga liijo lya abhanu, kulwokubha abhanu bhamulolaga kuti ni mulagi.
Yesu aikile nabho lindi mubhwijejekanyo, naika,
Obhukama bhwa mulwile obhususana nobhukama oyo akolele obhwenga obhwo omwana waye.
Nabhatuma abhakosi bhaye okubhalubha abhobhaliga bhabhilikiwe okuja mubhukondelwa, bho bhwenga tali bhatejile.
Omukama atumile abhakosi abhandi, naika. mubhabhwile bhone bhanu bhakokelwe mulole natekele ebhilyo. Jinumi najinana jani jinu jimemele jabhagilwe na amagambo gone gali ayeyi, muje mubhukondelwa bhwo bhwenga.
Mbe nawe abhanu abho bhatagendele mubhwenga obhwo bhaliga bhakokelwe. Abhandi bhagendele mumashamba gebhwe, abhandi bhasubhile mubhyasala bhyebhwe.
abhandi nibhabhemukila abhakosi abhomukama nibhabha swasha nokubheta.
Nawe omukama abhiliiywe natuma abhalwani bhaye, nabheta bhaliya abheti nokubhasingalisha omusi gwebhwe kwo mulilo.
Okumala nabhabhwila abhakosi bhaye, “Obhwenga bhulyayeyi, nawe abhakokwa bhatajila chibhalo,
mbe mugende munjila jinkulu, mubhakoke abhanu bhanfu kutyo mulatula bhaje mubhulegesi obhobhwenga.
Abhakosi bhagendele munjila jinkulu nokubhakoka abhanu bhamumbaga jone abho bhabhalolaga, abhakisi na bhabhibhi. niwo olubhuga lwobhwenga nulwijula abhagenyi.
Nawe omukama ejile akengila okubhalola abhagenyi, amulolele munu umwi oyo aliga atafwaye ingubho yo mubhwenga!
Omukama namubhusha, omusani, wengila kutiki munu munyumba utali na ngubho yamubhwenga? Omunu uyo ataikile chonachona.
Mbe niwo omukama nabhabhwila abhakosi bhae ati, “Mumubhoye Omunu unu amabhoko na amagulu na mumwese muchisute, eyo niyo kulibha okulila no kuguguna ameno.
Kulwo kubha abhanu bhanfu abhabhilikilwa, nawe abhasolwa ni bhatilu.
Niwo abhafarisayo bhagendele no kwiloma koleleki bhamugwate Yesu mu misango jaye mwenekili.
Niwo bhabhatumile abheigisibhwa abhebhwe amwi na Bhaherode. Na bhamubhwilie Yesu, “Mwiigisha, chimenyele ati awe uli munu we chimali, na ati owiigisha okwenda kwa Nyamuanga mu chimali. Utakukukwa maiko ga munu undi na utakwelesha kubha na solole ku bhanu.
Kulwejo chibhwile, owiganilishaki? Angu ni jakisi muchimile okutobha likodi ku Kaisari amwi uli?”
Yesu amenyele obhulangilangi bhwebhwe naika ati, “Ni kulwaki omundegeja, abholulimi?
Munyeleshe iyela inu omutobhela likodi.” Niwo nibhamuletela idinari.
Yesu nabhabhusha ati, “Olususo na lisina linu nibyaga?”
Nibhamusubhya ati, “Ni bhya Kaisari.” Niwo Yesu nabhabhwila ati, “Muyanega Kaisari ebhinu bhinu bhili bhyaye ne bhya Nyamuanga mumuyane Nyamuanga.”
Bhejile bhongwa kutiyo bhalugulile. Niwo nibhamusiga nibhagenda jebhwe.
Kulusiku olwo abhandi abha Bhasadukayo bhejile ku Yesu, bhanu abhaika ati kutalio kusuluka kwa bhafuye. Nibhamubhusha,
“Nibhaika ati, Mwiigisha, Musa aikile ati, jakabhee omunu afuye atebhuye bhana, omwana wabho atwale omugasi wae amubhoneleko omwana omumula wabho.
Bhaliga bhaliwo abhaili musanju. Owo kwamuba atwae no kumala nafwa achali kwibhula nage abhana. Neya namusigila omuili wabho omugasi.
Okumala omuili owakabhili ona nakola kutyo kutyo, okumala owa kasatu, ona nabha kutyo okukinga ulya owa wamusanju.
Kubhutelo bhokukola ejo bhone omugasi uliya one fuye.
Mbe kusuko omuga Oyo kabha mugasi waga kubhamula abho musanju? okubha bhone bhaswilile okumutwala.”
Nawe Yesu abhasubhishe na bhabhila,” Muyabhile, kulyokulema okumenya jinu jandikilwe nolwo amanaga ga Nyamuanga.
Okubha mubhusuluko abhanu bhatalitwala amwi kutwalibhwa nawe bhali lwa bhaalaika mulwile.
Nawe ebhyokusuka kwa bhafuye, muchaliga kwilabha okusoma chilia echo Nyamuanga aikile kwemwe, naikati,
Nanye Nyamuanga wa Ibulaimu, Nyamuanga wa Isaka naNyamunga wa Yakobho? Nyamuanga atali Nyamuanga wabhafue ni Nyamuanga wa bhaanga.”
Akatungu elikofyanya bhejile bhwongwa linu, bhalungulile ameigisho Gaye.
Nawe Abhafarisayo bhejile bhongwa ati Yesu ajibhisha Abhasadukayo, nibhwekofyanya awo amwene amwi.
Omwi webhwe ali nyabhilagilo, amubhusishe libhusho kwo kumulegeja.
“Omwiingisha ni chilagilo ki echikulu okukila jona mubhilangilo?”
Yesu namusubhya ati jikwiile umwende Latabhugenyi kwo mwoyo gwao gwone no bhwenge bhwao bhone
Chinu ncho echilagilo echikulu ne chokwamba.
Nechakabhili echisusana -necho jikwiile okumwenda omwikashanya wao lwakutyo owiyenda awe omwene.
Ebhwilangilo bhyona na Bhalangi ebhiikanya ebhilagilo bhinu bhibhili.”
Na Bhafalisayo ao bhaliga anu bhachalindiliye kwikofyanya amwi, Yesu abhabhwiliye libhusho.
Naika ati,” mbe, omwiganilisha ingulu ya kiristo? Omwene ni mwana waga?” Abhwene nibhamubhwila ni mwana Wadaudi
Yesu nabhasubhya ati,” Nkwasongaki chinu echikola Daudi mu mwoyo na mutoga Latabhugenyi naika ati,
'Latabhugenyi amubhwiliye Latabhugenyi wani at, “Inyanja mukubhoko kwani okwebhulyo, okukinga anu nilibhakola abhabhibhi bhao bhatulwe emwalo yammagulu gao.'”?”
Labha Daudi kamubhikila” Kristo Latabhugenyi,” Ni kujunoki abhe mwana wae.
Atabheyeo unu atulile kumusubhya! musango lindi, na tabheyeo unu alegejishe libdi okumubhusha amabhusho mafu okwambila olusiku olwo no kugendelela.
Mbe niwo Yesu naika na liijo na bhweigisibhwa bhae naika ati,
“ Abhandiki na Bhafalisayo bheyanjie echitebhe cha Musa.
Mbe emisango jone jinu abhabhabhwila mujikole nokujigwata. Nawe mutakukolaga lwakutyo abhene abhakola, kubha okwaika abhaika nawe bhatakukola.
Nchimali, abhobhoya migugu misito jinu jitakwitwikwa, nibhajitwikya abhanu kumabhega. Nawe abhene bhatakwenda kujinamusha na Chala chebhwe.
Ebhikolwa bhwebhye bhyona, abhabhikola abhanu bhabhilole. Okubha abhagaliya amasandikwa gebhwe no kwongesha obhunene bhwe bhifwalo.
Ka abhenda obhwinyanjo bhwa imbele kumalya na kubhitebhe bhye chibhalo mu mekofyanyisho.
No kukesibhwa mumagulilo, no kutogwa na bhanu ati “Labhi” (bheigisha).
Nawe emwe mutatogwa “bheigisha”. Okubha omwiigisha wemwe ni umwi. Na nemwe bhona muli bhanda imwi.
Mwasiga kumutoga munu wona wona ku chalo ati esomwana, okubha munage esomwana umwila, niwe ali mulwile.
Nawe mwasiga kutogwa “Bheigisha” Okubha munage Mwiigisha umwila niwe Kristo.
Tali unu ali mukulu agati yemwe abhe mukosi wemwe.
Wona wona unu kekusha alikeibhwa. Na unu wona kekeya alikisibhwa.
Nawe jilibhabhona abhandiki na Mafarisayo, bhalulimi omubhegalila abhanu Obhukama bhwa mulwile. Ka nemwe mutakwingila, Ka mutakubhekilisha abho abhengila abhengila okukola kutyo.
(Komelesha: olugobho olwa 14 lutakubhonekana mu maandiko ga kisi aga kala. Agandi aga maandiko jongesishe olungobho lunu 12. olugobho lwa 14 “jilibhabhona abhandiki na bhafarisayo bhalulimi! Okubha omubhamila abhatumbagasi”).
Nawe jilibhabhona abhandiki na bhafarisayo, bhalulimi! omwambuka ku chalo na munyanja kukinga okumuchusha omunu umwi ekilishe ganu omwiigisha, akamala okubha lwemwe nimumukola lwa kabhili kubha mwana wa mumulilo gunyatasima lwemwe abhene kutyo muli.
Jilibhabhona emwe abhatangasha bhaofu, bhanu omwaika ati, omunu wona unu alalailaga mu iyekalu, Iyekalu chitali chinu. Nawe unu alalailaga ku ijaabhu ya Muyekalu abhoyelwe na libhaja lyaye.
Emwe bhaofu na abhatamu-tamu okubha echikulu ni chiya, Ijaabhu Angu Iyekalu linu liteyemo echogo ijaabhu ku Nyamuanga?
Lindi, wone wone unu kalailila kuchoto Cho okugabhilila chitali chinu, nawe unu kalailila echiyanwa chinu chili ingulu yaye, abhoyelwe na libhanja lyaye.
Emwe abhanu abhaofu, echikulu ni chiya kuchindi, echiyanwa tele echoto echo echitao okwesha ebhiyanwa bhinu ebhisosibhwa ku Nyamuanga?
Nawe unu kalaila ku choto kalaila kwicho na kubhinu bhyone bhinu bhili ingulu yacho.
Na unu kalaila ku Iyekalu, kalaila kwilyo na kumwene unu aikayemo.
Na unu kalaila kulwile, kalaila ku chitebhe cho bhutelo echa Nyamuanga no mwene unu enyanjile ingulu yacho.
Jilibhabhona, emwe abhandiki na abhafarisayo, bhalulimi! Kulwo kubha omusosha omugabho gwa likumi gwe bhilungo, Mnaanaa no muchicha, nawe mwasigile emisango emikulu ejebhilagilo, ejo kulema okwitililanya, nechigongo no kwikilisha. Nawe bhinu bhiile okubhikola na mutasiga agandi mutagakumisishe.
Emwe bhatangasha bhaofu, omusekesha akasami nawe nimumila ingamia!
Jilibhabhona, emwe abhandiki na bhafarisayo, bhalulimi! okubha omwosha anja ye bhikombe na anja ya isaani, kenu Munda bhijuye obhusakusi no kulema okwibhalilila.
Emwe Mafarisayo abhaofu tangata okwamba mwoshe Munda ye bhikombe na Munda isaani koleleki anja one bhibhe bhelu.
Jilibhabhona abhene, abhandik na abhfarisayo, bhalumi! okubha omususana ne ebhitulo bhinu bhipambilwe ichokaa, anja yabyo ebhibhonekana bhikondele nawe, Munda bhijuye amawa gabhafuye bhuli chinu chili chijabhi.
Niko kutyo, emwe one ingulu omubhonekana ati muli bhalengelesi ku bhanu, nawe Munda mwijuye olulimi no bhwikoti. jibhabhona emwe, abhandiki na Bhafarisayo,
bhalulimi! okubha omumbaka ebhitulo bhya bhalangi nimuchuma ebhitulo bhya bhalengelesi.
Emwe omwaika ati, chibha chikaye musiku jabhajaji weswe, chitakabhee chisangie amwi nabho okwitila jisagama ja Bhalangi.
Nikwo kutyo omwibhula abhene ati emwe mulibhana bhabhanu bhetilwe abhalangi.
Mbe emwe one omwikuisha okwijusha idengo inu iile echikayo chabhesomwana.
Emwe jinjoka, abhana bhajimili, muliluka kutiki intambala ya indamu ya omulilo gunu gutalisima?
Lola nikwo, enikola, nibatumila Abhalangi, abhanu abho bhwengeso na bhandiki. abhandi mwabho omubheta no kubhabhamba abhandi mwabho mulibhabhuma Munda ya mekofyanyisho gemwe no kubhabhamba okusoka mumusi gumwi okuja mugundi.
Chinu chililubhila ingulu yemwe mwijilwe amanyinga gone agabhalengelesi ganu getikile kuchalo, okwambila isagama ya Abeli omulengilesi okukinga kusangama ya Jakalia omwana wa Balanki a unu mwetie agati yaiyekalu nechoto chokugabhilila.
Nichimali enibhabhwila ati amagambo ganu gone agalubhona olwibhulo lunu.
Yelusalemu, Yelusalemu, awe unu owitinga Abhalangi no kubhalasa na mabhui bhalia abhatumwa kwawe! nikwia kalinga enibhakumanya abhana bhao amwi lwain'goko eikumanya obhana Koko emwalo ya mabhabha gayo, nawe atekilisishe!
Lola, inyumba yao yasigala elugu.
Lola enikubhwila ati, okwambila oli nokugendelela utalisubha kundola okukinga lunu ulyaika, analibhando unu alija kwisina lya Latabhugenyi.”
Yesu aulukile mwiekalu na genda jae. Abhweigisibhwa bhae bhamulubhile nokumwelesha inyumba ya Iyekalu.
Nawe abhasubhishe no kubhabhwila,” Mtakugalola amagambo aga gone nichimali enibhabhwila ati litalio ebhui linu elisigalao ingulu yelidi linu litalifumibhwa.”
Na ejile eyanja kuchima ja mujeituni, abhweigisibhwa bhae bhamulubhile kwo kwitebha nibhaika ati, “chibhwile, amagambo ganu galibha lii? Nichinuki chilibha chibhalikisho Cho kuja kwao no bhutelo bhwechalo?”
Yesu abhasubhishe no kubhabhwila ati, “Mukabhuke ati atalija munu akabhayabhya.
Okubha bhafu bhalija kwisina lyani. Nibhaika ati,' Anye nanye Kristo', abhabhayabhya bhafu.
Mulyungwa lilemo no bhumenyi bho bhulemo. Mulolenga mutalija kubha na bhubha okubha amagambo ganu gatalilema kubhao; Nawe obhutelo obhubha bhuchali.
Okubha liyaanga Lilimuka kwiyanga lwejabho, no bhukama bhulija kubhukama bhwejabho. Ilibhao ijala na ganyamutikima gaisi mabhala na mabhala.
Nawe amagambo ganu gone nibhwambilweela bho bhusungu bho kwibhula.
Nio bhalibhasosha muje okunyasibhwa no kubheta. Muligengwa na maaga gone kulwaijuno ya lisina lyani.

Abhalangi bhafu abholulimi bhalija no kubhajiga bhwafu.
kusonga obhunyamuke bhuliyongesha, okwenda kwabhafu okunyilila.
Nawe unu alikomesha okukinga kubhutelo, alikisibhwa.
Chinu echigambo Cho bhukama chisimulwa muchalo chone uti bhubhambasi kumaaga gonna. Mbe nio obhutelo nibhukinga.
Mbe nawe, mulibha mwalola echifululusho cho kusimagisha, linu lyaikwilwe no Mulagi Danyeli limeleguyu anu elele (unu kasoma asombokelwe),
Nio bhanu bhaliga mu Yuda bhabhilimile muchima.

Na unu ali mwisambu asige kusubha kugenga ingubho yae.
Mbe nawe jilibhabhona bhaliya abho bhali na bhana na bhalia abho abhanen'ya musiku ejo!
Musabhwega ati okubhilima kwemwe kutalibha musiku ja ibeo amwi kulusiku lwa isabhato.
Kulwo kubha ilibhao inyanko nene, inu ichaliga kubhao kusokelela kubhwambilo bhwa insi okukinga lelo, na nolwo italibhao lindi.
Ka jisiku ejo jichilema okeibhwako, atakabhweyeo oyo akakisibhwe nawe kulwa bhasolwa, jisisiku ejo jilikeibhwa.
Nio ilibha munu wone wone akabhabhwila ati 'Lola, 'Kristo alyanu! Amwi, 'Kristo' ali elia Musige okwilisha emisango ejo.
Ku lwo kubha abha kristo bholulimi na bhalagi bholulimi bhalija ni bholesha jibalikisho nene ne bhilugusho, koleleki bhabhayabhye, ka labha bhakatula nolwo abhasolwa.

Ku lwejo, nolwo bhakabhabhwila ati, “Kristo ali mwipoli, mutaligeda eyo mwipoli amwi ni mulole, ali munyumba, mwasiga okwikilisha emisango ejo.
Okubha lwa kutyo olulabhyo olumulika okusoka ebhutuluka nilwolesha okukiga ebhugwa, nikwo kutyo kulibha okuja kwo mwana wo munu.
One one anu guli omutumbi, eyo niyo jipungu ejikofyanyisha
Nawe alibha yawa inyako inene yajisiku jiliya, lisubha lilitulilwao omwilima, okwesi kutakusosha bhwelu bhwakwo, jijota jililagala okusoka kulwile, na managa mulwile galisingisibhwa.
Mbe nio echibhalikisho cho mwana wo munu chilibhonekana kulwile, najingada jone jechalo jililila nijinega. Bhalimulola omwana wo munu naja mumele aga kulwile kwa managa na likusho lyafu.
Alibhatuma bhamalaika bhae no bhulaka bhunene obhwaing'ombi, nibho bhulibhakumanya amwi abhasolwa bhae bhokusoka mbala ena ejechalo, okusoka bhutelo bhumwi bho lwile okukinga kubhundi.
Mwiigile lisomo okusokana na liti litini. Litabhi likasebhuka no kusosha amabhabhi, mumenye ati olwanda luli yei.
Ni kwo kutyo, mulilola amagambo ganu gone, jibheile okumenya ati ali yei kumilyango.
Ni chimali enibhabhwila, olwibhulo lunu lutaliwao, okukingila amagambo gone ganu agabha gabhonekene.
Olwile na nsi bhiliwao, tali emisango jani jitaliwao chimwi.
Nawe ebhyo lusiku lulia na isaa atalio munu unu amenyele, nakabhee nolwo bhamalaika bhamulwile nolwo omwana, Tali lata omwene enyele.
Na ka lwakutyo jaliga jili musiku ja Nuu, nikwo ilibha okuja kwo mwana wo munu.
kulwo kubha musiku ejo inyuma ya dulima abhanu bhaliga nibhalya no kunywa, nibhatwala no kutwalwa no kukingila olusiku lulia olwo engila mungalabha,
Na bhatamenyele chinu chone chone okukingila iduluma olwo yejile nibhagega bhone -nikwo kulibha okuja kwo mwana wo munu.
Niwo bhanu bhabhili bhalibha bhali mwisabhu- oumwi aligengwa no umwi alisigala inyuma.
Abhagasi hhabhili bhalibha nibhasya bhali amwi -oumwi aligegwa no oumwi kasigala.
Mbe, nimwegee, kulwo kubha mutakumenya ni lusiku ki lunu alja esobhugenyi wemwe.
Nawe mumenye chinu ati, chibha kanya nyumba amenyele omwanya na saa ki inu omwifi kejilamo akalindilie na atakekilisishe nyumba yae okwingililwa.
Ku lwejo, one mwiile okubha mumalilie, okubha omwana wo munu alija mu mwanya gunu mutakwiganilisyamo.
Mbe niga unu Ali Mulengelesi, omugaya wo bhwenge, unu Esebhugenyi waye amuyae obhukulu ingulu yabho bhali munyumba yae, koleleki abhayane ebhilyo ku mwanya gunu gwiile?
Ana libhando omugaya oyo, unu Esebhugenyi wae alimusanga nakolaga kutyo omwanya gunu alija.
Nichimali enibhabhwila ati Esebhugenyi alimutula ingulu ya bhuli chinu echo chili chae.
Ka nawe omugaya omubhibhi kaika mumutima gwae, Latabhugenyi wani akola.'
No okwamba okubhabhuma abhagaya bhae, na akalya no kutamila amwi na bakolwa,
Esebhugenyi wae omugaya oyo alija kulusiku lunu atakwiganilisya, na mu saa inu atakuimenya.
Esebhugenyi wae alimubhutula mabhala gabhili no kumutula lubhala lumwi amwi na bholulimi, niwo kulibhao okulila na okuguguna ameno.
Mbe niwo obhukama bhwamulwile bhulisusanyibhwa na abhayala ekumi abho bhagengele jitala na nibhagenda okuja okulamila omutwasi wo bhwenga.
Abhatanu mwabho bhaliga bhamumu bhatanu abhandi bhaliga bhobhwenge.
Abhayala abhamumu bhejile bhagegele jitala jebhwe bhatagegele mafuta gone gone.
Nawe abhayala bho bhwebge bhagegele ebhinu bhya mafuta amwi najitala jebhwe.
Woli omwanya omutwasi wobhenga ejile akola okukinga, bhone nibhagwatwa jitilo nibhamama.
Nawe omwanya gwa mungeta agati nibhao ijogele,' Mbe mulole omutwasi wo bhwenga! Ni muuluke anja mujokumulamila.'
Niwo abhayala abho bhone nibhemuka nibhakongeshq jitala jebhwe.
Abhamumu bhaliya nibhabhwila bhaliya abho bhwengwe, muchiyaneko libhala lya mafuta gemwe okubha jitala jeswe ejisimilila!
Nawe bhaliya abhobhwengeso mbhabhasubhya no kubhabhwila ati, amwi gatakuchiya eswe nemwe, akili mugende kubhanu mwigulile abhene.'
OMwanya bhagendele eyo okugula, omutwasi wo bhwenga akingile, na bhone bhanu bhaliga bhamaliliye bhagendele nage omutwasi wo bhwenga, omulyango gwegaye.
Ejile bheya abhayala abhandi one nibhakinga nibhaika! 'Latabhugenyi, Latabhugenyi nuchigulile.
Nawe asubhishe naika ati, nichimali nabhabhwila ati, anye nitakubhamenya.
Kulwejo nimwangalile, kwokubha mutakumenya lusiku nolwo isaa.
kwo kubha ni lwa kutyo omunu aliga nenda okuja mulugendo okuja munsi Indi. Abhabhilikie abhagaya bhae nabhasigila obhunibhi bhwae.
Oumwi webhwe amuyanile jitalanta etanu oundi amuyanile Ebhili, na uliya oundi amuyanile talanta imwi. Bhuli umwi alamiye okwingana no bhutulo bhwae, no munu uliya agendele jae.
Ao nao uliya alamiye jitalanta etanu agendele najibhikisha, no kwibhusha jitalanta ejindi etanu.
Niko kutyo uliya alamiye jitalanta ebhili, ebhusishe ejindi ebhili.
omugaya oyo alamiye italanta imwi, agendele jae, nasimba elyobho mumayalu, naiseleka iyela ya isebhugenyi wae.
Mbe nigutulao mwanya mulela, isebhugenyi wa abhagaya abho asubhile na nakonja amasabhu nabho.

Anye nobhaile, ningenda Jani na niniiseleka Italanta yao mumayalu. Lola, unayo anu ili eyao.'
Nawe esebhugenyi waye asubhishe naika ati, awe mugaya mubhibhi na mulenga wamenyele ati eninoga ao nichali kuyamba no kugesa nao nichali kubhibha.

Mbe mumuteshe Italanta eyo na mumuyane uliya omugaya oyo ali na jitalanta ekumi.

alijitula jinyabhalega mukubhoko kwe bhulyo, Tali jimbusi alijitula mukubhoko kwe ebhumosi.

Naliga tuyu nimunfwafya emyenda, Naliga ndwae na nimumbika; Na Naliga nibhoyelwe na nimunyijila!
Mbe niwo abhalegesi bhalimusubhya nibhaika ati, 'Latabhugenyi, Ni lii chakubhwene uli no mweko no kukukesha amwi uli no bhwilo na nichikuyana amanji.
Na Ni lii chakulolele uli mugenyi, na nichikukalibhisha amwi uli tuyu nichikufwafya emyenda?
Na ni lii chakulolele uli mulwae amwi mwibhoyelo na nichikwijila?
No mukama alibhasubhya no kubhabhwila ati, ni chimali enibhabhwila ati echo mwakolele anu ku umwi wa bhaili bhani abhatoto, mwankolee anye.'
Niwo alibhabhwila abho bhali mukubhoko kwae kwe bhumosi, nimusoke kwanye abho mufumilisibhwe, mugende mumulilo gunu gutakuwao gunu gwelabhilwe kulwa shetani na bhamalaika bhaye,
okubha naliga no mweko nawe mutananile bhilyo; Naliga nili no bhwilo nawe mutananile manji;
Naliga nili mugenyi mutankalibhisishe nili tuyu nawe mutananile myenda; Nili mulwae na nili mwibhoyelo nawe mutandolele.'
Niwo abho one bhalimusubhya nibhaika ati, Latabhugenyi, Ni lii chakulolele uli no mweko, amwi uli no bhwilo, amwi uli mugenyi amwi uli tuyu, amwi uli mulwae, amwi uli mubhoywa na chitakufulubhendeye?
Mbe niwo alibhasubhya naika ati, Ni chimali enibhabhwila ati chilia echo mutakolele ku umwi wa bhanu abhatoto, mutankolee anye.'
Bhanu bhaligenda munyako inu itakuwao nawe abhalengelesi mubhuanga bhunu bhutakuwao.”

Mbe kulusiku olwo kwamba lunu lutalimo chifwimbya, abheigisibhwa bhamulubhile Yesu nibhaikana ati, “Akiao wenda chikwilabhile ulye ebhilyo bhya Ipasaka?”

Abheigisibhwa bhakolele lwa kutyo Yesu abhalagile, na bhelabhile ebhilyo ebhya ipsaka.
Yejile yakinga kegolo, eyanjile okulya ebhilyo amwi na bhaliya abheigisibhwa ekumi na bhabhili.
Anu bhaliga nibhalya ebhilyo, aikile ati, “Ni chimali enibhabhwila ati oumwi wemwe kajo kundomela iniku.”
