Echise chinene cha bhalwaye chaliga chilimo abhaofu, abhalema, amwi nabhakomboleke bhaliga bhamamile mu chiyumba.
Kulwejo, uliya aliga wo bhutangasi okwingila Munda ya manji gachali kufulungulwa akolele omuwanga okusoka ku chonachona chinu aliga chimugwatile kumwanya ogwo.
No munu umwi aliga alwaye kwo mwanya gwo myaka makuni gastu na munana aliga munda ye biyumba.
Yesu ejile amulola amamile munda ye bhiyumba ejile amenya ati amamile ao kwo mwanya mulela Yesu amubwiliye ati, “Mbe owenda okubhayana muwanga?”
Uliya omulwaye nasubya ati, “Lata bhugenyi ntali na munu wo kuntula mwitanga omwanya amanji agaseluka. Omwanya gunu enilegeja okwingila omunu oundi katangatila.”
Yesu namubwila ati, “Imuka na witwike ebhimamilo byao ulibhate.”
Ao nao uliya omunu nabha muwanga, na gega obhulili bwaye na libhata. No lusiku lwaliga olusiku lwa isabhato.
Kutyo Abhaaudi nibhamubya uliya omunu unu aosibwe, “Lelo ni lusiku lwa Isabhato, na kuganyibwe okugega ebhimamilo Chao.”
Nasubya ati, omwene amwosha niwe ambwila, “Nugege echimamilo Chao na ulibhate.”
Nibhamubhusha, “Ni niga unu akubwila 'Ugege echimamilo chao na ulibhate?'”
Kubha oyo, aoleke atamumenyele kwokubha Yesu aliga asokeleyo kwa imbisike. Kwo kubha bhaliga bhanu bhafu olubhala olwo.
Yesu namusanga uliya omunu mu yekalu na mwibwila ati, “Lola waolele! “Usige okukola bhibhi Lindi wasiga emisango mibhibhi muno.”
Omunu uyo nagenda na nabhabwila Abhayaudi ati Yesu niwe anyiulisishe
Kutyo kwo kubha ye misango ejo Abhayaudi nibhamunyasha Yes, kwo kubha akolele emisango jinu ku lusiku lwa isabhato.
Yesu namubwila ati, “Lata wani kakola emilimu nolwo woli nanye enikola emilimu.”
Kwo kubha Abhayaudi nibheyongesha okumulonda koleleki bhamwite ntali kwo kubha anyamuye isabhato, nawe kwo kumubhilikila Nyamuanga esemwene waye, nelinganya na Nyamuanga.
Yesu namusubya ati, “Nichimali, chimali, Omwana atakutula okukola chinu chona chona atali chinu echo akolele kwi semwene waye bhinu kakola, kwo kubha chona chona Lata chinu akolele nicho no Omwana kaja okukola.
Kwo kubha Lata endele omwanana kamwelesha bhuli chinu kakola na alimwelesha emisango eminene kukila jinu koleleki atimutang'ang'ale.”
Kwo kubha kutyo Lata kabhasulula abhafuye na bhayana obhuanga ni kwo kutyo Omwana ona kamuyana obhuanga wona wona unu Kamwenda.
Kwo kubha Lata atakulamula wona wona, nawe ayaye omwana okulamula.
Koleleki omwana abhone echibhalo Omwana koleleki omwana bhamuyanile echibhalo Lata. Unu atakumuyana echibhalo omwana kamuyana echibhalo Lata unu antumile.
Nichimali, Nichimali, unu kongwa omusango gwani no kumwikilisha unu antumile anabho obhuanga bwa kajanende atalija kuntambala. Kulwejo, alabhile okusoka mu kufwa no kwingila mu bhuanga.
Nichimali, chimali, enibhabwila ati omwanya oguja na woli gulio abhafuye bhalyungwa lilaka lyo Mwana wa Nyamuanga, na bhona bhalyungwa bhalilama.
Kwo kubha kutyo Lata ali no bhuanga munda yae omwene,
Kubha amuyaye Omwana kubha no bhuanga munda yae, na Lata amuyaye Omwana obhuinga koleleki alamule kwo kubha ni Mwana wo Munu.
Mwasinga kutang'ang'ala na linu kwo kubha omwanya oguja bhanu bhafuye bhona bhalimo mufwa bhalyungwa lilaka lyaye.
Nabho bhanu bhalisoka anja: kubhanu bhakolanga ebye kisi bhalisulukila ku bhuanga, na bhanu bhakolanga echibhibhi bhalisulukila mu ntambala
Nitakutula kukila chinu chona chona okusoka kwanye omwene. Alabha enungwa, nikwo kutyo enilamula no kulamula kwani kwimiliko kwo kubha nitakuyenja bhinu enenda anye, nawe unu antumile.
Alabha nikebhambalila omwene, obhubhambasi bhani bhutabheye bha chimali.
Ali oundi oyo kebhambalila ku mwene nenimenya obhubhambasi bhunu kambalila ni bwe chimali.
Mwatumile ku Yohana omwene nambambalila echimali.
Nolwo kutyo, obhubhambasi obhoenilamila bhutakusoka kumwana munu. Enaika jinu koleleki mukisibwe.
Yohana aliga ni itala eyo yaliga niyaka na kung'ala na mwaliga muli na likondelelwa kwo mwanya mutoto bwelu bwaye.
Obhubhambasi bhunu nilinabwo no bhukulu kukila bhuliya obwa Yohana, ku milimu jinu Lata anaye okukumalisha, emilimu jinu enikola ejinyimako ejo kubambalila kubha Lata antumile.
Lata unu antumile omwene kanyimako anye. Mchalinga kungwa obhulaka bwae nolwo kulola olususo lwae kumwanya gwona gwona.
Mutana misango gwae gunu gwikaye kwimwe kwo kubha mutakwilisha unu antumile.
Omuyenja mu mandiko omwichula muda yeye muno bhuanga bwa kajanende, na ganu amandiko aganyimako emisango jani.
Mutakwenda kuja kwanye koleleki mubhone obhuanga bwa kajanende.
Nitakulamila jikuma okusoka ku bhanu,
Nawe nimenyele kubha mutali lyenda na Nyamuanga munda yemwe emwe abhene
Nijile kwa lisina lya Lata want, mutakutula kundamila. Alabha oundiakaja kwa lisina lyaye mukamulamiye.
Mbe omutula kutiki okwikilisha emwe bhanu omuyabwa echibhalo okusoka ku bhuli umwi wemwe nawe mutakuyenja echibhalo chinu echisoka ku Nyamuanga oumwila?
Muteganilisha ati anye enibhabhula imbele ya Lata. Unu kabhabhula emwe no Musa unu emwe muteyeo ameikanyo gemwe kumwene.
Alabha nimwikilisha Musa mwakanyikilisishe any kwo kubha anyandikiye emisango jani.
Alabha mutakwikilisha olwandiko lwaye omutula kutiki okwikilisha emisango Jani?
Ejile emisango ejo, Yesu agendele kungego ya inyanja ya Galilaya niyo eibhilikilwa Inyanja ya Tiberia.
Echise chinene nichimulubha kwo kubha bhalolele ebhibhalikisho bhinu akolele ku bhalwae.
Yesu nalinya ingulu kulubhala lwa ingulu lwe chima neyanja eyo na bheingisibwa bhae.
(Na ipasaka, ya malya ga Bhayaudi galiga gali yei).
Yesu anaenamusha ameso Gaye aliga galiyeyi na Lola chise chinene chimujako, kumwene na mubhusha Filipo ati, “Echijaki okugula ebhilo koleleki abhanu bhanu bhabhone okulya”?
(Nawe Yesu ajaikile jinu ku Filipo kumusaka kwokubha omwene aliga amenyele chinu kenda okukola).
Filipo namusubya ati, “Nolwo ebilyo bye chibhalo silingi magana gabhili bhitakabheile nolwo bili umwi akabhene katoto.”
Andrea, oumwi wa bheigisibwa bhae omumula wabho Simon Petro namubwila ati
Yesu, “Aliyo omusigaji anu ana emikate etanu na jiswi ebhili, nawe bhinu ni woki mubhanu bhafu kutyo?”
Yesu nabhabwila ati, “Mubheyanje abhanu asi” (bwaliga bhulio bhunyasi bwafu kulubhaju ao). Kutyo abhalune bhali uti bhisila bhitanu nibheyanja asi.
Mbe Yesu nagega emikate ejo etanu nasima na bhagabhila abhanu bhaliga bheyanjile. Kutyo kutyo nabhagabhila jiswi lya kutyo aliga mbenda.
Abhanu bhejile bhakeguta, nabhabwila abheigisibwa bhae ati, “Mubhikofye ebhibhutu bya jinswi, bhinu byasigae koleleki chasiga kubhulao chona chona”.
Mbe nibhakofya na nibhejusha ebibho ekumi na bhilili, ebhibhala bye mikate etanu eja jisairi-ebibhala bhinu byasigae kubhanu bhanu bhalie.
Mbe abhanu bhejile bhalola echibhalikisho chinu akolele nibhaika ati, “Chimali unu niwe omulagi unu kaja muchalo.”
Yesu ejile amenya ati abhenda okumwagwata koleleki bhamukole kubha mukama webwe, atagene nabho, nagenda kuchima omwene enyele.
Kwejile kwakinga kegolo, abheigisibwa bhae nibhatebhela kumwalo.
Nibhalinya mubwato nabhaliga nibhambuka okugenda Kapernaumu. (Echisute chaliga chengie na Yesu aliga achali kubhakingako kubhene).
Omwanya ogwo omuyaga gwaliga nguyemba, na inyanja nigendelela okusaluma.
Lindi abheigisibwa bhae bhaliga nibhafuga mafugile makumi gabhili na gatanu amwi makumi gasatu, nibhamulola Yesu nalibhata ingulu ya inyanja nafugela ku bwato, nibhobhaya.
Nawe nabhabwila ati, “Nanye! Musige okubhayana”.
Lindi bhaliga bhekilisishe okumuyeka okwingisha mubwato, ao nao obwato nibhugobha kuchalo enu bhaliga nibhaja.
Olusiku lunu lwalubhiye echise chaliga chimeleguyu kugego ya inyanja nibhalola ati bhutalio bwato bhundi tali bhunu Yesu na bheigisibwa bhae bhaliga bhachali kulinya nawe abheigisibwa bhae bhaliga bhagengele jebwe bhenyele.
(Amwi no kubhao amato agandi ago gasokele Tiberia ayei nanu bhaliye emikate unu Lata bhugenyi asimiye).
Omwanya echise bhejile bhamenya ati kubha atali Yesu nolwo abheigisibwa bhae bhaliga bhalyeyo, abhene abho bhalinyile munda ya mato nibhagenda Kapernaumu nibhamuyenja Yesu.
Bhejile bhamulola kugego yendeyo ya inyanja nibhamubhusha, “Rabi wejile enu lii?”
Yesu nabhasubya, nabhabwila ati, Nichimali, chimali, omuyenja anye, tali kwo kubha mwalole echibhalikisho, nawe kwo kubha mwaliye emikate no kwiguta.
Musige okukolela emilimu ebhilyo bhinu ebhinyamuka, nawe muchikolele emilimu ebhilyo bhinu ebhikala nolwo obhuanga bhunu omwana wo munu kabhayana, kubha Nyamuanga Lata amuteyeo omuuli ingulu yaye.”
Mbe nibhamulola ati, “Nichinuki chinu chiile okukola koleleki okujikola emilimu ja Nyamuanga?”
Yesu nasubya ati, “gunu nigwo omulimu gwa Nyamuanga: Ati mumwikilishe omwene antumile.”
Mbe nibhamubwila ati, “Ni chibhalikishoki chinu ouja okukola ati echitula okulola no kwikilisha? Oukola chinuki?
Bhalata bheswe bhaliye ebhilo ebhala, lwa kutyo jandikilwe, “Abhayaye emikate okusoka mulwile koleleki bhalye.”
Mbe Yesunabhasubya ati, “Nichimali, chimali, atali Musa oyoabhayeye omukate okusoka mulwile, nawe Lata wani niwe kabhayana omukate gwe chimali okusoka mulwile.
Kwokubha omukate gwa Nyamuanga ni guliya okwika okusoka mulwile no kuyana obhuanga echalo.
Mbe nibhamubya ati, “Lata bhugenyi chiyane omukate gunu omwanya gwona.”
Yesu nabhabwila ati, “Anye nanye omukate gwo bhuanga, unu kanyijako kwanye atalilumwa mweko no mwene unu kanyikilisha atalitwa bhulilo kata.”
Nawe nabhabwila ati, mwandola, na muchali kunyikilisha.
Bhona bhanu Lata kanana bhalija kwanye, wona wona unu kaja kwanye nitalimwesa anja katyali.
Kwo kubha nisokele mulwile, tali kwo kukola kwenda kwani, nawe okwenda kwaye unu antumile.
Na ganu nigo okwenda kweye unu antumile ati, nisige okumubhusha nolwo umwi ku bhaliya ananile, nawe enebhasulula ku lusiku lwa kubhutelo.
Kwo kubha kunu nikokwenda kwa Lata wani ati, wona wona unu kamulola Omwana no kunyikilisha abhone obhuanga bwa kajanende; nanye ndimusulula ku lusiku lwo bhutelo.
Mbe Abhayaudi nibhetong'anila kwo kubha aikile, “Anye ni mukate ogwo gwekile okusoka mulwile.”
Nibhaika ati, “Unu atali Yesu omwana wa Yusufu, unu esemwene wae na nyilamwene wae chimumenyele? Yabha kutiki woli kaika, 'Nasokele mulwile'?”
Yesu nasubya, nabhabwila ati, “musige kwitong'anila emwe abhene.
Atali unu kaja kwanye akalema okukululwa na Lata wani unu antumile nanye ndimusulula ku lusiku lwo bhutelo.
Kwo kubha jandikilwe mu bhalagi, 'Bhaliigisibwa na Nyamuanga.' Bhuli unu kongwa no kwiigila okusoka ku Lata kaja kwanye.
Tali ati alio omunu oyo amulolele Lata, atali unu asokele ku Nyamuanga-amulolele Lata.
Nichimali, chimali, unu kekilisha ali no bhuanga bwa kajanende.
Anye nili mukate gwo bhuanga.
Bhesomwana bhemwe bhaliye ebhilyo ibhala, na nibhafwa.
Bhinu nibyo ebhilyo bhinu dbhisoka mulwile' koleleki omunu alyeko kulubhala lwae koleleki atafwa.
Anye ni bhilyo bhinu ebhiyanja bhisokele okusoka mulwile. Alabha omunu wona wona akalya kulubhala bye bhilyo bhinu, alibha muanga kajanende. Ebhilyo bhinu ndigabha ni mubhili gwani kulwo bhuanga bwa isi.”
Abhayauda nibhabhiililwa abhene kwa bhene na nibhamba okubhambashanya nbhaika ati, “Omunu unu katulaatiki okuchiana omubhili gwae chigulye?”
Mbe Yesu nabhabwila ati, “Nichimali, chimali, mukalema okugulya omubhili gwo Mwana wo Munu no kunywa amanyinga gae, mutakubha no bhuanga muda yemwe.
Wona wona unu kalya omubhili gwani no kunywa amanyinga gani anabho ubhuanga bwa kajanende, anye enimusulula kulusiku lwo bhutelo.
Kwo kubha omubhili gwani no bhilyo bye chimali, na manyinga gani nicho echo kunywa check chimali.
Unu kalya omubhili gwani no kunywa amanyinga gani kekala mwanye, nanye mu mwene.
Alabha Lata omwene ni wo bhuanga antumile, na kutyo kekala kwo kubha Lata, na unu ona kalama kwo bhutulo bwani.
Gunu nigwo omukate gunungwasokele mulwile, atali lwa bhalata kutyo bhaliye nibhafwa. Unu kagulyaomukate gunu kalama kajanende.
Yesu aikile emisango jinu munda ya likofwanya bhunu aliga neigisha eyo Kapernaumu.
Now abhafu bha bheigisibwa bhae bhejile bhongwa ganu, nibhaika ati, “Linu niigisho ekomeye niga kalitula okulilamila?”
Yesu kwo kubha amenyele atiebheigisibwa bhae bhaliga mbetong'anila emisango jinu, nabhabwila ati mbe omisango gunu nigwo ogubhekujusha?
Mbe jilibha kutiki alibha mwamulola omwana wo munu neka okusoka anu aliga okwamba?
Ni mwoyo nigwo ogutamo obhuanga. Omubhili gutakusakila chinu chona chona. Emisango jinu naika kwemwe ni mwoyo na no bhuanga.
Mbe nawe bhachalio abhunu agati yemwe bhanu bhatakwilisha.” kwo kubha Yesu amenyele kusokelela okwamba unu atakutula okwikilisha no mwene unu alija okumulomela inuku.
Nabhabwila ati, ni kwokubha linu nabhabwiliye ati atalio omunu unu katula okuja kwanye tali ayanibwe na Lata.”
Abha ya jinu abheigisibwa bhae bhafu bhasubhile inyuma nibhalema okulibhatila nage lindi.
Yesu nabhabwila bhaliya ekumina bhabhili, “Mbe nemwe omwenda okugenda?”
Simoni Petro namusubya ati, “Lata bhugenyi chije kuga kubha awe uli ne misango Jo bhuanga bwa kajanende,
Na chekilisha no kumenya kubha awe nimwelu wa Nyamuanga.”
Yesu nabhabwila ati, “Mbe anye nitabhasolele emwe, no umwi wemwe ni shetani?
Woli aliga naika ku Yuda, omwana wa Simoni Iskariote, kwo kubha aliga niwe unu umwi wa bhaliya ekumina na bhabhili, unu niwe kamulomela inuku Yesu.
Abha yemisango ejo Yesu nalibhata mu Galilaya, kwo kubha atendele okugenda mu Bhyaudi would kubha Abhayaudi bhaliga nibhakola obwenge bho kumwita.
Woli amalya ga Bhayaudi, amalya ge bhiuna, galiga yei.
Niwo abhamula bhabho nibhamubwila ati, “Soka anu ugende Uyaudi, koleleki ebheigisibwa bhao kutyo kutyo bhalole ebhikolwo bhinu oukola.
Atalio unu kakola lyona lyona mu mbisike kenu omwene nenda okubhulika abwelu. Alabha ukakola emisango jinu, wiyeleshe omwene ku chalo.”
Nolwo abhamula bhabho ona bhatamwikilisishe.
Niwo Yesu nabhabwila ati, “Omwanya gwani guchali kwiya, nawe omwanya gwemwe bhuli mwanya nogumalila.
Echalo chitakutula kubhiililwa emwe, nawe echibhiililwa enye kwo kubha obhubhambasi ubha ebhikolwa byae ni bhibhibhi.
Mulinye mugende ku malya; anye nitakujayo kumalya linu ni kwokubha omwanya gwani guchali kukumisibwa.”
Ejile amala okwaika emisango ejo kubhene, asigaye Galilaya.
Nolwo kutyo, abhamula bhabho bhejile bhagenda ku malya, niwo nomwene nagenda, atali kwo bwelu nawe mwibhete.
Abhayaudi bhaliga nibhamulonda kumalya no kwaika ati, “Alyaki?”
Nikubhao amasimulo mafu mu bhise ingulu yaye. Abhangi nibhaika ati, “Ni munu wa kisi.” Abhangi nibhaika ati, “Uli, kabhebheya ebhise.”.
Nolwo kutyo atalio unu amwaikile bwelu ingulu yaye kwo kubhaya Abhayaudi.
Omwanya gwa malya gwejile gwakinga agati, Yesu nalinya nagenda mwiyekalu namba okwiigisha.
Abhayaudi bhaliga nibhatang'ang'ala no kwaika ati,”Omunu unu amenye emisango myafu? atasomele kata.”
Yesu nabhasubya nabhabwila ati, “Ameigisho gani gatali gani, nawe gaye unu antumile.
Alabha wona wona kenda okukola obwenji bwae alimenya okwiigisha jinu alabha jasokele ku Nyamanga, alabha enaika okusoka kwanye ela.
Bhuli unu kaika okusoka kumwene kayenja likusho lyae, nawe bhuli unu kayenja likusho lyae unu antumile, omunu ununi we chimali, na munda yaye atalimo bhutalengelesi.
Musa atabhayaye emwe ebhilagilo? Nawe atalio nolwo umwi mwimwe unu kagwata ebhilagilo. Kubhaki omwenda okunyita?
Ebhise nibhamubya ati, “Uli no musambwa. Niga unu kayenja okukwita?”
Yesu nasubya nabhabwila ati, “Nakola omulimu gumwi, nemwe bhona nimulugula.
Musa abhayaye okutenda (tali ati eisoka ku Musa, nawe iliya eisoka ku bhalata), na ku sabhato omutenda omunu.
Alabha omunu akalamila okutendwa kulusiku lya isabhato koleleki ebhilangilo bya Musa byitanyamuka, kubhaki omumbiililwa anye kwo kubhaki nakolele omunu kubha muanga kata ku sabhato?
Musige okulamula okwinganyisha nolususo, nawe mulamule mulengele.
Abhandi yebwe okusoka Yerusalemu nibhaika ati, “Atali unu oyoabhayenja okumwita?
Na lola, kaikila abwelu abwelu, na bhatakumubwila chona chona ingulu yae. Itakutula kubha ati abhakulu abhamenya echimalikubha unu ni Kristo, Eitula okubha?
Echimenya unu omunu asokele aki. Kristo alibhaja, nolwo kutyo atalio unu alimenya aki kasoka.”
Yesu aliga naikila ingulu muyekalu, neigisha naika ati, “Emwe bhona mumenyele enye no mumenya enu enisoka. Nitejile kubwani, nawe unu antumile ni we chimali, na mutakumumenya omwene.
Enimumenya omwene kwo kubha nisokele kwaye na antumile.”
Bhaliga nibhayenja okumsita, nawe atalio nolwo umwi enamusishe okubhoko kwaye ingulu kwo kubha omwanya gwae gwaliga guchali kwiya.
Nolwo kutyo abhafu mu bhise nibhamwikilisha. Nibhaika ati, “Kristo alibhaja, alikola ebhibhalikisho byafu okukila bhinu akolele omunu unu?”
Abhafarisayo nibhongwa ebhise mbetong'anila emisango jinu ejimwimako Yesu, na bhakulu bha bhagabhisi na Bhafarisayo nibhatuma abhasilikale koleleki bhamugwate.
Niwo Yesu naika ati, “Guchali omwanya mutoto nili amwi emwe, na enigenda ku mwene unu antumile.
Mulinyenja nawe mutalimbona; nenu enigenda mutakutula kuja.”
Kulwejo Abhayaudi nibhaikana abheigisibhwa kwa bhene, “Omunu unu kenda kujaaki ati chitakutula okumulola? Kenda kuja kubhanu bhanyalambukele agati ya Wayunani no kubheigisha Abhayunani?
Nimusangoki gunu kaika, 'Mulinyenja nawe mutalimbona; eyo enigenda mutakutula kujayo'?”
Woli olusiku lwo bhutelo, olusiku olukulu lwa malya, Yesu emeleguyu naikila ingulu, naika ati, “Alabha wona wona unu ketwa obhulilo, aje kwanye anywe.
Unu kanyikilisha anye, lwa kutyo jandikilwe, okusoka munda yani jiliulula emisima ja manji go bhuanga.”
Nawe aikile nigwo Mwoyo unu abhene bhalimwikilisha no kumulamila; Mwoyo aliga achali kusosibwa kwo kubha Yesu aliga achali kukusibwa.
Mbe abha mu bhise, bhejile bhongwa emisango jinu, nibhaika ati, “Nichimali unu ni mulagi.”
Abhandi nibhaika ati, “ni Kristo.” Nawe abhandi nibhaika ati, “niki, Kristo katula okusoka Galilaya?
Amaandiko gatakwikaga ati Kristo kasoka mu lwibhulo lwa Daudi no kusoka Bethlehemu, mu musi gunu Daudi aligamo?
Kutyo, aliya nikubhao okwauna agati ye bhise kulwae.
Abhandi agati yebhe nibhenda okumugwata, nawe atalio unu amuteeko amabhoko ingulu yae.
Niwo bhaliya abhasilikale nibhasubha ku bhakulu bha bhagabhisi na Abhafarisayo, nabho nibhamubwila ati, “Kubhaki mutamuleta?”
Abhasilikale nibhamubya ati, Atalio omunu unu alaikile lwoyo.”
Niwo Abhafarisayo nibhamubya ati, “Nemwe ona abhabhabhebheya?
Alio wona wona agati ya bhakulu unu amwikilisishe, amwi yona yona wa Bhafarisayo?
Nawe bhanu ebhise bhatakumenya ebhilagilo-bheimilwe.”
Nikodemo nabhabwila ati (unu amwijileko Yesu kala, niwe umwi wa Bhafarisayo),
Mbe ebhilagilo byeswe ebhilamula omunu bhachali kumungwa kwamba no kumenya chinu kakola?”
Nibhasubya nibhamubwila ati, “Nawe ona wasokele Galilaya? Yenja na ulole ati atalio mulagi unu asokele Galilaya.”
Mbe bhuli munu agendele mu musi gwae.
Yesu agendele muchima che mizaituni.
Namweja katondo naja Lindi muyekalu, na bhanu bhona nibhamulubha neyanja nabheigisha.
Abhandiki na Bhafarisayo nibhaleta omugasi unu bhagwatile mu bhulomelwa. Nibhamutula agati.
Niwo nibhamubwila Yesu ati, “Omwiigisha, omugasi unu bhamugwata mubhulomelwa,
Woli, echilagilo cha Musa achilagiliye okubhalasa amabhui abhanu lwa bhanu, owaika kutiki ingulu yaye?
Bhaikile ago okumusaka koleleki bhabhone omusango gwo kumubhula, nawe Yesu nenama asi nandika kwe Chala chaye.
Bhejile bhagendelela nibhamubhusha, nemelegulu nabhabwila ati, “Oyo atali na chibhibhi kwimwe, abhe wa kwamba okumulasa amabhui.”
Nenama lindi asi, nandika kwe Chala chae.
Bhejile bhongwa ago bhagendele oumwi no undi okwambila kumukaluka. kubhutelo Yesu nasigalao enyele ela, amwi no mugasi aliga agati yebwe.
Yesu nemelegulu nabhabwila ati, “Omugasi, abho abhakusitaka bhalyaki? Atalio nolwo umwi oyo kamulamula?”
Naika ati,” Atalio nolwo umwi Lata bhugenyi.” Yesu naika ati, “nolwo anye nitakulamula. Genda njila yao okwambila oli no kugendelela utakola chibhibhi lindi.”
Lindi Yesu naloma na bhanu naika ati, “Anye ni bwelu bwa isi; oyo kandubha atakulibhata muchisute kabha no bwelu bwo bhuanga.”
Abhafalisayo nibhamubwila ati, Owibhambalila omwene; obhubhambasi bwao bhutali bwe chimali.”
Yesu nasubya nabhabwila ati, “Nolwo nikebhambalila omwene, obhubhambasi bhana ni bwe chimali. Enimenya eyo enisoka niyo enigenda, nawe emwe mutakumenya eyo enisoka neyo enigenda.
Emwe omulamula chinyamubwili; Anye nitakulamula ona ona.
Anye nolwo nikalamula, obhulamusi bwani ni bwe chimali okubha nitali wenyele, nawe nili na Lata oyo antumile.
Nikwo nebhilagilo byemwe byandikilwe ati obhubhambasi bwa bhanu bhabhili no bwe chimali.
Anye enibhambalila, na Lata oyo antumile kambambalila.”
Nibhamubwila ati, Lata wao alyaki?” Yesu nasubya ati, “Anye mutakumenya nolwo Lata wani mutakumunyenya mwakasangile nimumenya anye mwakamumenyele na Lata wani.
Aikile emisango ejo Ali ayei need chibhikilo awo aliga neigisha mu yekalu, na Atalio nolwo umwi oyo amugwatile ku kubha omwanya gwae gwaliga guchali kukinga.
Mbe nabhabwila lindi ati, “Nagenda jani; nawe mulinyenja na mulifwila mu bhibhibhi byemwe. eyo enigenda, mutakutula kujayo.”
Abhayaudi nibhzika ati, “Kajaokwiita omwene, okubha aikile ati, 'eyo enigenda mutakula kujayo'?”
Yesu nabhabwila ati, “Omusoka emwalo; anye enisoka injulu. Emwe ni bha isi inu; anye ntali wa isi inu.
Kulwejo, nabhabwila ati mulifwila mubhibhibhi byemwe. mwikilishe okubha ANYE NIWE, omufwa mu bhibhibhi byemwe”.
Kulwejo nibhamubwila ati, “Awe niga?” Yesu nabhabwila ati, galiya nabhabwiliye ku bwambilo.
ninajo emisango mwafu ejokuloma no kulamula ingulu yemwe. Nolwo kutyo, unu antumile ni we chimali; ne misango ejo nonguwe okusoka kwemwe, ne misango ejo enijaika mu si;
Bhatamwelewe ati aliga naika nabho eja Lata.
Yesu anaika ati, “mukamuyanika ingulu Omwana wo munu, awo mulimenya okubha ANYE NIWE, na ati nitakukola lyonalyona kubwani any akabha Lata anyiigisishe, enaika emisango jinu.
Unu antumile ali amwi nanye, nomwene atakusiga wenyele, bhuli katungu enikola agoagamukondela.”
Omwanya Yesu naika emisango ejo abhafu nibhamwikilisha.
Yesu naika ati kubhaliya Abhayaudi abho bhamwikilisishe, “Akabha mukeyanja misango jani, ndiwo omubha bheigisibwa bhani bhechimali,
Emwe mulimenya echimali, ne chimali chilibhatula mumulabho.”
Nibhamubya ati, “Eswe ni lwibholo lwa Ibrahimu na kata chichaliga kubha asi yobhugaya bhonabhona owaikaki, “Echitulwa muchilabho?”
Yesu nabhasubya ati, “Nichimali, nichimali enibhabwila ati, oyokakola echibhibhi ni mugaya we chibhibhi.
Omugaya atakwiyanja munyumba mwanya gwona; Omwana kekala siku jona.
Kulwejo, akabha Omwana akabhatula muchilabho, omubha muchilabho chimali kata.”
Enimenya ati emwe ni lwibholo lwa Ibrahimu; omundonda okunyita kulwa injuno yo musango gwani gutana mwanya agati yemwe.
Enaika amagambo ganu nalolele amwi na Lata want, emwona abhene omukola amagambo ganu mwonguwe okusoka kwi esomwana wemwe.”
Mbe nibhamubya no kumubhwila ati, “Lata weswe ni Aburamu.” Yesu nabhabwila ati, “Chisanga muli bhana bha Aburamu, mwakakolele emilimu ja Aburamu.
Nolwo olyanu omuiga okunyita, omunu unu abhabhwiliye echimali ati nonguwe okusoka ku Nyamuanga. Aburamu atakolele kutyo.
Omukola emilimu je somwana.” Ni bhamubhwila ati, “Chitebhuwe mubhulomesi, China Lata umwi, unu ali Nyamuanga.
Yesu nabhabwila ati, “Akabha Nyamuanga ni Lata wemwe, mwakanyendele anye, okubha nisokele ku Nyamuanga; okubha nitejile kubwani, nawe unu antumile.
Kulwaki mutakungwila emisango jani? kwokubha mutakutula kwikomesha okungwa emisango jani
Amwe ni bha esomwana wemwe, shetani, no mwenda okujikola okuligila eje somwana wemwe. okwimilegulu muchimali kwo kubha echimali chitalimo kwimwe. Akaloma olubhei, kaloma okusoka mukatungilwe kaye okubha ni mubhei ne semwene nimubhei.
Nolwo woli, kwo kubha enaika ebye chimali, mutakunyikilisha.
Niga kwimwe unu katula okumbambalila ati ndine chibhibhi? akabha ninaika ebye chimali, kubhaki mutakunyikilisha?
Unu ali Wanyamuanga kongwa emisango ja Nyamuanga; emwe mutakungwila kwo kubha emwe mutali bha Nyamuanga.”
Abhayaudi nibhamubya nibhamubwila ati, chitaikile echimali kubha awe ni Musamalia na una lisambwa?”
Yesu nasubya ati, tali nesambwa; nawe enibhala Lata wani, nemwe mutakumubhala.
Nitakuyenja likusho lyani; alio umwi unu kayenja no kulamula.
Nichimali, chimali, enibhabwila ati, unu kagwata omusango gwani, atalibhona lufu kajanende.”
Abhayaudi nibhamubya ati, “Oli chamenya ati uli no musambwa. Abrahamu na bhaligi bhafue; nawe owaika ati, 'Akabha omunu atakugwata omusango gwani, akulabha lufu.'
Awe utali mukulu kukila Lata weswe Abrahamu unu afuye, na bhalagi ona bhafuye. Awe owikola kubha niga?”
Yesu nasubya ati, “Akabha nikekusha nenyele, okwikusha kwani ni kwa kutyo ela; ni Lata wani niwekankusha - onu omwaika kubha Nyamuanga wemwe.
Emwe mutamumenyaga omwene, nawe anye nimumenyele omwene. Akabha nikaika ati,'nitakumumenya,' enijosusana nemwe, bhanu omubheya. Nolwo kutyo, nimumenyele nemisango jaye nijigwatile.
Lata weswe Abrahamu akondewe okulola olusiku lwani; nalulola nakondelelwa.”
Abhayaudi nibhamubwila ati, “uchali kumala mwaka makumi gatanu awe umulolele Ibrahimu?”
Yesu nabhabwila ati, “Nichimali, chimali, nabhabwila ati, Abrahimu achali kwibhulwa, ANYE NDIO.”
Mbe nibhagenda amabhui bhabhone okumubhuma, nawe Yesu neibhisa nauluka mu yekalu.
Omwanya, Yesu aliga achaitingana nalola omunu omufu kusoka kwibhulwa kwaye.
Abheigisibwa bhaye nibhamusha ati, “Rabi, niniga oyoakolele echibhibhi, omunu unu ni bhebhusi bhaye nolwo ebhulwe muofu?”
Yesu nasubya ati, “Atali unu omunu nolwo bhebhusi bhaye abho bhakolele echibhibhi, nawe emilimu ja Nyamuanga jibhonekanilwe kumwene.
Kuchiile okukola emilimu jae unu antumile omwanya guchali mumsisi ingeta eija anu atalio oyokatula okukola emilimu.
Omwanya nilio musi, anye ni bwelu bwa musi.”
Ejile Yesu akaika emisango ejo, natula asi, nakola amatoto kwa mafwefu amuwola uliya omunu kumeso na matoto.
Namubwila ati, genda woge muchinyo cha Siloamu (obhugajulo unu' antumile').” Kulwejo unu omunu nagenda, nesabha, nasubha, nalola.
Abhekashanya bha uliya omunu na bhaliya abho bhamulolele kubwambilo mwisabhilisha nibhaika ati, Mbe unu atali uliya omunu oyoaliga niyanja no kusabwa?” abhandi nibhaika ati, “Niwe.”
Na bhandi nibhaika ati, “Atali, nawe kasusana nage.” Nawe aliga naika ati, “Nanye.”
Nibhamubwila ati, “Woli ameso gao gabhandulwa atiki?”
Nasubya, omunu oyo kabhilikilwa Yesu akolele amatoto na mola ameso gani no kumubwila genda Siloam wisabhe.' Kulwejo ningenda, ninisabha nimbona okulola lindi.”
Nibhamubwila ati, “Alyaki?” Nasubya ati, “Nitakumenya.”
Nibhamubya uliya oyo aliga muofu ku Bhafarisayo.
Nawe lwaliga luli lusiku lwa isabhato omwanya Yesu akolele matoto no kugabhandula ameso gaye.
Niwo lindi Abhafarisayo nibhamubhusha wamabhona kutiki okulola. Nabhabwila ati, “Atulele amatoto kumeso gani, ninisabha na woli enitula okulola.”
Abhafarisayo abhandi nibhaika ati, “Omunu unu atasokele ku Nyamuanga kwo kubha ataigwata isabhato.” Abhandi bhaikile ati, “Itulikana atiki omunu we bhibhibhi okukola ebhibhalikisho kwebyo?” Kukwejo nikubhayo okutagana kwebhe.
Niwo nibhamubhusha uliya omuofu lindi, “Owaika atiki ingulu yaye kwo kubha agabhanduye ameso gaye?” Omuofu naika ati, “Ni mulagi.”
Nolwo omwanya gunu Abhayaudi bhatamwikilisishe atialiga muofu nawe amakola kutiki okulola mbe bhabhilikiye abhebhusi bhaye unu abhene okulola.
Nibhabhabhusha abhebhusi, Mbe, unu no mwana wemwe omwaika kutiki ebhuliwe muofu? atulakutiki okulola
Kutyo awebhusi bhaye nibhamusubya ati, “Echimenya kubha unu no mwana wemwe ebhuwe muofu.
Nawe Kutyo kalola chitakumenya, oyo amubhanduye ameso gaye, chitakumenya. Mumubhushe omwene. Ni munu mukulu. Alaika omwene.”
Abhebhusi bhaye bhaikile emisango ejo, kwo kubha bhobhaga Abhayaudi. Kulwejo Abhayaudi bhaliga bhogwene kubha, akabha lyona lyona ekekilisha kubha Yesu ni Kristo kaulwa na Lisinagogi.
Kwo kubha linu, awebhusi bhaye bhaikili,” Ni munu mukulu mumubhushe omwene.”
Kulwejo olwa kabhili, bhamubhuma uliya omunu oyoaligabheye muofu namubwila ati, “Muyane Nyamuanga likusho. Chimenyele ati omunu unu ni wechibhibhi.”
Niwo uliya omunu nasubya ati, “Abhe ni wechibhibhi, anye nitakumenya. Chinu chimwi echoenimenya: naliga muofu, na woli enilola.”
Niwo bhamubwiliye ati, “Amakukolela chinuki? Agabhanduye kutiki ameso gao?”
Nasubya ati, “Namalile okubhabwila nemwona mutategelisishe! Kubhaki omwenda okugwa lindi? Nemwona omwenda okubha bheigisibwa bhae ona, kutyo?
Bhamufumile nibhaika ati, “Awe ni mwiigisibwa waye, nawe eswe nibheigisibwa bha Musa.
Echimenya ati Nyamuanga alomele na Musa, nawe kuunu omunu, chitakumenya eyo asokele
Oliya omunu nasubya nabhabwila ati, “Kubhaki gunu ni musango gwo kulugusha, ati mutakumenya eyokasoka, na ka ambanduye ameso gani.
Chimenyele kubha Nyamuanga atakubhategelesha abhe bhibhibhi, nawe alabha omunu wona wonawona oyo kamulamya Nyamuanga no kukola chinu kenda, Nyamuanga kamugwa.
Okwamba kwa isi chichaliga kata kungwa ati wona wonawona amabhandula ameso go munu oyo ebhuwe muofu.
Alabha omunu unu atasokele ku Nyamuanga, atakutula kukola chona chona.”
Nibhamusubya no kumubwila ati, “Webhuliwe muchibhibhi nawe uchiigisha eswe?” Niwo mbamubhilimya okusoka kwi sinagogi.
Yesu nongwa ati bhamusoshao kwi sinagogi. namulola na mubwila ati, “Uwikilisha Omwana wo munu?”
Nasubya naika ati, “Niga, Lata bhugenyi, koleleki anye nimwikilishe?”
Yesu nabhabwila ati, “Omulola, unu Kaika nage niwe.”
Uliya omunu naika ati, “Lata bhugenyi, Nekilisha.” Niwo nifukamya.
Yesu naika ati, “Kwo kulamula nijili musi inu koleleki abho bhatakulola bholole na bhaliya abhoabhalola bhabhe bhaofu.”
Abhandi bha Mafarisayo bhaliga bhali amwi nage nibhogwa emisango ejo no bhamubhusha ati, “Neswe ona ni bhaofu?”
Yesu nabhabwila ati, “Alabha mwakabheye bhaofu mutakabheye ne chibhibhi. Nolwo kutyo, woli omwaika ati, Echilola,' echibhibhi chemwe chilio.”
Nichali, chimali enibhabwila ati, uliya atakwingila nokutula mu mulyango gwa ligutu lya jinama, nawe nalinyila kwa injila eindi, omunu oyo nimwifi no musakusi.
Oyo kengila mu mulyango ni mulefi wa jinama.
Oyo omwigasi wo mulyango kamwigulila. Jinama ejungwa obhulaka bwae najibhilikila jinama jae kwa masina gabho najiulusha anja.
Woli amala okujiulusha anja ejae jona, najitangatila, na jinama nijimulubha kwo kubha, abhamenya obhulaka bwae.
Jitakumulubha omugenyi nawe nibheya nijimwiluka, okubha jitakumenya elaka lya bhagenye.”
Yesu nabhabwila echijekekanyo chinu kubhene, nawe bhatamenyele emisango jinu ejoaliga naika kubhene.
Yesu nabhabwila lindi ati,”nichimali, chimali nabhabwila ati, Anye nili mulyango gwa jinama.
Bhona bhanu bhatangatiye ni bhefi na bhasakusi, nawe jinama jitabhonguwe.
Anye ni mulyango. Wona wona akengila okulabha kwanye, alikila alingila munda nauluka, nomwene alibhona obhulebhelo.
Omwifi atakuja tali kaletwa okwibha, no kwita, no kusimagisha. Nijili koleleki bhabhone obhuanga na bhabhe nabho bhufule.
Anye ni mulefi wa kisi. Omulefi wakisi kategayo obhuanga kulwa jinama.
Omukosi unu kalebhela omuyelo, atali omulefi, unu jinama jitali jae, kalola omusige nibhaja nabhasiga neluka jinama.
No musege abhajigwata no kubhanyalambula. Neluka okubha ni mukosi wa muyelo natakujimenya jinama.
Anye ni mulefi we kisi, nimenyele abhani na bhani enibhamenya anye.
Lata amenyele one nimumenyele Lata one enitegayo obhuanga bwani kulwa jinama.
Ninajo jinama ejindi jitali ja mwigutu linu. Nabho bheile okubhaleta one jilungwa lilaka lyani jilibha eijo limwi no mulefi umwi.
Nikwo kubha Lata anyendele: Nisoshe obhuanga bwani nibhugege lindi.
Atalio kabhugega okusoka kwanye, nawe anye enibhusosha omwene, Ndino bhuinga bwo kusosha, na ndino bhuinga bwo kubhugega ona. Niyabwilwe echilagilo chinu okusoka ku Lata.”
Okwaukana lindi nikusokelela agati ya bhayaudi kwo kubha ye misango ejo.
Abhafu mwabho nibhaika ati,”Ali no musambwa na asalile. kulwaki omumutegelesha?”
Abhandi nibhaika ati,”Emisango jinu jitali ja munu unu ali no musambwa. Omusambwa ogutula okwigula ameso go muofu?”
Niwo nigaja amalya gokuchuma Yerusalemu.
gwaliga guli omwanya gwa mbeo, na Yesu aliga nalibhata mu yekalu muchisunya cha Sulemani.
Niwo Abhayaudi nibhamusingila nibhamubwila ati, “Ulikigyalii ulichitula mukwitimata? alabha awe ni Kristo, chibwile bwelu.
Yesu nabhasubya ati, “Nabhabwiliye nawe mutakwikilisha. Emilimu ejo enikola mwisina lya Lata wani, ejo enibhambalila ingulu yani.
Nolwo kutyo mutakwikilisha okubha emwe mutali bha jinama jani
Jinama jani abhongwa lilaka lyani; Nibhamenyele, ejene nijindubha anye.
Nabhayanile obhuanga bwa kajanende; bhatalisingalika kata na atalio nolwo umwi unu alijinyugumbula okusoka mu kubhoko kwani.
Lata wani, abhoanae bhanu, ni mukulu kukila abhandi bhona, na atalio nolwo umwi unu katula okujinyungumbula okusoka mu kubhoko kwa Lata.
Anye na Lata chili amwi.”
Nibhagega amabhui okumulasa lindi.
Yesu nabhasubha ati, “Nabhelesha emilimu myafu emilesi okusoka ku Lata. Kwe milimu mwijo omwenda okundasa amabhui?”
Abhayaudi nibhamusubya ati,”Chikulasa amabhui kwo mulimu gwona gwona guli gwa kisi, nawe kulwo kufuma, kwo kubha awe, uli munu, kowikola kubha Nyamuanga.”
Yesu nabhasubya ati, “jitandikilwe mubhilagilo byemwe, 'Naikile, “Amwe muli bhanyamuanga'”?'
ALabha abhatogele bhanyamuanga, kubhaliya abho Omusango gwa Nyamuanga libhbejiye (na mandiko gatakutula kuwao),
Nibhaika ingulu ya uliya unu Lata amusosishe na mutuma musi, 'Kafuma, 'kwo kubha naikile, 'anye ni Mwana wa Nyamuanga'?
Nikabha nitakukola emilimu ja Lata wani, musige kunyikilisha.
Nolwo kutyo, alabha nikajikola, nolwo mutakunyikilisha, mujikilishe emilimu koleleki mumenye ati Lata ali mwanye nanye ndi Mulata.”
Nibhayenja lindi okumugwata Yesu, nawe nagenda jaye nasoka mumabhoko gebwe.
Yesu nagenda jae lindi ngego ya Yordani anu Yohana aliga nabhatija okwamba niyanja eyo.
Abhanu bhafu nibhaja ku Yesu. Nibhagendelela nibhaika ati, “Yohana chimali atakolele echibhalikisho chona chona, nawe emisango jona ejoaikile Yohana ingulu ya unu omunu nijechimali.”
Abhanu bhafu nibhamwikilisha Yesu awo.
Mbe munu umwi lisina lyaye Lazaro aliga alwaye. Asokele Bethania, mu musi gunu Mariamu no muyala wejabho Martha.
Aliga ni Mariamu uliya oyo abhambagile Lata bhugenyi Marhamu namukubhula ebhigele byaye kwa jifwili jaye, unu omundulume waye Lazaro aliga alwaye.
Mbe abhasubhati bhanu nibhasila obhulagile ku Yesu nibhaika ati,” Latabhugenyi, lola uliya umwendele alwaye.
Yesu ajile ogwa naika ati, Obhulwaye bhunu bhutali bwa kumwita, nawe, kulwalikusho lya Nyamuanga, omwana wa Nyamuanga abhone okukusibwa kubwo bhulwaye.”
Yesu amwendele Martha no muyala wejabho na Lazaro.
Ajile ongwa ati Lazaro ni mulwaye. Yesu nosayo siku ebhili anu aliga.
Nuwo kulinu nabwila abheigisibwa bhaye ati,” chisubheyo Uyahudi lindi.”
Abheigisibwa nibhamubwila ati,”Rabi, Wayahudi bhaliga nibhayenja okukulasa amabhui ko wenda okusubheyo lindi.
Yesu nasubya ati, “jisaa ja mu musi jitali ekumina na kabhili? Omunu akalibhata mu mwisi atakutula okwikujulaoku okubha kalola obwelu bwa mu mwisi.
Nolwo kutyo akabha nalibhata mungeta kekujula okubha obwelu bhutalimo mukatungilwe kaye.”
Yesu naika ati emisango jinu, nabhabwila ati,”Omusani weswe Lazaro aongeye, nawe enigenda koleleki nibhone okumulafya okusoka mu ntilo.”
Nuwo abheigisibwa bhaye nibhamubwila ati, Lata bhugenyi, alabha aongeye, kaja okulafya.
Omwanya gunu Yesu aikile ku kufwa kwa Lazaro, nawe abhene nibheganilisha ati kaika ingulu wo kuongela kwa ntilo.
Nuwo Yesu naika nabho bwelu bwlu,”Lazaro afuye.
Ninalikondelelwa kulwemwe, ati natabheyeo celiya koleleki mubhone okwikwilisha. Chigende mumwene.”
Mbe Tomaso, oyo katogwa amalongo, nabhabwila abheigisibwa bhejabho ati neswe chigende chifwe amwi na Yesu.”
Omwanya Yesu ejile, asangile Lazaro abheye mufwa siku ena.
Bethania yaliga yei na Yerusalemu sitandio makumi gana netanu kutyo.
Abhafu agati ya Bhayaudi bhejile ku Martha na Mariamu okubhasilisha kulwo mundulume webwe.
Nuwo Martha ejileongwa ati Yesu kaja, nagenda okumulamila, nawe Mariamu nasigala eyanjile munyumba.
Mbe Martha namubwila yesu ati,”Lata bhugenyi, wakabheye olio omundulume wani atakafuye.
Nolwo woli, nimenyele okubha jone ulasabwa okusoka Kunyamuanga, kakuyana.”
Yesu namubwila ati, omundulume wao kasuluka lindi.”
Martha namubwila ati, nimenyele ati, alisukila kubhusoko bwo lusiku lwo bhutelo.”
Yesu namubwila ati,” Anye nibhusuko no bhuanga unu kekilisha akabheye afuye nolwo kutyo anobhuanga;
Noyo kekala no kunyikilisha anye atakufwa. We kilisha linu?”
Namubwila ati,'Nikwo, Lata Bhugenyi nekilisha awe ni Kristo, omwana wa Nyamuanga, unu kaja musi.”
Ejille amala okwaika linu nagenda jaye nabhilikila. omuyala wejabho Mariamu mwitebhe. Naika ati omwiigisha alyanu kakubhilikila.
Mariamu ejile ongwa emukile bhangu, nagenda ku Yesu.
Yesu aliga achali kukinga mu musi, nawe aliga achali anu Martha.
Mbe Abhayahudi bhaliga na Mariamu mu nyumba na bhaliya abhasilisya, bhejile bhamulola nemelegulu bhangu no kusoka anja, nibhamulubha; nibhetogela ati kagenda kufwa ajokulila eyo.
Mbe mariamu ejile akinga aliya Yesu namulola, agwa asi kubhigele byeye namubwila ati,”Lata bhugenyi, wakabheye ulio omundulume wani atakafuye.”
Yesu ejilia akamulola nalila, na Abhayahudi nibhaja amwi nage bhaliga nibhalila nalumwa mu mwoyo no kusulumbala;
Naika ati,” Mwamuteye aki? nibhamubwila ati, Lata bhugenyi, ija ulole.”
Yesu nalila.
Mbe Abhayahudi nibhaika ati,” Lola kwoko aliga amwendele Lazaro!”
Nawe abhafu agati yebwe nibhaika ati,” Atali unu omunu oyo eguye ameso ga uliya oyo aliga muofu, akatulile okuingilila omunu unu atafwa?”
Mbe yesu, nalumwa mumutima gwaye lindi, nagenda kufwa Woli yaliga nsenga, na libhui liteyweko ingulu yaye.
Yesu naika ati,” Mulisoshewo libhui.”Martha omuyala wejabho na Lazaro, unu afuye, namubwila Yesu ati,”Lata bhugenyi ku mwanya gunu, omubhili gwabholele, kwo kubha afuye siku ena.”
Yesu namubwila ati,”Anye nitakubwiliye ati, ukekilisha, oulola likusho lya Nyamuanga?
Kulwejo nasoshao libhui. Yesu nenamusha ameso gaye ingulu anaika ati,”Lata enikusima okubha wanyuguwe.
Nimenyele ati ounyungwa kusiku, nawe kulwa likofyanya linu lisingiye koleleki naike jinu, bhabhone okwikilisha ati awe wantumele.”
Ejile amala okwika kutyo, nalila kwo bhulaka bhenene,”Lazaro, soka anja!”
Omufuye nasoka anja abhoyelwe amabhoko na magulu kwo mwenda gwo kusikilwa no bhusu bwaye bhubhoyelwe nechitambala.” Yesu nabhabwila ati,”Nimumusulumule musige agende.”
Mbe Abhayahudi bhafu bhejile ku Mariamu no kumulola Yesu echoakolele, nibhamwilisha;
Nawe abhandi yebwe bhagendele ku Mafalisayo nibhamubwila emisango ejoakolele Yesu.
Niwo abhakulu bha bhagabhisi na bhafalisayo nibhekumanya amwi muchilaji nibhaika ati,”chikole kutiki? omunu unu kakola ebhibhalikisho bhafu.
Alabha chikamusiga kutyo wenyele, bhone abhamwilisha; Abhalumi bhalija okugega byona isi yeswe na liyanga lyeswe.”
Nolwo kutyo, omunu umwi mu bhona, Kayafa, aliga mugabhisi Omukulu mumwaka ogwo, nabhabwila ati, “Mutakumenya chonachona chimali.
Mutakwiganilisha ati kubheile kwemwe ati omunu umwi kwiile okufwa kulwa bhanu kukila liyanga lyona no kubhulao.”
Ganu atagaikile kwokubha omwene aliga mugabhisi omukulu omwaka guliya, nalagila ati Yesu kafwa kulwa liyanga;
Neswe kulwa liyanga Yesu abhone okubhakumanya abhana bha Nyamuanga bhanu bhanyalambukile kulakula.
Kulwejo okusoka kulusiku olwo nokugendelela nibhalwaja okumwita Yesu.
Yesu atalibhatile lindi bwelu bwelu agati ya Bhayaudi, nawe nasokayo nagenda ku chalo chiliyei na ibhala mu mu si ngutogwa Efraimu. Hao eyanjile na bheigisibwa.
Nawe Ipasaka ya Bhayaudi yaliga ayei nabhafu, nibhalinya okugenda Yerusalemu anja yo mu si ichali okubha ipasaka koleleki bhabhone okwiyesha abhene.
Bhaliga nibhamuyenja Yesu, nibhaikana bhuli umwi awobhaliga bhemeleguyu muyekalu, “Omwiganilisha kutiki? Ati atakuja ku malya?”
Omwanya gunu abhakulu bha bhagabhisi na bhafarisayo bhaliga bhasosishe obhulamusi ati alabha umwi akamenya Yesu anu ali, aiki koleleki bhabhone okumugwata.
Olusiku lwa katanu na imwi ichali ipasaka, Yesu agendele Bethania, anualiga Lazaro, unu asuluye okusoka mu bhafuye.
Mbe nibhamutekelayo ebyilo bya kegolo eyo na Martha nakeleketa, omwanya ogwo Lazaro aliga ali umwi ku bhaliya bheyanjile kubyilo amwi na Yesu.
Mbe Mariamu nagega ratli ya malange ago gakonjelwe kwa nardo inkonde eyobhulambu muno, namubhambaga Yesu ebhigele, na mukubhula ebhigele kwa jifwili jaye; inyumba yona niijula obhulange bha mafuta.
Yuda Iskariote, umwi wa bhaliya abheigisibwa bhaye, unu aliga nenda okumulomela inuku Yesu, naika ati,
“Kubhaki amafuta ganu gatakakanibwe kwa dinali magana gasatu ni bhabhana abhataka?
Nawe aikile kutyo atali kubhafyila echigongo abhataka, kwokubha aliga mwifi: niwe omugumya wa isagwa gwa impilya aliga nagegamoga ebyo bhatulamoga okubha byaye wenyele.
Yesu anaika ati,”Mumusige atuleo echo alinacho kulwejo okulusi lwo kusikwa lwani.
Omutaka mulinabho siku jona; nawe mutakubha nanye siku jona.”
Mbe echise chinene cha Bhayaudi bhamenyele ati Yesu aliyo, nibhaja, atali kulwa, Yesu ela nawe bhamulole na Lazaro unu Yesu asuluye okusoka mu bhafuye.
Nawe abhakulu bha bhagabhisi nibhakola imbisike okumwita Lazaro;
Kubha kubwaye bhafu Abhayaudi nibhagenda jebwe nibhamwikilisha Yesu.
Olusiku lwa kabhili echise chinene bhaliga bhejile kumalwa. bhejile bhongwa ati Yesu kaja Yerusalemu,
Bhagegele amatabhi gamakinda no kusoka anja nokugenda okumulamila nibhabhuma chikelele,”Hosana! ana libhando unu kaja kwa lisina lya Lata bhugenyi, Omukama wa Israeli.”
Yesu nabhona omwana wa isikili nakalinyako lwa kutyo jandikilwe,
“Utobhaya, muyala wa Sayuni; lola, Omukama wao kaja, alinyile omwana wa isikili
Abheigisibwa bhaye bhatasombokewe emisango ja kubwambilo; Nawe Yesu nakusibwa, niwo nibhechuka okubha emisango jinu andikiwe ati bhakola emisango jinu kumwene.
Mbe liijo lya bhanu abhobhaliga aamwi na Yesu omwanya nibhamubhilkila Lazaro okusoka mufwa, nibhamubhambalila ku bhandi.
Okubha liijo lya bhanu bhagendele okumulamila kwo kubha bhonguwe ati akolele echibhalikilsho echo.
Abhafalisayo nibhaikana abhene kwa bhene, Lola, woli mutakutula kukola lyona; lola isi yagenda mumwene.”
Woli bhalio Abhayunani bhaliga amwi mwa bhaliya abhobhagendaga okulamya kumalya.
Bhanu nibhamulubha Filipo, unu asokaga Bethsaida ya Galilaya, nibhamusabwa nibhaika ati,” Lata bhugenyi, ewse echenda okumulola Yesu;
Filipo nagenda namubwila ati Andrea; Andrea na Filipo nibhagenda nibhamubwila Yesu.
Yesu nabhasubya naika ati,”Omwanya gwakinga kulwejo omwana wa Adamu akusibwe.
Ni chimali, chimali, nabhabwila ati, injuma ya ingano ikalema okugwa ku si nifwa, eiyanja awo yenyele; nawe ikafwa, eibhula amatwasho mafu.
Unu kenda obhuanga bwaye alibhubhusha; nawe unu katamaganwa obhuanga bwaye mu si munu alibhuonya nolwo obhuanga bwa kajanende.
Omunu woona akankolela anye, nandubhe; anye nili eyo omukosi wani labhaga. Omunu woone alankolela, Lata alimuyana echibhalo.
Wolyanu omwoyo gwani gwasulumbala: anye enaikaki?'Lata, nuukishe omwanya gunu'? Nawe kulwejo nikingila mumwanya gunu.
Lata, ulikushe lisina lyao.”Mbe lilaka nilija okusoka mulwile niyaika ati,”Nalikusha anye enilikusha lindi.”
Mbe ebhise byaliga bhimeleguyu yeyi nage nibhogwa nibhaika ati, kugwajuma. Abhandi nibhaika ati,”Malaika aika nage.”
Yesu nasubya naika ati,”Lilaka linu litejile kulwanye nawe ni kubwemwe.
Wolyanu okulamula kwa isi inu ilio: Wolyanu omukulu wa isi inu kesibwa anja.
Anye nakayanikwa ingulu ya isi, ndifutila bhona kwanye.”
Aikile kutyo nolesha okufwa kunu kajokufwa.
Elikofyanya nibhamusubya ati,”eswe chonguwe mubhilagilo ati Kristo kabhalio kajanende. Kawe owaikaki,' Omwana wa Adamu ayanikwe ingulu'? Onu omwana wo munu niga?”
Mbe Yesu nabhabwila ati, “Obwelu bhuchalio amwi nemwe mwanya mutoto Nimulibhate muchali no bwelu, echisute chisige okubhagwatila. Oyo kalibhatila muchisute atakumenya enukaja.
Woli muchali no bwelu, mwikilishe obwelu mubhe bhana bho bwelu.”Yesu ejile amala okwaika nagenda jae niibhisa bhasiga kumulola.
Yesu akolele ebhibhalikisho byafu imbele yebwe, bhatamwikilisishe.
Gukumila omusango gwo mulagi Isaya, aikile ati Lata bhugenyi niga ekilisishe emisango jebwe? No kubhoko kwa Lata bhugenyi kwa sululiwe ga?”
Nikwo bhatekilisishe, kubha Isaya aikile lindi,
“Abhaofushe ameso, nakola emitima jebwe bhasige kulola kwa meso gebwe no kumenyegesha ne mitima jebwe nibhekilisha anye nikebheulisha
Isaya aikile ati emisango jinu kwokubha alolele likusho la Yesu naika emisango jaye.
Nawe, nolwo mubhakulu bhafu bhamwikilisishe Yesu; Nawe kwokubha Abhafarisayo bhatekilisishe bhataja kuilisibwa na sinagogi.
Bhendaga echibhalo cha bhanu kukila echibhalo cha Nyamuanga.
Yesu naikila ingulu naika ati,”Unu kanyikilisha naye, atakwikilisha anye tali unu antumile anye,
Unu kandola anye kamulola unu antumile.
Anye nejile kubha bwelu bwa isi bhuli munu unu kanyikilisha anye atakwikala muchisute.
Akabha omunu woona atakugwata emisango jani nawe atakujigwata, anye nitakumulamila; okubha nitejile okulamula isi nawe nikishe isi.
Unu kalema anye atakwikilisha emisango jani, unu kamulamula: Omusango gunu naika nigwo gulimulamula ku lusiku lwo bhutelo.
Okubha anye nitaikile kwo mutima gwani Nawe ni Lata unu antumile, nawe omwene andagiliye jinu ndaika na jinu ndaika.
Anye nimenyele echilagilo chaye ni bhuanga bwa kajanende nawe jinu enaika anye, lwa kutyo Lata ambwiliye, nikwo enaika kwebwe.”
Woli luchali amalya ga Ipasaka kwo kubha Yesu amenyele kubha omwanya gwaye gwakinga okusoka musi inu okugenda Kwisemwene, abhendele abhanu bhaye bhanu bhaliga bhali musi, abhendele bhutelo.
No omusokwa atulilweo bhangu mumutima gwa Yuda Isikariote, omwana wa Simoni inuku Yesu.
Yesu amenyele ati Esemwene amuyaye ebhinu byona mumabhoko gaye na ati asokele Kunyamuanga na aliga nagenda lindi ku Nyamuanga.
Nemuka kubhilyo nanja asi emyenda jaye. Mbe nagega echitambala nebhoya omwene.
Mbe okumala natula amanji kwisaani namba okubhosha ebhilenge abheigisibwa bhaye nabhifwafuta nechitambala echo aliga ebhoyele omwene.
Nakinga ku Simoni Petro, na Petro namubhila ati,” Lata bhugenyi, Owenda okunyosha ebhigele byani?”
Yesu nasubya namubhwila ati, chinu enikola utachimenya oli nawe ulimenya mala.”
Petro namubwila ati,” Utakunyosha ebhigele byani kata.”Yesu namusubya ati,” Akabha nitakokwosha utali na mugabho amwi nanye.”
Simoni Petro namubwila ati Lata bhugenyi utanyosha bhigele byani ila nawe mabhoko no mutwe gwani.”
Yesu namubwila ati,”Wona unu amalile okwoga atanabhukene nokwiyosha bhigele byaye, na amabha mwelu mubhili gwaye gwona; emwe mulibhelu, nawe atali bhona.”
Kwo kubha Yesu amenyele uliya oyokamulomela inuku; nikwo kubha aikile ati, mutali bhona muli bhelu.”
Omwanya Yesu ejile okubhosha ebhigele byabho nagega omwenda neyanja lindi, nabhabwila ati,” Mbe mwasombokelwa chinu nabhakolela?
Omutoga anye” Mwiigisha” na Lata bhugenyi omwaika chimali niko kutyo nili.
Alabha anye nili Lata bhugenyi no Mwiigisha, nibhosishe ebhigele byemwe, emwe kubheile okubhosha abhejanyu ebhigele.
Okubha nabhayana echijejekanyo emwe mukole kutyo anye nakola kwemwe.
Nichimali, chimali, nabhabwila ati, omugaya atali mukulu kukila esebhugenyi waye; nolwo uliya unu atumwilwe ni mukulu kukila uliya oyo atumilwe.
Akabha oumenya emisango jinu, ulinalibhando ukajikola.
Nitaika kwimwe bhona, okubha enibhamenya bhaliya bhanu nasolele, nawe naika ganu koleleki amandiko gakumile:'Unu kalya ebhilo byani kanyinamusisha echisisinyo chaye.'
Enibhabwila linu woli lichali kubhao likabha lyabhao, mutule okwikilisha okubha anye NIWE.
“Nichimali, chimali, nabhabwila ati, oyokakuma anye kamukuma unu antumile, na uliya oyokakuma anye kamukuma uliya antumile anye.”
Omwanya Yesu amala okwaika ganu, anyakile mu mwoyo, nabhambalila naika ati,”Nichimali, chimali, nabhabwila ati umwi kwimwe kajokundomela inuku.”
Abheigisibwa bhaye nibhalolelana, nibhetimata kulwejo niga unu kaika.
Yaligailio imeja, umwi wa bheigisibwa bhaye eyekekele muchifubha cha Yesu uliya unu Yesu endaga.
Simoni Petro namubhusha omwiigisibwa unu naika ati,”Chibwile niga unu kaikwa.”
Omwiigisisha uliya oyoaliga eyekekele muchifubha cha Yesu namubwila ati,”Latabhugenyi, niga?”
Mbe Yesu nasubya ati,”Unu ndenilisha litonge nokumuyana.”Kutyo ejile enilisha litonge namuyana Yuda omwana wa Simoni Iskariote.
Wejile amala okumuyana litonge, Syetani namwingilamo. Mbe Yesu namubwila ati,”Chinu owenda ochikola chikole bwangu.”
Woli atalio munu kunenda oyo amenyele okubha Yesu aikile emisango jinu kwaye.
Abhandi kwebwe nibhekilisha ati, kwo kubha Yuda niwe agwatile insagwa ya jimpilya, Yesu nabhabwila ati,”Gula ebhinu ebyochikele ebya kumalwa,”amwi atiashoshe echinu kubhataka.
Mbe alabha Yuda ejiamala okulamila litonge, nasoka anja bwangu; na yaliga yabheye ngeta.
Omwanya Yuda ejile agenda, Yesu naika ati,”Woli omwana wo munu akusibwe, na Nyamuanga akusibwe mu mwene.
Nyamuanga akakusibwa mu mwene, kamukusha bwangu.
Abhana bhatoto nili amwi nemwe mwanya mutoto. Mulinyenja, lwa kutyo nabwiliye Abhayaudi ati,' Enu enigenda, mutakula kujayo; woli nabhabwila nemwe, ona.
Enibhayana echilagilo echiyaya ati, mwendane lwa kutyo anye nibhendele emwe, kutyo nemwe mwendane emwe kwemwe.
Kulwejo abhanu bhamenyega okubha emwe ni bheigisibha bhani, akabha mwendane kwa bhuli umwi no undi.”
Simoni Petro namubwila ati,”Lata bhugenyi, oujaki?” Yesu nasubya ati,”Enu enigenda Kwa woli mutakutula kundubha, nawe ulindubha mala.”
Petro namubwila ati,”Lata bhugenyi, kubhaki nitakulubha nolwo woli? Anye nitegeo obhuanga bhani kulwanye;
Yesu nasubya ati,”Mbe oujotegayo obhuanga bhao kubwani? Nichimali chimali enikubwila ati, ing'oko itakulila uchali kunyiganila kwiya kasatu.”
Utekilisha omutima gwao okunyaka. Omumwikilisha Nyamuanga nyikilisha nanye.
Munyumba ya Lata yani bhulimo obwikalo bhafu bho kwiyanja; alibha itali kutyo, nakakubwila, enigenda okubhachumila obhwikalo kulwawe.
Alabha nikagenda okubhachumila obwikalo, enija lindi okubhakalibhisha kwanye, anu nili nemwe ona mubheo.
Omumenya injila enuenigenda.”
Tomaso namubwila Yesu ati,”Lata bhugenyi, chitakumenya eyo ouja; Mbe! Echitulatiki okuimenya injila?
Yesu namubwila ati,”Nanye injila, nechimali no bhuanga; atalio unu katula okuja ku Lata atalabhile kwanye.
Alabha mumenyele anye, mwakamumenyele na Lata wani ona; Okusoka woli nokugendelela mumenyele na mwamulolele 0mwene.”
Philipo namubwila Yesu ati.”Latabhugenyi, choleleshe Lata na kutyo ebhichimala.”
Yesu namubwila ati,” muli amwi anye mwanya bhafu, kutya utakumenya anye, Philipo? wona oyo alolele anye amulolele Lata Niki chinu owaika ati,' choleshe Lata'?
Mtakwikilisha kubha anye ndi mu Lata, na Lata ali mwanye? Emisango jinu enibhabwila kwemwe nitakwaika kwo bhutulo bhanila; nawe ni Lata unu ekaye mwanye oyokakola emilimu jaye.
Nyikilisha anye, ati nili mu Lata, na Lata ali amwi nanye; Nyikilisha anye kwe emilimu jani.
Nichimali, chimali, nabhabwila ati, oyo kanyikilisha, anye nimilimu, ejoenikola, kajikola emilimu jinu ona; na kakola nolwo emilimu minene kwo kubha enilagenda ku Lata.
Chona chona mulisabwa kwa lisina lyani, enikola koleleki Lata akusibwe ku mwana.
Alabha mukasabwa echinu chonachona kwisina lyani elyo enikola.
Alabha mukanyenda, mulagwataga ebhilagilo byani.
Na ndimusabwa Lata, abhayane Omusilisha oundi atule okwikala amwi nemwe kajanende,
Omwoyo we chimali. unu isi inu itakutula kumwikilisha omwene kwo kubha itakumulola, itakumumenya omwene. nolwo kutyo emwe, mumumenyele omwene, kubha ekaye amwi nemwe na alibhaga amwi nemwe.
Nitalibhasiga bhene; enisubha kwemwe.
Ku mwanya mutoto, isi itakundola lindi, nawe emwe omundola. Okubha anye ndi muanga, nemwe mulibha bhaanga ona.
Ku lusiku olwo mulimenya ati anye ndi mu Lata, nemwe muli mwanye, nanye nili mwemwe
Wona wona oyokagwata ebhilagilo byani no kujikola, niwe umwi unu kanyenda anye; oyo kanyenda anye kendwa na Lata wani, enimwenda eniyelesha anye kumwene kwaye.”
Yuda (atali Iskariyote) namubwila Yesu ati,”Lata bhugenyi, Mbe! nanye echisokelela ati owiyolesha omwene kweswe na atali kusi?
Yesu nasubya naika ati,”Alabha wona wona akanyenda, aligwata omisango gwani. Lata wani alimwenda, nechija kweye na chilikola obwikalo bweswe amwi nage.
Wona wona unu atakunyenda anye, atakugwata misango jani. Omusango gunu ogwomwogwa gutali gwani nawe Lata unu antumile.
Nagaika ganu kwemwe, omwanya guchali nikaye kwemwe.
Nolwo kutyo omusilisha, Omwoyo mwelu, onu Lata antumile kwa lisina lyaye, alibheigisha emisango jona na alibhakola na alibhechusha jona ejo naikile kwemwe.
Omulembe nabhayana omulembe gwani anye. Nitakubhana lwa isi kutyo eibhayana. Mutakola emitima jemwe kulumwalumwa no kubhaya.
Mwoguwe ganu nabhabwiliye ati,'Enigenda jani, nenisubha kwemwe.'alabha muchisanga munyendele anye, bhakabheye na likondelelwa okubha enigenda ku Lata, okubha ni mukulu kukila amwe.
Woli namalile okubhabwila ati alibha chabhao koleleki, chibheo mwikilishe.
Nitachaika nemwe emisango mwafu, okubha omukulu wa isi inu kaja. Omwene atali na managa ingulu yani,
Nawe koleleki isi ibhone okumenya ati namwendele Lata, enikola chinu Lata andagiliye anye, kutyo anaye ebhilagilo. Mwimuke na chisoke anu.
Mbe anye ni mujabibu gunu guli chimali, lata wani niwe omulimi wo mujabibu.
Bhuli tabhi elyo litakwibhula litwasho kalisoshako, bhuli tabhi elyolibhuye litwasho kalichoma koleleko litule okwibhula munu.
Emwe mwamalile okubha bhelu okubha emusango gunu namalile okubhabwila.
Mwiyanje amwi nanye, nanye amwi nanye. alabha litabhi elyolitakutulakwibhula lyanyele likabha kumujabibu, emwemukalema okubha amwi nanye.
Anye ni mujabibu, emwe ni matabhi. Unu kekomesha okubha nanye, anye ona kumwene omunu unu kebhula amatwasho mafu, okubha atali anye mutakutula okukola musango gwona.
Ikabha omunu wona akalema okubha nanye, keswa lwalitabhi noma; Abhanu abhagakofya amatabhi no kugesa mumulilo ni galungula.
Ikabha omwikomesha kubha nanye, ne misango jani jikakomela kwemwe, musabhega lyona elyo omwenda nemwe omukolelwa.
Ku gunu lata wani kakusibha ati, omwibhula amatwasho mafu no mubha bheingisibwa bhani.
Labha Lata wani anyendele anye, anye ona nimbenda amwe; nimwekomeshe mulyenda lyani.
Mbe mukagwata ebhilagilo bhani, omukomela kulyenda lyani lwa kuyto nigwatile ebhilagilo bya lata wani ni mwikomeshe mulenda lyaye.
Nabhabwila emisango jinu kwemwe koleleki likondelwa lyani libhe kwemwe no kukondelya kwemwe kufule.
Chinu nicho echilagilo chani ati mwendane emwe kwa bhene lwa kutyo nibhendele amwe.
Atalio munu oyo alinelyenda ekulu kukila linu, ati asoshe obhuanga bhaye kulwa bhasani bhaye.
Emwe muli bhasani bhani alabha mukola ganu enibhalagilila.
Nitabhatoga bhagaya, kwokubha omugaya atakumenya chiliya echokakola esebhugenyi waye. Nabhatoga emwe bhasani, okubha nabhamenyesha emisango jona ejo nunguwe okusoka ku Lata.
Emwe muntasolele anye, nawe anye nabhasolele emwe no kubhatula mugende mwibhule amatwasho, na litwasho lyemwe libhone okwiyanja.
Linu lilikutya chonachona chinu mulasabha ku Lata kwa lisina lyani, kabhayanaga. Emisango jinu enibhalagilila ati, mwendane bhuli munu no wejabho
Labha isi ilabhasokaga, mumenye ati yasokele anye ichali okubhasoka emwe.
Alabha mwakabheye bha isi, isi yakabhendele abhewabho; Nawe okubha emwe mutali bha isi no kubha nibhasolele okusoka musi, kulwejo isi ibhasokele.
Mwichukega omusango gunu nabhabwiliye ati, 'omugaya atali mukulu kukila esebhugenyi waye; Alabha bhanyasishe anye, bhalibhanyasha emwe; alabha bhagwatile omusango gwani, bhakagwatile gwemwe.
Bhalibhakolelaga emisango jinu jona kwalisina lyani okubha bhatakumenya unu antumele.
Alabha nitejile ninaika bhakabheye bhakolele echibhibhi; Nawe woli bhatana chakuloma kwe bhibhibhi byebwe.
Unu kasoka anye kamusoka Lata ona.
Akabha Ntakolele milimu mubhumwi bwebhe atalio umwi atakolele, bhakabheye ne chibhibhi; Nawe woli bhakolele gona gabhili bhamalola ni bhasoka anye na Lata wani.
linu lisokele omusongo gukumile linu lyandikilwe mu bhilagilo byebwe; 'Bhasokele anye kutyo ela
Omwanya gunu omusilisha ejile unu natuma kwemwe okusoka Ku Lata, unu niwe, Mwoyo gwechimali, unu kasoka Ku Lata, kabhambambalila.
Emwe ona omubhambambalila okubha muli amwi nanye kubwambilo
Nabhabwila emisango jinu mwasiga kuyabhibwa.
Bbhalisosha anja ya likofyanya; omwanya oguja gunu wona alibheta aliganilisha kubha kakola emilimu jakisi kulwa Nyamuanga.
Alabhakolelaga emisango okubha bhatamumenyele Lata nolwo bhatamenyele anye.
Nabhabwila emisango jinu ati omwanya gwakinga ganu okusoka, omutula okwichuka kutyo nibhabwiliye bhatule abhene. Nitabhabwiliye emisango jinu kubwambilo okubha naliga nili amwi nemwe.
woli, nagenda ku uliya oyoatumile; nawe atali ku lwemwe unukambusha,”oujaki?”
Okubha nabhabwila emisango jinu kwemwe, okusulumbala kwijuye emitima jemwe.
Nolwo kutyo nabhabwila echimali: ni kisi kwemwe nikagenda; okubha nikalema, omusilisha atalibhejila kwemwe; nawe nikagenda ndimutuma kwemwe.
Akaja, oyo omusilisha alikomelesha isi kulwe bhibhibhi, na kulwo bhulengelesi na kulwo kulamula.
Kulwe bhibhibhi, kwo kubha bhatakunyikilisha anye,
kulwo bhulengelesi, kwo kubha enigenda ku Lata, na mutakundola lindi;
Kulwo kulamula kwo kubha omukulu wa isi inu alamuywe.
Ninago mafu go kubhabwila, nawe mutakutula kubhigumilisha wolyanu.
Nawe oyo mwoyo gwe chimali, akaja, alabhatangasha muchimali chona; kwo kubha atalyaika kubwaye; nawe byona ebyo alugwa, alyaika emisango jona; alabhabwila kwemwe emisango jinu ejo ejenda okuja.
Oyo kambika enye, kwo kubha kagega emisango jani nokulomela kwemwe.
Ebhinu byona ebyoanaye Lata ni byani; kwonakola naika ati Mwoyo kagega emisango jani nokubhabwila kwemwe.
Mwanya mutoto, mutakundola lindi; na alabha mwanya mutoto lindi, omundola.”
Abheigisibwa bhae nibhaikana nikiechokachimwila, “mwanya mutoto, mutakundola lindi,' na kandi mwanya mototo omundola,' kwo kubha nagenda ku Lata?”
Nikwo bhaikile,”niki chinu kaika,'Achali mwanya mutoto'? chitakumenya agokaika.”
Yesu nalola kubha bhendaga okumubhusha, nabhabhusha ati,”omwibhusha bhenela kulinu nabhabwila ati,'Achali mwanya mutoto, mutakundola lindi; na alabha mwanya mutoto omundola'?
Ni chimali, chimali, nabhabwila, mulilila jimamu, nawe isi ilikondelwa, mulibha no kusulumbala nawe okusulumbala kwemwe kuliinduka okubha likondelelwa.
Omugasi alibha no kusulumbala omwanya ogwo kabhona obhusungu kwo kubha okwibhula kweile; nawe olwokebhula omwana, atakwichuka lindi obhashe kwo kubha ya likondelelwa lyaye ati omwana ebhulwa musi.
Emwe muno okusulumbala woli, nawe enibhalola lindi; ne mitima jemwe jilikondelwa na atalio oyo katula okubhasosishao likondelwa lwemwe.
Olusiku olwo mutalimbusha musango. Ni chimali chimali enibhabwila ati, mulisabwa lyona ku Lata, alibhayana kwa lisina lyani.
Kukinga woli muchalinga kusabwa lyona kwa lisina lyani; musabwega, emwe muliyanibwa okukondelelwa kwemwe kukumile.
Nabhabwila emwe mu bhijekekanyo eyo itakumenyekana, nawe omwanya oguja gunu nitalyaika kwe bhijekekanyo eyo itakumenyekana nawe ndibhabwila abwelu ebya Lata.
Olusiku luliya mulisabwa kwa lisina lyani, nitakubhabwila ati ndibhasabhila ku Lata;
Kwo kubha Lata omwene abhendele okubha omunyenda anye no kubha omunyikilisha okubha nisokele ku Lata.
Nisokele ku Lata nenija musi; lindi enisokamo musi nenigenda ku Lata.
Abheigisibha bhaye nibhamubwila ati,”oulola woli owaika bwelu bwelu na otakukolela ebhigegekanyo.
Woli, chamenya ati emisango jona, na utakenele munu wona kukubhusha Kwo kubha linu chekilisha okubha ousoka Kunyamuanga.
Yesu nabhasubya ati, “Woli omwikilisha?”
Lola, omwanya oguja nichimali gwakigile, anu mulinyalaganila bhuli umwi wona mubhabho nimunsiga wenyele. Nawe nitali wenyele okubha Lata ali amwi nanye.
Nabhabwila emisngo jinu ati mubhe nomulembe. Musi muli na inyako, nawe mukomele anye naigile isi.
Yesu aikile emisango jinu; namala nenamusha ameso gaye nalolela mulwile naika, “Lata, omwanya gweile umukushe omwana koleleki no mwana ona akushe awe.
Lwa kutyo wamuyanile obhuinga ingulu ya bhona ebyo mubhili koleleki abhbayane obhuanga bya kajanende bhaliya bhona abho bhamuyaye.
Bhunu nibwo obhuanga bwa kajanende ati bhakumenye awe, Nyamuanga we chimali umwi ela no omwene oyo watumile, Yesu kristo.
Nakukusishe anu kusi, nagumalile omulimu ogwo wananile nigukole.
Woli Lata unkushe anye amwi nawe amwi wenyele kwikusho linu naliga nalyo amwi nawe isi ichali bubhao.
Nelesishe lisina lyao kubhanu abho wananile anu musi. Bhaliga bhanu bhao, nawe wananile anye nabho bhagugwatile omusango gwao.
Woli abhaja bhuli chinu echowananile anye echisoka kwawe.
Ku misango ejo wananile anye, Namalile okubhayana abhene emisango ejo. bhajilamiye ne chimali mbamenya kutyo anye nisokele kwawe, mbekilishe okubha awe nawe wantumile.
Enibhasabhilwa abho. Nitakusabhilwa echalo atali abho wananile kwo kubha abhene ni bhao.
Ebhinu byona ebyo ni byani nibyao na bhiliya ulinabyo ni byani; nanye enikukusha kwibyo.
Anye nitali muchalo, nawe abhene bhalimo muchalo, anye woli enija kwawe. Lata omwelu ubhalinde, kwi sina lyao linu abho unanile eswe koleleki abhene nabho bhabhe no bhumwi, lwa kutyo amwe nawe chili no bhumwi.
Naliga nili nabho, nabhalindile kwa lisina olyo wananile; Nabhalindile na atali ona umwi wemwe oyo abhulile atali omwana wokubhula, koleleki chinu chandikilwe chikumisibwega.
Woli enija kwawe; nawe enaika ganu ku chalo koleleki likondelelwa lyani likumile kubhona.
Nabhayaye omusango gwao; echalo chibhabhiililwa kwo kubha abhene bhatali bhe chalo, lwa kutyo anye nitali wechalo.
Nitakubhasabhilwa ati obhasoshe muchalo nawe ubhalindega na uliya omubhibhi.
Abhene bhatali bha musi lwa kutyo anye nitali wa kuchalo.
Ubhatulega kwawe omwene ku chimali; omusango gwao nigwe chimali.
Wantumile muchalo, anye ona nabhatuma muchalo.
Kulwejo anye omwene enisosha kwawe koleleki ati abhene bhesoshe kwawe kulwe chimali.
Bhatali bhanu ele abho enisabhila, nawe nabhaliya abho bhalikilisha okulabhila omusango gwebhe.
Koleleki ati abhone nabho bhabhe no bhumwi, lwa kutyo awe Lata, uli mwaye nanye nili mwawe. nabhasabhila koleleki ati abhene bhone bhatule okubha amwi neswe koleleki echalo chitule okwilisha ati awe niwe wantumile.
Likusho linu elyo wananile anye, nabhayaye abhene koleleki ati bhatule okubha no bhumi lwa kutyo eswe chili no bhumi.
Anye mu bhene, nabho mwanye, koleleki bhatule okukumila kubhumwi; koleleki echalo chimenye ati okubha nawe wantumile, no kubhenda, lwa kutyo awe wanyendele anye.
Lata, bhanu wananile anye, enenda abhene ona bhabhega nanye bhalole likusho lyani linu wananile: Okubha awe wanyendele anye isi ichali kumogwa.
Lata omulengelesi, isi itakukumenya awe, nawe anye enikumenya awe; na bhamenya ati untumile.
Nakolele lisina lyao limenyekane kwebwe, na enilikolaga limenyekane koleleki ati elyo kwenda okwo wanyendele anye litule okubha amwi nemwe, na nanye nitule okubha kwemwe.”
Mbe ejile amala Yesu okwaika emisango jinu, aulukile na bheigisibwa bhaye nibhambuka mwitina lya Kidron, enu chaliga chili echilabho, eyo omwene na bheigisibwa bhaye bhengiye omwo.
Woli Yuda, unu endaga okumulomela iniku, nawe aliga amenyele eyo, okubha Yesu aliga najayo eyo kwiya kafu nabheigisibwa bhaye.
Nawe Yuda ajile abhona echise cha bhasilikale na bhaofisa osoka kubhakulu bha bhagabhisi, bhejile bhali na jitala, gimuli nebhigwato.
Nawe Yesu, okubha amenyele bhuli chinu echochaliga nichikolekana kumwene, naja imbele yebwe nabhabhusha ati,”Niga oyo omuyenja?”
Abhene nibhamusubya ati,” Yesu Omunazareti.” Yesu nabhabwila ati,”Anye niwe”Nawe Yuda oyo amulomeye iniku, aliga emeleguyu amwi nabhasilikale.
Kulwejo ejile abhabwila ati,” Anye niwe” bhasubhile inyuma nibhagwa asi. Mbe
nabhabhusha lindi ati,” Niga oyo omuyenja? Abhene nibhamusubya lindi” Yesu omunazareti.”
Yesu nasubya ati,” Namalile okubhabwila ati Nanye; Kulwejo labha omuyenja anye, mubhasige bhanu abhandi bhagende.”
Ganu galiga gali kutyo koleleki guliya omusango gukumile; ao aikile ati;”Kubhanu ulanaye, nitamubhusishe nolo umwi.”
Niwo Simoni Petro, unu aliga ali ne chigwato, nenamusha namutema okutwi kwo bhulyo omukosi wo mugabhisi omukulu. Na lisina lyaye omukosi uliya aliga Malko.
Yesu namubwila Petro ati,” Subyamo echigwato chao muchibhikilo chaye. Kubhaki nisige okuchinywela echikombe chiliya echoanaye Lata?”
Mbe echisecha bhasilikale no mukulu webwe, na bhakosi bha bhayaudi, bhamugwatile Yesu nibhamubhoya.
Nabho nibhamutangasha okukinga ku Anasi, okubha omwene aligali esebhuko Kayafa, unu aliga mugabhisi omukulu omwaka ogwo.
Woli Kayafa niwe aliga abhayaye obwenge abhayaudi ati kwiyile omunu umwi okufwila abhanu.
Mbe Simoni Perto namulubha Yesu, na kutyo omwiigisibwa oundi. Na uliya omwiigisibwa aliga amenyelwe ku mugabhisi omukulu, nawe nengila amwi na Yesu mulugo lwo mugabhisi omukulu;
Nawe petro aliga emeleguyu anja yo lwigi. Mbe uliya omwiigisibwa oyoaliga amenyelwe ku mugabhisi omukulu, nauluka anja nagenda okwaika na uliya omuyala omukosi oyo egalaga olwigi namwingisha Petro munda.
Mbe uliya omuyala aliga mwigasi wo lwigi, namubhila Petro ati,” Awe utali umwi wa bheigisibwa bho munu unu?”Omwene naika ati,” Anye uli.”
Abhakosi na bhakulu bhaliya bhaliga bhemeleguyu ao; bhakongesishe omulilo okubha yaliga mbeo, na kutyo bhaliga mbabhila omulilo koleleki bhabhone libhila. Nawe Petro aliga ali nabho, nabhila omulilo emeleguyu.
0mugabhisi omukulu namubhusha Yesu ingulu ya bheigisibwa bhaye na meigisho gaye.
Yesu namusubya ati,” Nasimuliye abwelu abhanyachalo; Anye neigisishe kusiku mumekofyanya na muyekalu munu abhayaudi abhekofyanyishaga. Anye Nitaikile gwona gwona mumbisike.
Kulwa ki omumbusha? Mubhabhushe bhanu bhanyugwaga ingulu ya chiliya echonaikile. Abhanu bhanu abhamenya emisango jiliya ejonaikile
Yesu ejile amala okwaika kutyo, omwi wa bhakulu oyo aliga emeleguyu namubhuma Yesu kwo kubhoko kwaye neya naika ati,” nikwo kutyo kwiyile okumusubya omugabhisi omukulu?”
Nawe Yesu namusubya ati,” labha naika omusango gunu guli mubhibhi mbe ubhe mubhambasi kulubhaju lwo bhunyamuke, alabha nasubya kisi kulwaki umbume?
Niwo Anasi namusila Yesu kukayafa omugabhisi omukulu abhoyelwe.
Woli Simoni Petro aliga emeleguyu nabhila omulilo omwene. abhanu bhaliya nibhamubwila ati.”Awe, utali umwi wa bheigisibwa bhaye?” Nalema naika ati” Anye uli.”
Oumwi wa bhakosi bho mugabhisi omukulu oyo aliga luganda lwa uliya omulume oyo Petro amutemele okutwi, naika ati,” Atali awe unu nakulolele nage muchilabho?”
Petro nalema lindi, ao ing'oko nikokolima.
Mbe nibhamugega Yesu kusoka kukayafa kukinga mwilomelo. Yaliga katondo. abhene bhatengiye muliya mwilomelo koleleki bhataja kwilabhula no kuilya ipasaka.
Kulwejo Pilato nabhalubha naika ati.” Ni ntambalaki inu eyendela omunu unu?”
Nibhamusubya no kumubwila ati,”Alabha omunu unu atakolele obhunyamuke, chitakamuletele kwawe.”
Pilato nabhabwila ati,” Mumugege emwe abhene mumulamula okwingana nebhilagilo byemwe.” nabho abhayaudi nibhamubwila ati,”echilagilo chitakwilisha eswe okwita omunu wonawona.”
Bhaikile ganu koleleki omusango gwa Yesu gukumile, omusango ogwo aliga amalile okugwaika ingulu yo lufu lyaye.
Mbe Pilato nengila lindi mwilomelo namubhilikila Yesu; namubwila ati,” Mbe awe ulimukama wa Bhayaudi?”
Yesu namusubya ati,” Mbe awe ousubya ati obwaiki bhunu kwo kubha owenda okumenya okubha abhandi bhakutumile bhambushe anye?”
Pilato namusubya ati,” Anye ntali Muyaudi?” Liyanga lyao no mugabhisi omukulu nibho bhakuletele kwanye; awe wamakolaki?
Yesu nasubya ati; “Obhukama bwani bhutali bwe chalo chinu, alabha obhukama bwani bwakabheye bwe chalo chinu abhagaya bhani bhakandwaniye koleleki nisigeokusosibwa kubhayaudi. Ni chimali obhukama bwani bhutakusoka anu.”
Mbe Pilato namubwila ati Mbe awe ulimukama?” Yesu nasubya ati,” awe nikwo owaika anye ni mukama, Kwo kubha anye nibhuwe okubha anye nejile muchalo koleleki nibhe mubhambasi we chimali. Wona wona oyo ali wechimali kategelesha obhulaka bwani.
Pilato namubwila ati, echimali niki?” Nawe ejili amala okwaika ganu nadenga Kubhayaudi nabhabwila ati, Anye nitakulola lyona lyona kumunu unu.
Emwe muli naintungwa eyo enikola nimutatile omubwoywa umwi omwanya gwa ipasaka. Mbe omwenda nimutatile omukama wa bhayaudi.”
Mbe nibheya nibhamwaya obhulaka nibhaika ati, atali unu, mutatilile Balaba.” Nawe Balaba aliga omusakusi.
Mbe pilato amugegele Yes namubhuma.
Bhaliya abhasilikale nibhaluka amawa nokonja olutenga. Nibhaitula ingulu yo mutwe gwa Yesu nihhamufafya omwenda omutukulasi.
Nibhamujako nibhaika ati, Awe uli mukama wa Bhayaudi! mbe mbamubhuma kwa mabhoko gabho.
Mbe pilato nauluka anja nabhabwila abhanu ati,”Lola nabhaletele omunu unu kwemwe koleleki mumenye ati anye nitamubhonako chikayo chona chona kumwene.”
Kulwejo Yesu nauluka anja; aliga afyae olutengo lwa mawa no mwenda omutukulasi. Niwo Pilato nabhabwila ati, “Mumulole omunu unu!”
Kulwejo omwanya omugabhisi omukulu bhejile bhamulola Yesu, nibhamwaya nibhaika ati,”Mumubhambe ku musalabha Pilata nabhabwila ati, “Mumugege emwe abhene mumubhambe ku musalabha, kwokubha anye nitakulola echikayo ku munu unu.
Abhayaudi nibhamusiga ati Pilato,” Aswe chili nebhilagilo, na kulwejo bhilagilo echo chiile afye kwo kubha omwene ekolele kubha mwana wa Nyamuanga.”
Pilato ejile ongwa emisango ogwo nongesha okubhaya,
Nengila mwilomelo lindi namubwila Yesu ati, “Awe ousoka aki? Nolwo kutyo, Yesu atamusubhishe.
Mbe pilato namubwila ati, “Awe utakwaika nanye? Mbe awe utakumenya ati anyenili no bhuinga obwo kukutatila na nili nobhuinga obwo kukubhamba ku musalabha?
Yesu namusubya ati, “Utakabhee namaga gonna kwanye alabha utakagabwene kusoka ingulu. Kulwejo omunu unu kasosha kwawe anebhibhi bhinene.”
Okwingana na lisubyo linu, Pilato endele okumutatila, nawe Abhayaudi nibhamwaya obhulaka nibhaika ati, “Alabha ukamutatila mbe awe utali musani wa Kaisari: Okubhayana unu kekola kubha mukama kamuyenusha kaisari.”
Pilato ejile ongwa emisango jinu namuulusha Yesu anja neya neyanja kuchitebhe cho kulamulila ao amenyekana ku mabhui amatinge, nawe muchiebulania, ni Gabatha.
Olusiku lwo kwilabha ipasaka lwejile lwakinga, omwanya gwa saa sita ja mumwisi. Pilato namubwila ati Abhayaudi, mulole omukama wemwe nguyu anu!”
Ni bhamwaya nibhaika ati, “Mumusosheo, mumusosheo mumubhambe ku musalabha!”Pilato nabhabwila ati, “nimubhambe kumusalabha omukama wemwe?” Omugabhisi omukulu nasubya ati, “Eswe chitana mukama tali chili Kaisari ela.”
Niwo Pilato namusosha Yesu kubhene koleleki bhamubhambe kumusalabha.
Niwo nibhamugega Yesu, naulika agegele omusalabha gwae omwene nakinga anu atogwaga Muchianga, muchiebrania natogwa Goligota.
Niwo bhamubhambile Yesu kumusalabha amwi na bhandi bhalume bhabhili umwi lunu no undi lunu, na Yesu agati yebwe.
Mbe Pilato nandika echimenyegesho nachitula ingulu ya kumusabha. Ao andikilwe ati: YESU MUNAZARETI, OMUKAMA WA BHAYAUDI.
Abhayaudi bhafu nibhasoma echimenyegesho echo chandikilwe mu chiebrania na muchilumi na muchiyunani.
Mbe abhakulu bha bhagabhisi bha Bhayaudi nibhamubwila Pilato ati, “Siga kwandika, 'Omukama wa Bhayaudi; tali omwene aikile atianye ni mukama wa Bhayaudi.”
Niwo Pilato nabhasubya ati, “Chinu nandikile nicho nandika.”
Bhejile bhamala abhasilikale okumubhamba kumusalabha Yesu, nibhagega ebhifalo byee nibhabhigabha ku migabho ena, bhuli musilikale mugabho gwae, na kutyo ikanju, yaeyaliga itasonelwe tali yaliga ilukilwe kusokelela ingulu.
Mbe nibhaikana ati abhene kwa bhene, “Chisige okuitemula, tali chibhume ikula koleleki chilole eibha yaga.” Linu lisokele koleleki elyandiko likumile elyo lyalomelwe ati bhagabhene emyenda jani no mwenda gwani mbagubhumila ikula.”
Mbe abhasilikale bhakolele emisango jinu. Nyilamwene Yesu, no muyala wejabho, Mariamu omugasi wa Kileopa na Mariamu Magdalena bhaliga bhemeleguyu ayeyi no musalabhagwa Yesu.
Yesu ejile amolola Nyilamwene ali amwi na uliya omwiigisibwa oyoaliga amwendele emeleguyu ayei, namubwila nyilamwene ati, “Omugasi, lola, omwana wao guyu anu!”
Mbe nabhabwila ati uliya omwiigisibwa, “Lola, unu Nyokomwana wao. “Okusoka omwanya ogwo omwiigisibwa namugega namusilaika owae.
Mbe kulwejo, Yesu aliga amenyele ati byona byamalile okukumwisibwa koleleki elyandiko elyoaikile ati, “obhulilo bha nyita.”
Echinu chaliga chijue isiki, kulwejo nibhatulao sifongo lijuye isiki nibhamutulila kumunwa gwae.
Mbe nawe Yesu ejile aloja isiki, naika ati, “Jawa.” mbe nenamya omutwe gwae, nasosha omwoyo.
Mbe lwa kutyo kwalinga luli lusiku lwo mwanya gwo kwilabha, kwobha emibhili jitendibwaga okusigala ingulu yo musalabha ku mwanya gwa isabhato (kulwejo isabhato lwaliga lusiku lukulu), Abhayaudi nibhamusabwa Pilato okubhafuna amagulu gebwe need mibhili gebwe bhagisosheko.
Niwo abhasilikale nibhaja nibhafuna amagulu go munu wo kwamba no wakabhili oyo aliga abhambilwe amwi na Yesu.
Bhejile bhamukingila Yesu, mbamusanga afue, kulwejo bhatamufunile amagulu gaye.
Nolwo kutyo, umwi wa bhasilikale namusoma Yesu kulubhafu na lichumu, nigasoka amanyinga na manji.
Unu alolele linu nasosha obhubhambasi, no bhubhambasi bwaye ni bwe chimali. Omwene kamenya echo kaika niche chimali koleleki emwe ona mwikilishe.
Emisango jinu jabheyeo koleleki omusango ogwo gwandikilwe gukumisibwe, “Atabheyeo nolwo wae umwi oyo afunilwe.”
Elyandiko lindi elyaika ati, “Bhalimulola unu abhobhamusomele”
Jegile jawa emisango jinu Yusufu wa Arimathaya, unu aliga mwigisibwa was Yesu, nawe Ali mumbise nobhaya abhayaudi, amusabhile Pilato ati agugege omubhili gwa Yesu. MbePilato nekilisha niwo Yusufu naja nagusoshao omubhili gwa Yesu.
Mbe Nicodemo unu amulubhile Yesu ingeta ona naja. Omwene aletele ebyo bhisasise ebya mafuta na malange bhuli no bhusito bwa latili egana.
Kulwejo nibhagenda omubhili gwa Yesu nibhagusinga mumwenda amwi nibhilange, lwa kutyo jitungwa ja abhayaudi omwanya gwo kusika kwebwe.
Mbe anu Yesu abhambilweo yaliga iliyo ibhusitani na yalinga ilimo ifya inyaya ichali kweswamo omunu.
Mbe, okubha yaliga lusiku lwo kwilabha kwa Bhayaudi, na kutyo ifya yaliga ili yei nibhamwesa Yesu omwo.
Okwilabha kwo lusiku Leo kwamba lichalimo lisute, Mariamu Magdalena naja kufwa; nalola libhui litalio kufwa.
Kulwejo nabhilima muno kujenda ku Simoni Petro na ku uliya Omwiigisha oundi oyo aliga amwendele, mbe nabhabwila ati, “Bhamugege Lata bhugenyi mufwa, eswe chitakumenya eyo bhamuteye.”
Neya Petro na uliya omwiigisibwa oundi nibhauluka nibhagenda, okuja kufwa.
Bhona nibhabhilima ku bhumwi mbe oyo omwiigisibwa nabhilima muno nakila Petro nangua okukinga kufwa;
Nemelegulu neya nasungulila mufwa; nalola emyenda ja bhafuta jiteywe ao, nawe nalema okwingilamo.
Mbe Simoni Petro na wona nakinga nengila Munda ya ifwa nalola emyenda ja bhafuta jimamile aliya.
Ne chitambala chinu chaliga kumutwe gwae gwaliga gutamamile amwi nemyenda ja bhafuta nawe yaliga imamile kumbali gwenyele.
Niwo uliya omwiigisibwa oundi wona nengila munda ya ifwa; nalola nekilisha.
kwo kubha okungila omwanya ogwo bhaliga bhachali kumenya amandiko ati kumwiile Yesu asuluke ku bhafuye.
Mbe abheigisibhwa nibheya nibhagenda mumisi jebwe.
Nolwo kutyo, Mariamu aliga emeleguyu kufwa nalila, obwo aliga nagendelela okulila emeleguyu neya nalola mufwa.
Nalola bhamalaika bhabhili bho lususo lumwela bheyanjilile oumwi kumutwe oundi kumagulu awo Yesu aliga amamile.
Nabho nibhamusiga ati, “Mugasyawe kulwaki oulila?” Omwene nabhabwila ati, “Ni kwokubha bhamugegele Lata bhugenyi wani, nanye nitakumenya eyo bhamuteye,”
Ajile amala okwaika ejo nainduka namulola Yesu emeleguyu. Nawe atamumenyele ati oyo aliga Ali Yesu.
Nawe Yesu namubwila ati, “Mugasi, kulwaki oulila? Ouyenjaga?” Nawe omwene netogela ati niwe omwani wo mugunda namubwila ati, “Lata bhugenyi, alabha nawe omugegele, mbwila enu umuteye, anye nimugegeyo.”
Yesu namubwila ati, “Mariamu.” Nawe nainduka omwene namubwila Muchiaramu ati, “Raboni kunu Ni kwaika ati, “Omwiigisha.”
Yesu nabhabwila ati, “Utangwatako, kubha nichali kulinya kugenda ku Lata; nawe genda kubhana bhasu ubhabwile atinitakulinya kugenda ku Lata wani oyo emwe ona Ni Lata wemwe, Nyamuanga wemwe.”
Mariamu Magdalena naja nabhabwila abheigisibwa ati, “Namulola Lata bhugenyi,” na kutyoamubwila emisango jinu.
Mbe yejile yabha kegolo, ku lusiku olwo, olusiku lwo kwamba olwo bwoyo, amegi galiga gegawe abheigisibwa ku lwokubhaya Abhayaudi, Yesu nabhemelegulumo nabhabwila ati, “Omulembe gubhe nemwe.”
Ejile amala okwaika kutyo nabhelesha amabhoko gaye no lubhafu lwaye. Niwo abheigisibwa bhae bhejile bhamulola Lata bhugenyi nibhakondelwa.
Neya Yesu nabhabwila lindi, “Omulembe gubhe nemwe. lwa kutyo Lata antumile anye, ni kutyo anye enibhutuma emwe.”
Yesu ejile amala okwaika kutyo nabhesisha omwika nabhabwila ati, Mulamile mwoyo mwelu.
Wona Wona mumusasilega ebhibhibhi, abhasasilwa; na bhaliya mulibhabhoyela bhalibhoyelwa.”
Thomasi, oumwi wa bhaliya ekumi na bhabhili, oyo atogwaga bhalongo, atabhee na bheigisibwa bhejabho Yesu aoejile.
Bhaliya abheigisibwa abhandi nibhamubwila ati, “Chamulola Lata bhugenyi.” omwene nabhabwila ati, “Alabha nitabwene jikofu je misumali ku mabhoko gae nintako echala chani kukofu jae, nita no kubhoko kwani kulubhafu lwae, nitakwikilisha na katyali.”
Jatulile siku munana abheigisibwa bhaliga muchiyumba lindi, na Thomaso aliga amwi nabho. Omwanya jinjigi jigawe Yesu nemelegulu agati yebwe. naika ati, “Omulembe guye amwi nemwe.”
Neya namubwila Tomaso ati, nulete echala chao na ulole amabhoko gani; nulete any amabhoko gao ugwate kulufafu lwani; Usinge kubha unu atekilisishe nawe unu ekilisishe.”
Niwo Thomaso namusubya namubwila ati, “Lata bhugenyi wani na Nyamuanga wani.”
Yesu nabhabwila ati, Kwo kubha wandola, nikwo wakola wekilisha. Bhana libhando bhanu abhekilisha, bhatalolele.”
Neya Yesu nakola ebhibhalikisho byafu imbele ya bheigisibwa, ebyo bhitandikilwe mu chitabho chinu.
Nawe bhinu byandikilwe koleleki mutule okwikilisha ati Yesu niwe Kristo, omwana wa Nyamuanga nakulwo kwikilisha mubhe no bhuanga kwisina lyae.
Inyuma ye misango jinu Yesu nesolomola Lindi ku bheigisibwa bhae ku nyanja ya Tiberia; nesolomola kutyo omwene:
Simoni Petro aliga amwi na Thomaso unu katogwa Balongo, Nathanaeli wa kana ya Galilaya, na bhana bha, Zebedayo na bheigisibwa abhandi bhabhili bha Yesu.
SimoniPetro nabhabwila ati, “Anye naja okutega jiswi.” Nibhamubwila ati,” Eswe one echigenda nawe.”nibhagenda nibhengila mubwato, nawe ingeta eyo Yona bhatetile chinu.
Nawe bhejile bhacha, Yesu katondo, Yesu nemelegulu kuchalo, nawe abheigisibhwa bhatamumenyele ati no Yesu.
Neya Yesu nabhabwila ati, “Bhamula mwabhonamo chona chona echokulya?” abhene nibhamubya ati, “uli.”
Nabhabwila ati, “Mwese lijalife olubhala lwe bholyo bwe lyato, nemwe omubhona.”mbe nibhesa lijalife nibhatamibwa okulikulula lindi kwo bwafu bwa jiswi.
Mbe omwiigisibwa unu Yesu endaga namubwila Petro ati, “Ni Lata bhugenyi.” Nawe Simoni Petro ejile ongwa ati ni Lata bhugenyi, nibhoya omwenda (okubha aligabatafyae kisi), mbe neyesa munyanja.
Bhaliya abheigisibwa abhandi nibhaja mu bwato okubha bhaliga bhatali Kula no mwalo nawe kuti egana limwi kusoka kuchalo nabho bhaliga nibhakulula lijalife lijue jiswi.
Mbe bhejile bhakinga kuchalo, nibhalola omulilio gwa makala guli ao na iswiili amwi no mukate
Yesu nabhabwila ati, “mulete jiswi ejo mweta wolyanu.”
Mbe Simoni Petro nalinya mubwato nakulula lijalife lyaliga lijue jiswi jinene egana namakumi gatanu ne satu; Nawe jaliga jili nyafu kutyo omujalifu gutatemukile.
Yesu nabhabwila ati, “Nimuje mulye.”Nawe otalio umwi was bheigisibwa unu alegejishe kumubhusha ati, “Awe niga?” Bhamenyele atini Lata bhugenyi.
Yesu naja nagega omukate guliya, neya nabhayana, nakola kutyo na jiswi.
Lunu lwaliga luli lwz kasatu okubhoneke ku bheigisibwa bhae ejile amala okusuluka okusoka mubhafue.
Mbe bhejile bhamala okulya, Yesu namubwila ati Simoni Petro, “Simoni omwana was Yohana Ounyenda kukila bhanu?” Perto nasubya ati,” Yee Lata bhugenyi awe oumenya ati anye enikwenda.” Yesu namubwila ati,” Lisha abhana bha jinama jani.”
Namubwila lindi ati, Simoni omwana wa Yohana ounyenda?” niwo Perto nasulumbala okubha amubhusishe olwa kasatu ati awe ounyenda? namubwila ati” Lata bhugenyi awe umenyele bhona; oumenya ati enikwenda” Yesu namubwila ati,” Lisha jinama jani.”
Namubhwila lindi kwiya kasatu, “Simoni, mwana wa Yoana, Enibhusha, ounyenda?” Petero nasulumbala kwokubha amubhusishe kwiya kasatu ati, “Awe ounyenda?” Omwene namubhwila ati, “Lata Bhugenyi, umenyele gona; oumenya ati enikwenda.” Yesu namubhwila ati, “Nulishe jinama jani.
Ni chimali enikubhwila ati, ao waliga ulimusigaji waliga unalile okufwala omwenda wenyele nugenda enu owenda; nawe ulikokola, uligolola amabhoko gao, oundi nakufwafya omwenda nakusila enu utakwenda.”
Yesu aikile kutyo nolesha okufwa kunu alifwa Petro amukushe Nyamuanga. mbe ejile amala okwaika jinu, namubwila ati Petro, “Nuundubhe.”
Petro nainduka namulola uliya omwiigsibwa unu Yesu endaga namulubha, Niwo unu aliga eekekele mu chifubha cha Yesu omwanya gwe ebhilyo bya kegolo naika ati, Lata bhugenyi niga unu alakulomela iniku?”
